A room at the end of the building and views over to China Town, probably the quietest hotel room I have ever stayed in. Well located with MRT station very close, walk to China Town, Maxwell Hawker Food Centre. The room was pleasantly decorated with a comfortable bed. My only dislike was that the hair dryer provided, you cannot use in the bathroom and the only other place with a mirror was over the desk, but the hairdryer had a very tightly coiled lead and made it very difficult. Service by staff we came across were all efficient, friendly and helpful. The Carlton Club was a quiet oasis and enjoyed our breakfast daily without the hustle and bustle and a great spot to unwind after a busy

title: Nice hotel with good view and location
desc: This is nice a hotel near MRT (a small mall in MRT) station about 300M far walk to hotel. There is a 7-11 in front of hotel , and a traditional market , a nice toast box in building next hotel. We read and check all hotels reviews in all SG hotels in website for one month. It is definitely a good choose.The basic room size is ok, full of sunshine and clean at 20F. Free WIFI all hotel and quickly. The front desk English is good enough and friendly. We don't book breakfast since most people gave not good review. The next door oasis hotel also look nice but little more cost. IF you like a modern type hotel with good room, the free wifi , near MRT. Just book it without breakfast. You can buy a 100G WIFI card on KLOOK website, it is nice to 5 days use and share hotspot. The EZ

title: Great stay
desc: I booked two twin rooms (Carlton Club class) at this hotel on the recommendation of my sister-in-law. Great choice, the extra $S for Club class is so worth it. The hotel is clean, comfortable and well located, with good sized rooms and amenities, but, it's greatest asset is it's staff. From the Porter, reception and Club Lounge staff we were greeted with genuine smiles and professionalism. We need to make special mention of Shek in the Club Lounge who made our stay! He was warm, open, welcoming and made us feel special with his attention and tips... not to mention making a much better Singapore Sling than the overpriced bulk versions at Raffles. Thanks for the excellent service, I know my brother and his wife will visit again next year and I definitely will be

title: Great location
desc: Location wad ideal for us. Easy walking distance to centre. Hotel very clean and staff very helpful and friendly. Didn't eat in the hotel had street food which was amazing. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Lovely hotel
desc: We stayed here for 2 days. It's a very lovely hotel. The staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and have an ok size. Our flight back home was only late in the evening, the hotel offers a room for one hour, complementary, to freshen up, that's a real guest service in my opinion. The only thing that isn't good about this hotel is the gym, it's ever so small and basically you can't do a workout in there. But apart from that, we had a lovely stay and would come back anytime.

title: Another visit...
desc: Loved staying in Carlton City after 3 years. Great experience. Went to pool this time. Very well managed & quite clean. Rooms are quite sophisticated. Never faced any sort of issue here. Location is very good, just next to the MRT station

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Top hotel, Top staff, we found them extremely helpful and friendly. Always going out of their way to assist us in all aspects of our holiday in the 6 days we stayed even when we had troubles which we're not their fault. The rooms are a good size and food was great with the location central to all attractions. The Graffiti Bar has great views, especially night views. Would highly recommend this hotel if travelling to Singapore on business or pleasure, already planning to return.

title: Exceptional Breakfast Buffet Selection!
desc: One of the best things I love about this hotel is its amazing breakfast buffet. It had a wide array of food selection from the salads, breads, spreads to meats, eggs and drinks. I couldn't complain. It was just beyond my expectation! The room is very nice and spacious. The bed is very comfy and the sheets are nice. I specifically love the very clean bathroom and enjoyed using the bathtub for a relaxing dip. I did not have the chance to use the pool but it looks nice from outside though I find it rather small. Location is great as it is just next to Tanjong Pagar MRT station and it a couple of stations away from Chinatown. There are many good restaurants in the area like my favorite Japanese restaurant called Tendon Ginza Itsuki which served the most delicious tendon. There is

title: Excellent Business Hotel
desc: This is a great comfortable, luxurious business hotel located in the business district very close to Tanjong Pagar MRT. Rooms are well sized, beds comfortable. Our room had a bath tub which is great. There was no steam or sauna unfortunately which is useful after a long day out. There is a portable handy phone which you can carry throughout the city so no need to pay for international roaming.

title: perfect hotel
desc: very beautiful hotel , room very clean , very good and nice staff , nice pool , location as well its good , its was a great stay, close to shopping mall, we enjoyed our stay and would recommended to others

title: Fantastic
desc: Thought we had booked the other Carlton hotel but faound we had booked this instead. What a great mistake. We booked a club room and all the benefits you got with it including a handy phone to use for no charge was great. The staff are at the top of their game, pleasant and informative and go the extra mile to assist. The location is great right nrxt to Tanjong Pagar MRT station.

title: Great location, Comfortable room and good service.
desc: By far this the best hotel we stayed till now.. 1. Beds are really comfortable. 2. Bathrooms are spacious. 3. Cleanliness is best in class. Near by eateries.. 1. Maxwell hawker centre, don't forget to have singaport best chicken RICE at "Tian Tian chicken rice" 2. KOREAN FOOD STREET. 3. Art museum. We really enjoyed our 7 days stay in this hotel.

title: Great location with famous food nearby
desc: The first time I stayed in this hotel was when it's newly opened, so got promotional price, now the price has gone up a lot, so not staying so often for my regular business trip in Singapore. Recent stay in Nov 2017, it's still very good as usual, near to Tanjong Pagar MRT, walking distance to the hawker center where 'Tin Tin' chicken rice is. Lots of restaurant on streets nearby. One thing I like the most is the local supermarket opposite the hotel. Also, AM100 mall is just around the corner.

title: Perfect location
desc: Location is perfect, close to Tanjong Pagar MRT station (less than 5 mins walk). We were upgraded from a standard room to a club room, given a welcome basket of snacks, and also a nice plate of cakes! Staff are most helpful, and gave us a late checkout (15:00 instead of 12:00) as we were catching a late flight back. The rooftop bar is great, and the pool looked good (but I didn't try it). We pre-booked breakfast at $20 (SGD), there was a great choice and it was all well cooked. If we come back to Singapore, this will be our first choice. Thanks to the staff for making us feel welcome.

title: Nice modern hotel
desc: Stayed 1 night and room was nice and clean. Good swimming pool on 3rd floor. 5 mins walk to Tanjong Pagar MRT station. Lots and lots of food options nearby from Japanese, Korean, hawker center. Supermarket across from hotel which is open 24 hours. Safe neighborhood.

title: enjoyed our short stay
desc: nice clean and spacious room good breakfast helpful staff As we had to leave very early after our second night we were offered a take away breakfast which was quite reasonable. we enjoyed our meal in the restaurant

title: Great place to stay
desc: We recently spent 3 days at the Carlton city hotel arriving early in the morning on our way home from India. We were surprised to find our room ready. Staff were just fantastic and nothing was a problem to them. The room was great and the food was nice. Location was great with transport not too far away. All in all a great place to stay. We would not hesitate to stay there again and would recommend Carlton city hotel to any traveller.

title: Very good
desc: Very good hotel when you are on business in the area. Also an ok area for pleasure after work, just a short walk to Chinatown and Club Street, not far from the quay`s and Fullerton bay either. Very good room and good brekfast. Nice outside pool. Very pleasant staff.

title: Well-managed hotel, good location, High standard.
desc: Modern and new hotel, managed by responsive and friendly staff, in a good location, 2 minutes walk from the subway, this hotel meets or beats the already high standards one expects from upper-end Singapore hotels. An attractive south-facing lap pool provides a sunny respite. Everything was good. If I must quibble, it would be over trivial issues, such as there not being enough channels on the TV. (Yes, they do have several English language channels but they only show junk such as monsters fighting each other, or biased commentators with a political angle to propagate such as Fox or RT. Except for a few NHK or CNA documentaries there is nothing thoughtful about any of the programming. Conspicuous in its absence is the BBC, one of the world's least biased news organizations). A

title: Nice Stay
desc: Stayed for a business trip, staff was polite and cordial. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast menu was good. Location is great, easily accessible.They do arrange buffet dinners but on selected days which are quite nice.

title: Well located, clean rooms, needs some help
desc: I stayed at this hotel tell for two nights during a business trip. I was happy with the location as well as the upkeep of the hotel. Unfortunately, I had to spend a significant amount of the time working in the room and the Internet connection in the room and in the common areas was really poor. Also, the gym was totally below the standard I would expect from a hotel of this level. Staff were very nice and welcoming.

title: My Stay at Carlton City Hotel
desc: The room was big and bright. That was very good. But then one day we were out and wanted the cleaning crew to come to clean the place. I think they opened the fridge and forgot to close it properly so when we came back at night, all the things that we bought was warm and could not be eaten. We called them to find out and they said that the cleaning crew did come and open the fridge but when we said what was our problem, they changed their answer and said that the cleaning crew did not touch the fridge. I would advise anyone who goes there to put less/no things in the fridge. Apart from that, my stay was quite pleasant.

title: Nice Property!
desc: Nice and clean property, spacious and modern room with nice view of the port and other skyscrapers around. They have great staff, always with a smile on their face. The outdoor pool area is a nice place to unwind after a busy day, also the bar on 28th floor. This is a great value for money property!

title: Complaint Regarding Poor Customer Service
desc: I am writing in to express my frustration and disappointment with the hotel. I am a tourist from Malaysia travelling with two young children and had intended to stay one night on 27 December 2017. I stayed in room 2612 and checked out at approximately 1.00 PM on 28 December 2017. Before heading to the woodlands checkpoint, we visited some places of interests in the afternoon. Upon arrival at the customs, I realized that our passports were left in the hotel roomâ€™s safe deposit box. I immediately called the hotel to check. I spoke to Gilbert and he arranged for the room attendant to check. Nothing was found, and he told me that the safe deposit box was left open when I checked out, and that I had taken the passports with me. I was very sure that I had left the passports in the

title: Nice place
desc: We stayed 4 nights after cruise. Hotel is close to Chinatown. There are lots of places around for night eaters. Room is clean and tidy however there are limited choices for breakfast. Accommodation is nice here, quiet.

title: Great hotel in a perfect location
desc: Given the vast array of hotels I was unsure about where to book but I am very happy I picked the Carlton City Hotel. The hotel is in a convenient location for the metro system as by taxi. The Christmas tree was just beautiful and the staff very friendly. Special mention to Lea from the reception team who gave me a late checkout. The room was perfect and had a great modern bathroom along with a very comfortable bed. The handy phone is a nice touch to help visitors in Singapore. The gym is small but good for a quick cardio type workout. This hotel is great however the only small thing that could be improved is the selection at breakfast could be a little more to my liking and similar to what I tend to find in other Asian countries. In particular please add a healthy muesli

title: An absolute joy
desc: It was an absolute joy to stay in this beautiful hotel in an amazing country. The staff and amenities at this hotel are brilliant! It is immaculate and the beds are so comfortable I almost missed out on touring the country each morning. It is in an ideal location in China town and next to 2 MRT stations so you can travel anywhere in a short time. There are lots of local shops, markets and Hawker food stalls all within walking distance. The complimentary phone is an added bonus and extremely useful. This hotel is highly recommended!

title: Good business hotel
desc: Carlton City is a convenient hotel right beside Tanjong Pagar MRT. Plenty of food options around the Hotel ranging from cheap Singapore hawker fare to prime restaurants at Amara Hotel next door. All the rooms in the hotel are 32m2. The difference in classes are just the direction it faces and which level it is. We stayed in an Executive Room and found it lacking a â€œwowâ€ flavour. That said, the bed is very comfortable and buffet breakfast is good. Iâ€™d have given a higher rating if I was a business traveller. For tourists, do note while the hotel is near Sentosa, Chinatown and Marina Bay, youâ€™ve to change a few trains to get to these places. Buses will get there faster, ask the concierge for those numbers.

title: Overall a good hotel
desc: This is one of few hotels in Singapore that you canâ€™t find much to fault with . The room is clean and affordable . Service is fairly good and efficient , and food at the plate quite fresh . Except for the occasional one or two hotel staff at the reception or restaurant that may annoy you with their attitude , everything else is fine . Nearby there is 24 hours Ntuc which is convenient . Overall worth staying and value delivered !

title: Fantastic stay, will return
desc: My husband and I stayed at Carlton City for one night at the end of a holiday to Thailand, this was the third hotel of our trip and by far the best. Check in was a breeze, very prompt and efficient with lovely friendly staff. The room and bathroom is spacious and modern with the nice addition of a smart phone, we used this to call home and it worked a treat. For the size of the hotel, I think the provision of bars / cafes / restaurants is excellent, especially the rooftop bar, Graffiti, this is just fantastic and they make best mojitos ever! The pool area is also superb with a perfect temperature pool, the only thing lacking is possibly service of food and drinks. Admittedly, the restaurant is right next to the pool, so it would probably be easy to order something if you

title: Amazing Stay
desc: We stayed here for the first 2 nights of our stay in Singapore and wow it is amazing. The rooms are so modern and clean and have everything you need. The price we paid for what we got was unbelievable and I would recommend it to everyone. One of the highlights is the privacy glass on the bathroom which offers views of the city from the bathtub. The main highlight however (other than the extremely comfy bed) is the 'handy' phone you have in your room. This is a mobile that you can take with you and has unlimited internet and calls so you can look at places as you go and get directions on google maps as needed. Overall an absolute an amazing hotel with friendly staff.

title: Great service by extremely friendly and helpful staff
desc: Was planning a birthday surprise for my boyfriend, therefore contacted one of their staff , Nizar to help out with the deco and Cake. Was very impress with it upon checking in into the room as he managed to planned it all out as per how i wanted it to be. Great job Nizar and the rest of Carlton's staff, really appreciate your help and effort to make this surprise an extremely successful one!

title: Comfortable staycation in a strategic location
desc: I booked the club room for a Staycation and was very happy with it. The room was located on one of the highest floors (level 26), and we had a very nice view of the Tanjong Pagar Terminal. The room was very clean, and the bathroom amenities were from the The White Company, which we enjoyed using a lot. The Club lounge served complimentary cocktails and food from 6-8pm, and you get to indulge in a wonderful view of the surrounding area. We also managed to get a late check-out at 3pm, which made the stay even more enjoyable. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel for your staycations. Upgrade to the club room if possible, it's definitely worth it.

title: Modern hotel
desc: Stay here for 2 nights. Room is excellent. Front office employees really welcome you. The room is very modern and spacious enough for Singapore standard. Location is nice. Lots of restaurants and close to public transportation.

title: Discovered a great bar with awesome view 29floor
desc: Hi a regular business visitor in CBD area never noticed this new (5 year old ) hotel. Yes was shocked it was open for 5 years . Was invited for a business meeting up to the bar turned out to be a great place but guest were mainly house guest and no locals visited the bar . Great hotel with good service

title: perfect
desc: singapore has become a home from home and i usually stay on the opposite side of town. What a find this place is !!!! great roof top bar with a quite subdued atmosphere - but great views. food was ok to better than average - pool amazing - drinks cold - quiet lifts - massive room with the standard see into bathroom; all rooms have a city or river view i think - free minibar too. great - this is now my pref Sing hotel !!!

title: Convenient location
desc: The hotel is situated next to the train station and the train network system is easy to use plus so cheap. The hotel has friendly helpful staff and the rooms are a decent size. Very new feel to this hotel. Next to Chinatown so lots of eating places. Very convenient spot.

title: Good Location and Great Service
desc: It's a great feeling from the moment of checking in till checking out. In between, enjoyed the great service by club lounge staff, swam/relaxed and lazed at the pool, workout in a decent gym, good spread of breakfast items at Plate Cafe and the list goes on. It's centrally located in city centre and easily accessible to a train station and F & B outlets. Specially mention and applaud the club lounge staff of Cherry, Kel, Shawn, Qaiser, Attiqah, Chermaine not forgetting Joanna from Tuxedo Cafe. They were friendly, accommodating and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organisation. They will be the ones to motivate me to keep coming back. A refreshed, relaxed and rejuvenated stay. Thanks Gals and Guys.

title: Good location; reasonably-well equiped new hotel
desc: The stay was for a business trip so location was important. Carlton City Hotel, located in the Tanjong Pagar, is close to the business district and within walking distance to China town. The hotel is just 3 minutes away from Tanjong Pagar MRT station so it is very convenient, especially to the Changi Airport. The property is reasonably-well equipped for the price and its location. And I have to say there are already two types of pillow placed in the room is a smart move. The weakness is the breakfast at its restaurant Plate; food variety is rather limited.

title: Stunning hotel, beautiful room, great rooftop bar and pool!
desc: The Carlton City Hotel was such an awesome hotel! Lovely bakery across the road too. The rooms were very beautiful and comfortable. No free breakfast with our room rate but there is a nice little cafe in the lobby. Would definitely stay again.

title: Not really a 5 star hotel
desc: The location is not bad but this is not really a 5 star hotel. The room is just okay and not modern like the other hotels. The size of the room is not bad but it could be bigger. Things could really use an update at this hotel but it's nice enough for a short trip. I usually like my duvet cover, bed sheets, and pillow cases to be changed every 2 days. I left a tip and a note stating that I needed everything to be changed. Came back to the room late at night to discover that nothing was changed and I could find my hair on the pillow cases and bed sheets. So the lady took the tip and did nothing and I found that to be unprofessional. I had to call housekeeping at 10 pm at night to change everything. They really need to be on top of it when it comes to cleanliness

title: Location the biggest selling point
desc: We stayed at this hotel for a week in January. Its location is perfect and within walking distance to Chinatown and hawker centres as they are a short walk away. If visiting in the rainy season, it is actually possible to walk from the hotel to the Amoy Street Food Centre almost completely underground! Pros: Location, large comfortable bed, large windows, food options close by, safe/secure. If arriving in the evening like we did and just wanting a quick meal without any fuss, there is a shopping mall called 100AM a few metres away that has a food hall upstairs. There is also a bakery across the road that opens very early/late. We didn't have breakfast at the hotel, instead we picked up some of the delicious bakery foods daily instead. Spacious bathroom which has a huge window

title: Flawless
desc: I booked a Carlton Club Room. First of all, I was allowed to check in early upon arrival at 10am. I was just going to drop my luggage but they offered to let me checking in early. I was very happy with that offer. When I was taking wefie with my mobile phone outside the executive lounge's corridor, someone working inside the lounge (i apologise for not knowing this gentleman's name) walked out of the lounge and approached us, offered to take pictures for us, it was really kind of him. The bellboy delivered luggage to our room soon after we get into the room. Service provided by the employees in this hotel is just so efficient and helpful. Room itself is clean. We also get complimentary 2 pieces laundry, mini bar and snacks. Last but not the least, we get to check out

title: Extremely comfortable
desc: Great central location . Rooms very well equipped and bed comfortable. Excellent bars and facilities. Carlton Club definitely worth it. Lovely decor and spotlessly clean. Staff attentive and helpful. Very quiet oasis. Will stay again

title: Great location, accommodating and good service
desc: The hotel's location is great. Walking distance to Tanjong Pagar MRT station and a few bus routes on the main street. Opposite the hotel you get a grocery store and many food markets. Further down the street, there are pubs and cafes. You can find cheap eats to luxury dining within walking distance of this hotel. Service was good upon check-in. We requested for a late checkout to accommodate our evening flight and they were very nice about it. Check-out was slightly busy and messy but service was still good. Room was a good sized. Pretty spacious and lots of sitting space. There was a separate bathtub from the shower. Hot water and pressure is great. Overall cleanliness was good. Bed was firm and comfortable and love that 2 pillows were given. Gym was small but sufficient. The

title: Rodney is the men! :)
desc: Just came for a drink and I have to say this: Rodney is a great and nice men! I will take a room at Carlton next time I come to SG. Thanks for everythings Rodney :) You know how to receive people! The view is awesome

title: Great hotel, location and service
desc: We stayed here on a short family holiday and could not be happier with our stay. Staff goes beyond their way to help us. Rooms are modern, clean and comfortable. We travelled with our 3 year old and everyone was so nice and helpful with everything we needed. The food was really good everything we tried was delicious. The pool area was perfect for our little one as they got a shallow area. Location was great too as there are many restaurants and bars in the surroundings. Special thank you to the staff at the breakfast restaurant and concierge who were super nice and helpful. Definitely recommend this place for family trips or business.

title: Great hotel in the business district
desc: I stayed here for a week long business trip. It is ideally located and walking distance to to Tanjong Pagar MRT station as well as several eateries (went to the food court in Amara/100AM Mall a couple of nights - the place was clean and the food was good). Location-wise it is perfect for business travelers. The streets are quite busy during the day, but are deserted during the night, so walking around the area is quite pleasant. The room was well maintained and nicely furnished. In room dining menu is a bit lacking and a bit pricey, but the food is fresh and very tasty. The staff are all courteous and always greet you with a smile. All in all, it was a great hotel. Not giving it an excellent rating due to the lack of a hand shower in the toilet.

title: Nice business hotel, spacious rooms
desc: Although little off the city center the Carlton City is not far away from anything really. Rooms are fantastic and stunning view towards downtown. Walking distance from Chinatown. GreAt service and efficiency. Ordered a coffee at the roof top at 29th floor which has the best view of the sea and the busy Port of Singapore. Great breakfast. Pool area outside for cool relaxing.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Have just returned from a short stay in Singapore. I must say I actually booked this Carlton hotel by accident but it turned out in our favour. On arrival we were offered a free upgrade by the hotel in return for a later checkin. On this occasion it really was not a big deal for us to leave our bags and walk around for a while, so thatâ€™s what we did. Food on the Club floor although not overly fancy was good with different choices for the evening cocktails.and canapÃ©s ( more dinner food). Breakfast was passable and enough to get you through the morning. Location great but in my opinion most hotels are close to something or MRT. Our room was comfortable and very clean, the bed better than most I have encountered in Singapore. The best thing about this hotel without a doubt was

title: Great Staycation
desc: Was there last weekend for a birthday staycation with my partner. The hotel was clean, cozy but with minimal facilities. Staff were friendly. Gym towels could have been replenished more frequently as sometimes there is, sometimes there isnâ€™t. Although we didnâ€™t managed to check in earlier, I would like to thank the team at Carlton City for the surprise cupcakes in the room! :) Many many F&B establishments around the corner, especially Korean/Japanese. We enjoyed our stay and would surely recommend to others.

title: Smart phone for guests and a very clean room
desc: We stayed one night on the way to Australia. We arrived at around 11 pm , friendly staff great welcome room on 14th floor lovely views very clean and the room had a smart phone for guests to use which was very handy , free calls to UK and free internet access and sat nav. Defo will stay again

title: Everything 100% right.
desc: Location, check in, concierge, room, beds, cleanliness, service, Sky bar, lounge bar and lounge cafÃ© was better than expected, even though I had read TripAdvisor before choosing this hotel. All staff I met can provide excellent service in any aspect without overdoing it the way they usually do in Asia. Also with humorous approach. I love it. Hotel is close to MRT station, only a 2 min walk. Will come back for sure.

title: Great Stay
desc: Nice place to stay, friendly staff, nice room & clean. First hotel that I went providing service with free mobile phone during our stay. Location is good, easy to get food and near to shopping mall. The only thing make me not happy during my stay, I had to wait quite long and queue for breakfast. At the end I dont take my breakfast at the hotel and had to rush to my office. Hope you could increase the space to cater more customer during peak hours.

title: Carlton ought to be more carefull about who uses their name!
desc: Staying at the Carlton City Hotel - Singapore was somewhat of a disappointment. Overall they are far to expensive for the room provided. Front desk tried to pull some classic BAIT and SWITCH, they first make sure they take the full payment and then say "Ohhh the room you booked we don't have any left (yes - we did let them know we'd be a late check in), I guess that just opened the door to "ohhh they won't care/mind" and no it wasn't like we'll upgrade you it was like we'll move you into the right room tomorrow, if it's free. I thought this was a Malaysian kind of party trick, but now I see it in Singapore, and I thought Singapore took a dim view of this kind of behaviour, bringing them into disrepute. Fortunately we moved to another Carlton, which was much more Ritzy,

title: perfect stay!
desc: we are three girls who booked the triple room. the hotel located not much far. we took a taxi from Changi to there cost SGD30 (midnight). the opposite store where you can found plenty of cheap food! the restaurant surrounding there are Korean and Japanese.

title: Amazing
desc: Would greatly like to thank you for your hospitality during our stay in Singapore. Thanks for all your staff for their amazing service and special thanks to Suqi at front desk for offering us an amazing room upgrade to room 2521, and for insightful tips on maximizing our short trip with her useful recommendations. The room was great, the bed comfortable, the breakfast delicious, and the staff extremely attentive. Will definitely recommended your hotel to friends and family, and looking forward to staying with you again in our future travels. Thanks. Kind regards, Alex & Daniela

title: Good stay
desc: The service could be better, but the hotel infra is excellent! I stayed there nearly a week. Excellent location, walking distance to Chinatown. The room was very comfortable and had a lot of space. I went on a business trip.

title: Short Stay at Singapore
desc: The Room is big for Singapore Hotel, clean and good ammenities The hotel is near Tanjong Pagar MRT, and a lot street food nearby.. We arrived at midnight and the check in procedure so fast, so we can take rest as soon as possible.

title: Great Hotel in Ideal Location
desc: On checking on we were pleasantly surprised to be offered a free upgrade to club room giving us access to the club lounge and breakfast included. Our room was excellent and well equipped with free WiFi. The breakfasts in the club lounge were fabulous and set you up for a days sightseeing in this wonderful city.

title: Great first time !
desc: This was my first stay here, after changing from my usual hotel nearby, due to their service on the skidsâ€¦ First impressions on arrival; super friendly concierge team, keen to assist, full of smilesâ€¦and on leaving some great banter with the lads!!! Inviting bar/lounge to left as you enter (which I made use of during my stay â€“ slick service) Reception team professional and a great welcome from Gregory (hope I got his name right â€“ young lad with the glasses). In addition, worth a mention is Cherry, who had to put up with me leaving my key either at the office or in my roomâ€¦ Room first impressions â€“ no fancy frills, fresh, clean, everything in working order. Took me a while to figure out the quirky light switch, but all goodâ€¦ Bathroom, spacious, shower cubicle decent size (my

title: Excellent location, exceed expectations, value for money
desc: -Three minutesâ€™ walk from Tanjong Pagar mrt, same line (EW GREEN LINE) as Changi Airport -Building by itself, no shelter, umbrella provided -24h supermarket just across the street -Two minutesâ€™ walk down the street to many restaurants n cafe, some open till 6am -Two min walk to 100AM shopping mall -Close to Chinatown (4 bus stops away) -Huge check in / check out / reception / lobby area, short waiting time, less than five minutes -One cafe and one bar at hotel lobby -Outdoor swimming pool at level 3 -Corner room on high floor, non-smoking, good city view -Free in-room wifi, coffee making machine, tea sachets, bottled water, bedroom slippers, bathroom amenities -Towels and bathrobes provided -Minibar is not free although no price list -Huge bathtub, mirrors, study table,

title: Good location and experience
desc: The location is convenient near the mrt, bus stops, restaurants, malls and cheap hawker food. lifts were faster than ordinary. public spaces and hallways were clean and tidy. It was a good sized room and was always well kept and being cleaned everyday. all necessary appliances were available in our room. temperature controls and switches were accurate and conveniently located. We liked the extra seating/counter space by the window. The toilet didn't have a bidet and the shower head had dirt stain on it so we didn't use it

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Good location, close to mrt, Chinatown, restaurants. Room on the 14th was good, nice shower. WiFi was good. Couldnâ€™t get premier league on tv. Breakfast was OK but go to the egg station if you want hot eggs. We had the seafood buffet one night. Was good but I had a bad stomach that night? Probably due to the huge amounts of food I ate. The mrt is just up the road maybe a 4 minute walk. The concierge helped us loads. All in all a very nice stay for our first time in Singapore. The pool was good and the gym also.

title: Disappointing stay. Hotel needs work.
desc: 1. Mildew smell in room and mildew bad in the bathroom/shower area. (see pic) 2. Breakfast is bad. Food is always cold no matter what time you arrive. Food quality and selection is very poor. McDonalds is higher quality :( 3. Claims to be "eco-friendly" but Laundry keeps putting every individual item in its own separate plastic bags. I've requested them not to, but they still do. (see pic) 4. Frequently bothers you even when "do not disturb" light is lit. (3 times on a Saturday when I was feeling ill) including a phone call from a "manager" who made sure to tell me three times that he was calling from the "club level". I'm not staying in a "club-level" room and have no access to the club level, so I'm confused about that. 5. Did not change linen for the first 3 weeks I was in

title: Good business hotel - except for the gym
desc: Great location, effective service, very good value rooms. All in all, a proficient hotel for business trips. However the gym really could be improved - it's only big enough for two people, and these days a treadmill, home multi-purpose rack and a lone bench really aren't enough to qualify as a "gym". The breakfast is way overpriced, but that's typical of hotels in Singapore. Otherwise, overall my experience was good and I'll stay there again.

title: Great Location for the City
desc: I usually stay at hotels in Suntec City/Marina Square area but on this trip I opted to stay walking distance from the office - and this hotel was just right... The room was smaller than hotel rooms in my usual area but the location more than compensated for the room - which I spent little time in - mainly sleeping/bathing. The lounge served breakfast and also snacks and drinks in the evening, which most definitely met my needs !... and fantastic views too from the lounge terrace. I would recommend the club rooms at this hotel. Oh and the pool was great for an early morning swim before work!

title: Nice Stay
desc: I did a lot of reading prior to choosing Carlton City Hotel. There are similar reviews for other hotels in the vicinity. I chose Carlton City for value and reviews. One thing that stood out was an adjustable thermostat. I like the room cool and the AC worked very well and was adjustable. I was given a room on the 18th floor. The staff were very professional. The room was spotless. The bed was comfortable. The location could not be better. I am used to staying on the outskirts of Chinatown. I will likely make this my new go to hotel. Also, the coffee kiosk there is delicious and so are the pastries.

title: Super Nice Room, Great Price
desc: I got this room as a hot deal (only price is shown, not hotel name) for about $150 (tax included) Hotel is very nice and in a good spot for walking around the city. I was only there for one night, so I did not get to spend too much time exploring the area around the hotel, but public transport is close and lots of food options nearby. Nice rooftop bar is a little pricey (like the rest of the city) and the bed was the most comfy I had in 3 weeks touring around Southeast Asia. The room is not very large, but has everything you need and a great shower. You can even take the in-room cell phone out with you and use the data for free while touring around the city, Super handy tool. Great value for a short or long stay. I would return!

title: Always a pleasure
desc: I have stayed at the hotel twice, once just after it opened and once more recently in April. On both occasions the staff have been very helpful and services have been excellent. The hotel does not appear stretch or super busy, even though it might be. The rooms are large and the location is close to a small mall, a larger mall, and a metro station. It is in walking distance of Chinatown and hop-on/hop-off bus stops.

title: Good location but overall lacking
desc: Stayed for a week at this hotel and throughly appreciated the location, close to China Town and the MRT at Tanjong Pagar however we were overall disappointed with small issues at the hotel. The room was large and comfortable but paying $8:00 Singapore for a can of Tonic water was over the top. When the Manager was approached he did not even try to address the issue and we were ignored by him for the rest of our stay. Breakfast was over $30.00 per person per day which was buffet style and not value for money. The concierge staff were however always ready with a smile and willing to assist.

title: Great location, very clean!
desc: The location was only a block from the MRT and just down the street from many different options for food. Rooms were very clean and comfortable, staff was friendly. Would recommend this hotel. The only down side was that the hotel did seem a bit humid inside even with the a.c. on, but that may have just been due to the weather.

title: Nice Family Staycation!
desc: My husband booked a Deluxe room for two nights for my birthday celebration and family staycation. We were given a room on the 21st floor overlooking the port/sea, double bed (all three of us fit nicely) and shower instead of bathtub (not a problem). My two year old toddler loves the window area as he could sit and stand to play with his toy car while enjoying the view on the platform by the window. Overall, the room and toilet were kept clean and tidy within the duration of our stay. Bed and pillows were comfortable, and water pressure for our shower was good too. Breakfast wasn't included during our stay so I can't comment on that. The pool was a good size but it's beside the restaurant on Level 3. But my toddler loves the pool. We were given complimentary parking coupons for

title: Friendly place
desc: I stayed in this hotel for around 2 weeks and it was paid by my sponsor, which all three parties were aware of it. Yet, the staffs and very nice and it made the stay very wonderful. They donâ€™t charge you for kids (am not sure what age but mine was 5 years old) and with extra $20 they provide you breakfast.

title: A Very Nice Hotel
desc: The rooms are very nice, comfortable beds and the usual amenities. I very much like the seperate shower and bath and the room was always kept very clean. The location is good for both business and pleasure but isnt the most central but thats not a massive issue as the train station is right behind it. I only had a couple of small issues with the water pressure being a little noisey which meant you could here noise if someone was taking a shower in another room and also the master light switch wasn't so master, i had it flick a couple of switches before going to bed. The pool and gym are quite decent and the breakfast was very nice. There is a restaurant, a lounge bar, a sky bar and a cafe in the hotel which were all very nice. Overall a very good hotel with friendly staff.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Hotel has a nice design and is perfect located. You need aprox 15-20 min walking to Marina Bay Hotel. In case you do not want to spend money on taxi I recommend Grab. Taxi in general is cheap and Grab even cheaper. You also have a metro station 3 mjn walk from the hotel. By metro you can reach any point and it is the cheapest option. Breakfast is alright. For a 5 star you would expect a larger choice but overall itâ€™s good. They have great coffee in the lobby though. Staff is friendly and welcoming especially the bell boys. I recommend this hotel.

title: Great value, amazing breakfast
desc: Stayed here for a 3 days on business. The hotel is nicely located, rooms are new and clean. Breakfast was amazing. So much seduction for a very reasonable price . Highly recommend if you are in town for business and donâ€™t want to stay with all the tourists at the sands.

title: Good stay
desc: When we arrived at 3pm and a room wasnâ€™t available for us until 10pm. That said they provided us a room to shower in after a long flight and provided a complimentary upgrade to a club room which more than compensated for the inconvenience. There was a Handy phone available to use with the room which included data which was really useful and helpful whilst we were in Singapore. The room was really nice, the only issue we had was that there wasnâ€™t many sockets to charge devices. The staff were really attentive and helpful and overall we really enjoyed our stay.

title: Best Business Stay
desc: Fantastic hotel. When you enter the lobby very peaceful atmosphere. Luxury is not compromised. Swift check-in. When I entered the room on the 18th floor it was wow! Normally all rooms have narrow corridor to enter the room but this one was very nice and the whole room decor was superbly presented. Spacious, ultra comfy bed and a really nice feature chair to relax soon as you walk in after meetings. The writing table was excellent. Very fast wi-fi which is free. The bathroom is superb, white marble tiles. Tub and shower. Rain shower was excellent. Very nice bathroom amenities. Ironing was easy, bathrobes were very comfy. I ordered in-room dining on my first night, delivered on time within 20 mins and food was yumm! The hotel is reasonable priced and I booked direct on their

title: Very good hotel in convenient location
desc: Stayed 3 nights in a deluxe king room. Good-sized room (high ceilings made room feel bigger) with a very comfortable king-sized bed and a nice city view (we were on the 8th floor). Upon first glance the room seemed very clean and luxurious. However the carpet wasn't so clean (as evidenced by the dark soles of our slippers which were worn only inside the room) and the binder containing the hotel info was cracked. Air conditioning worked great (very important in Singapore!), and it was very useful to have a local mobile phone at our disposal. Bathroom was spacious with separate tub and large shower stall. Unfortunately the water pressure for the sink faucet was quite weak and the toilet seat didn't appear to fit the toilet very well. Location is great - subway is only 2 minutes

title: Bad service, shoddy room
desc: Arrived late at night, no king sized bed available so I have to have a twin bed. Room is pretty worn, very much not worth it for the money and not a very convenient location for the business district.

title: A great mistake.
desc: We really loved our stay in this hotel. I have been to Singapore many times and wanted to stay in The Carlton. However, when booking I chose the wrong Carlton. I arrived at the hotel and was mad with myself for my mistake and asked if there was anyway I could change the booking. The Duty Manager went out of her way to do all she could to rectify my mistake. After calming down. I decided to stay with this hotel. The Hotel staff said, you will love it here and they wasnâ€™t wrong. We had a Club Room and made use of the lounge. This is a great city hotel. Location is great, MRT 50 meters away and China Town a mere 15 min walk. So many places go eat and explore and If you want to go Central itâ€™s only 2 stops on the train. So I highly recommend this hotel. Perfect for a city visit

title: Great for weekend trip
desc: We stayed here for a weekend trip. The location is great, close to the subway and a short taxi ride to Marina Bay. Room was very clean with a big comfortable bed and breakfast was very good, lots of choice.

title: Wonderful stay wonderful staff wonderful location
desc: I visited Singapore in May as a special birthday for Mum Stayed at this fantastic place with clean rooms and lovely staff The breakfast is amazing Location is very central close to the MRT and even the touring hop on hop off bus , lots of eating places to choose from The concierge staff are amazing helpful people All contributed to a fabulous stay They even sent cake to the room as a special gesture The only thing to make people aware is while booking on websites, not included is 7% tax and 10% service charge so the final figure you pay will not be what is displayed on the websites But overall I would highly recommend staying here

title: High estandads in the city centre
desc: Business hotel in the hurt if the financial city. Very big rooms with excellent amenities. Good city views. Very clean and quiet. Breakfast buffet is excellent with Asian and continental options. Gym is small but well equipped beside the pool. Nice bar to have a nice drink. I will return back. For sure.

title: Great hotel
desc: Very nice hotel. Lovely room very clean and well appointed. Bed v comfortable. Breakfast fine. Stuck to continental breakfast but enough choice. Staff super friendly. Fairly central in Chinatown Highly recommend.

title: Decent business hotel near CBD
desc: I stayed at Carlton for a 2-day work trip. It's centrally located, walking distance to Duxton HIll (plenty of restaurants and bars) and an MRT station. Taxi ride to the central business district is also inexpensive. Rooms were decent and the staff very helpful. The only complaint I had was that the cleaning staff didn't do a good job (tables were dusty and used coffee cups were not replaced). I brought this to the attention of the management who assured to look into it. Nonetheless, a positive experience overall. Would certainly consider staying there again.

title: Great for a night
desc: Hotel is conveniently located next to tanjong pagar mrt station. The room was spacious and the toilet was lovely. A lot of eateries nearby. Just a short walk away from Chinatown. Would definitely come back again!

title: Wedding Hotel
desc: My husband and I chose this hotel due to its proximity to our wedding restaurant, The Blue Ginger. We arrived early, and we were very surprised that we were allowed to check in early. We were greeted by a helpful staff member, Faizal, who brought all our bags up to our room quite promptly. The staff member at the front desk, Bernice, was also very helpful nd friendly throughout our process of checking in. The room was nice and spacious, and the toilet was relatively large. I like the idea of the bay window, and the long panels of mirrors along the foyer as these made the room look so much bigger but still retain the homely feeling. We loved our stay at the hotel! It is within walking distance from Tanjong Pagar MRT, and there are lots of good food places nearby as well.

title: Nice hotel shame about the hospitality
desc: Convenient hotel for business in Singapore. Rooms new and comfortable. Layout is nice with coffee shop and bar on ground floor. Recommend the onion bagel for breakfast takeaway. No welcome greeting in fact they couldn't have been less excited to see me. In fact this continued for the stay. John Cleese in fawlty towers would have given a warmer feel. Second evening I went to get a glass of wine at 7pm. I was told by the "manager" of the trading floor bar...Sorry we are fully booked...??? Honestly there was no one there. Japanese guests for the football...I only want a glass of wine. So I trundled over to the coffee shop. Sorry we are closing. Just a quick cup...NO! I could go on... On another note and important one...if u like going to the gym forget this hotel. There is room

title: An almost perfect staycation
desc: The hotel is a perfect stay. But I'm disappointed with the service provided. Perfect because it's Clean, good facilities, nice rooms. Disappointed because: 1. Asked for bottle opener, concierge promised to get for me but didn't. 2. Reception was messy, and receptionist is not friendly 3. Called concierge to make a request but the staff asked me to call the receptionist myself when they could have transferred the call for me. No answer from reception despite multiples call. 3

title: Actually Great. Cheep for the area and well featured.
desc: I stayed at this Carlton for a few nights on a business trip, It is a very well featured hotel and was actually a bit of a highlight. the room was modern, well lit and featured a beautiful bathroom and great views into the city centre (up Maxwell road) The hotel has a sky bar on its top floor which is a real (if expensive) highlight. its a good place to take in a lovely view out toward the ocean. Breakfast features an impressive spread and a high standard of service in the hotel's restaurant.

title: Stay away if you're a nursing mom
desc: Just checked in here for a business. The hotel is new and well designed. Given the reasonable room rate, it's value for money. However, if you're a breastfeeding mom who needs to pump milk for her baby, do not stay in this hotel. They do not have a freezer for your milk stash or ice packs. The concierge could only shrug that they only have a chiller, not a freezer. It was though it was the first time anyone ever asked for one - well, they're new anyway. If it weren't for the freezer issue (how hard is it to get one?!), I would have probably given this hotel maybe 4 stars. Oh and one side of the bathroom wall is made of glass, so do not share a room with someone you're not close to! Lol!

title: Another quality stay!!
desc: As promised, I said I would be backâ€¦ Hotel was abuzz with World Cup fever and the team made an effort to entrain all at the downstairs bar, with big screen TV with great sound â€“ thanks! Again, super friendly concierge team, keen to assist, full of smilesâ€¦ Reception team professional and a great welcome from all. Always a nice touch when one is remembered by name on returning to a hotel â€“ this happened with a good few of the team. Again, room â€“ no fancy frills, fresh, clean, everything in working order. Still struggling to figure out the quirky light switch, but all goodâ€¦ Bathroom, spacious, shower cubicle decent size (my pet hate being 6ft 4 and expected to squeeze into a shoebox)â€¦ This time ample towels, as opposed to last time where there was fewâ€¦ Slight hiccup with

title: Happy and impressed stay
desc: Was around for a day staycation and feel this is among the best for room coziness and privellges. Choose the club room and u will not be disappointed , you can watch tv from the bathtub and have club privilege! I m happy with my stay and will be back again .

title: Convenient location and comfortable accommodations.
desc: Our Carlton Cityâ€™s room was not available even though we had advised our arrival time. However, they made a commitment to provide it before official check-in and give us some ideas about how to capitalize on the waiting time. Its location close to the Chinese neighborhood make it very convenient to visit this Singaporeâ€™s attractive area. It also is at walking distance, if a bit long, from the famous Merlion Promenade. Accommodations are modern and amenities nice and comfortable. In short, a hotel covering business and tourist needs.

title: Comfortable hotel in good location, but just ok for 4 star...
desc: We stayed in Carlton Hotel for three nights in July 2018. Good location nearby bars, shops, restaurants, MRT station, only half an hour walk to Gardens by the Bay. Lovely pool and good gym. Rooms are modern with nice decor, very comfortable bed, clean ( definitely 5 stars for housekeeping), and with all you need ( ironing facilities, minibar, small office desk, safety deposit etc.) Also in the room package you get a free mobile phone with unlimited data, local and international calls, and you can take this with you on your sightseeing. We asked the hotel for prearranged transport from the airport to the hotel, we were informed that it would be an additional cost of 90 SGD, which we thought was very expensive so we took a taxi at the airport instead for 25 SGD. We also requested

title: Extremly nice
desc: Carlton City Singapore is about 30 min drive away from Changi Airport. Very kind Bellboys took my luggage and bring it inside the huge and well designed Lobby, which includes a Bar and a Cafe for Snacks. The Reception staff is very helpful and nice and work very efficent and fast. My standard room was on 23rd floor and had a free view to a part of the city trough a whole glasfront. I had a large Bed with down Pillow and down alternative Pillow and finest linen. Many options to change the lightning. Free Coffee and Tea. The Highlight was the Smart Phone which is free to use during your stay. You can take it out of the room and have internet connection. The bathroom was also nice with a large bathrub and a rainshower. All in one a really nice Hotel. Thank you Carlton City

title: Nics hotel but a couple of minor things to mention
desc: The room we stayed in was very comfortable. The first minor thing was we got one towel only, twice in our stay. The second was only two teabags each day and that horrible powdered milk, again only two. The cheapest fleabag motels at least give you three or four and milk and a couple of biscuits. Then, the second day, the bed cover thingy was not replaced each day but we found it, scrunched up into a drawer. We refolded it to make the place neater. The ac was noisy and kept us awake. We bought milk and bikkies and the rest was fine, except the dining room is too small and we had to wait a long time for an expensive breakfast.We stayed in the uptown Carlton before and will next time, but not this one.

title: Unbelievable service!
desc: This could be the best hotel weâ€™ve stayed at worldwide. Well positioned between the business district and Chinatown. Exceptional and friendly service from everyone at the hotel! A special mention to Peter Chua, front office manager who made us feel like royalty! Thanks Sheree and Dave (New Zealand)

title: Outstanding location and room!
desc: Really enjoyed my stay here in early July. Only stayed 2 nights but definitely the best accomodation of a 3 week trip and certainly the best accomodation I have had in Singapore. Room was very large for Singapore standards and had a terrific view. Staff very friendly and it is in a great location. Will be my #1 choice for my next Singapore visit.

title: Good modern clean Hotel in a good location.
desc: The room was spacious, the bathroom particularly well laid out. Staff were friendly & helpful. The location was great... within walking distance to China town. A $6 taxi fare gets you into most central spots. The hop on hop off bus ðŸšŒ leaves just up the street. It was a quiet hotel where you sleep soundly & recharge your batteries for another day of exploring the town. ps the Barman makes a mean Cosmopolitan!

title: Had a pleasant stay in the hotel. Best service from Ravean
desc: Nice hotel, stayed here with my sister. In our room there was a complimentary phone(Handy) to use during our stay with 1TB mobile data. So we could easily explore the city by using google maps with the free phone. Ravean, a hotelworker who helped us with our luggage, was really kind and gave us the best service. Would definitely stay here again.

title: great stay!
desc: stayed here for a staycation with some of my friends and we absolutely loved the place. location was very central for us and was surrounded by alot of good food! we also had a ncie view of the city. would recommend this for a short getaway

title: Great - recommended
desc: I stayed for three nights for a work trip - close to our local office. I really enjoyed my stay at Carlton City. The room was comfortable and quiet. Nice greeting on arrival, and easy to get my room. Nice little inclusions. Breakfast was well served. Definitely friendly staff. This was a great experience for a work trip hotel. Best option for Tanjong Pagar I reckon. This is a recommend from me, especially if your office is on this side of town. Good trip, great service, well done Carlton City.

title: Great location
desc: Stayed here for three nights, big clean rooms, excellent location near Chinatown. Has a nice pool and roof bar. Very friendly helpful staff. Would definitely stay here again. Reasonably priced too for Singapore

title: Nice Stay in the Centre of Singapore
desc: Stayed one week here and the rooms were very nice with very helpful staff, could not find any fault with my room. As I was broke in DB&B I found the breakfast good but the dinners were very limited in fact after two nights there was nothing else on the menu that I could have and therefore had dinner outside the hotel.

title: First Class Hotel in Singapore
desc: If you want to stay in a first class hotel with great location, Carlton City is the best choice. It is near to Chinatown and Maxwell Hawker Center. It is also a few walks away to Anson Road which is a business district and home to some global companies such as Yahoo!, Tata Consultancy Services, Fuji Xerox and a lot more.

title: 5 star hotel with excellent services
desc: Location's smack in the middle of CBD with plenty of amenities surrounding the hotel. There's a mall next to it, hypermarkets, cafes and restaurants within walking distances. Hotel's clean with great staffs. Special thanks to Ravean and Harun from concierge for their excellent services and assistance throughout our stay there.

title: An excellent hotel to spend our anniversary
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to specially mention 2 staffs which played a pivotal role in ensuring that our stay at Carlton City Hotel Singapore is excellent. Firstly, I would like to appreciate the Front Office Manager Mr. Peter Chua for his good service and ensuring that me and my girlfriend are well taken care of throughout our stay. I am thankful for the service staff to have given me a complimentary room upgrade knowing that I am spending my anniversary at the hotel. Upon our check-out, Mr. Peter Chua smiled and greeted us and did a follow-up service to see if our stay was good. The second service staff which provided excellent service would be none other than the Food and Beverage Manager Mr. Kesh. Mr. Kesh provided good service through directing his staff

title: Two dwy stay on way back to Perth
desc: Great hotel, clean great staff good views ftom room. However we booked 2 rooms 6 months in advance with a simple request of tge rooms being close to each other. Not even the same floor. Breakfast room a little small so waiting time to get into breakfast. Overall a great stay.

title: So great...
desc: This is a good choice for a hotel if you are heading to Singapore. The rooms are clean and the beds are very comfortable. Staff are polite and helpful. Location is fantastic, next door to china town. All in all, good value for money.

title: Hotel City Good location and very good staff
desc: Hotel a city slicker. Good location good service and very nice staff. Rooms very pleasant have all you need, the glass in the middle of room splitting the view of bathroom may not suit all but blinds work out well. The view was excellent from room 1916. Breakfast was minimal but very tasty. The club lounge was very nice and was worth experiencing. Would stay her again.

title: Wonderful staying
desc: Ive been in carlton city hotel for my holiday in singapore and Iâ€™m really satisfied about my stay. Breakfast was in average a good choice of differente food. Check in was fast and room was spacious and illuminated but we asked for a higher floor when we booked unfortunately at the moment of check in only two bedrooms were available at 10 floor. Faizal helped us so efficiently about our problems with ferry and such a good person! Really good location not noisy definitely a quiet area to stay !

title: Amazing bellboys
desc: Firstly, I would like to express our gratitude to Salam and Ravean, who work as bellboys at Carlton City. From the moment we stepped into the hotel, they immediately made us feel extremely welcome and were very hospitable. My partner had heat rash, and Salam came to the rescue by taking us to a polyclinic AFTER his 12 hour shift. Never have I experienced such amazing service, and I want to express my sincere gratitude to him. Additionally, whenever we walked past in the lobby, Salam and Ravean would constantly check in on how my partner was feeling. Please pass on this feedback. Other than that, the hotel room was very clean and spacious. However, a gripe we had was with the quality of housekeeping. There was a situation where our towels were obviously not cleaned properly,

title: Excellent for both business and leisure
desc: Modern, clean hotel at the heart of Singapore's CBD, a short walk from Chinatown, and a very short walk to the nearest metro station (Tanjong Pagar). It is very easy to get around Singapore from here - whether by taxi or metro. Close to the tourist hubs at Sentosa, Clarke Quay, Gardens by the Bay, and Orchard Road and also very convenient for business travelers. A taxi from the airport costs 20 SGD and takes 20 minutes. There are plenty of pubs and restaurants within walking distance. The room itself was spotless and very comfortable with all the trappings of a modern luxury hotel. There is a nice rooftop bar as well. WiFi is excellent. Breakfast is quite spartan and could be improved. The staff are not very friendly which is why I have dinged them a point. Overall, an

title: Allmost Everything is 5 star
desc: Allmost everything was as we expected. The only thing i can complain abaut, is low waterpressure in the shower ( allmost 1 hour to fill the bath tup ) and very steap price for breakfast buffet. But all in all a nice hotel, in walking distance to most attractions in singapore

title: Incredibly convenient location and helpful staff.
desc: Great location, clean rooms, free Wi-Fi, excellent and helpful staff (Salam, in particular), fantastic decor. Located near the MRT station and plenty of restaurants in the area. Very comfortable and luxurious hotel; the rooms are spacious and the amenities are really good.

title: Good location with close proximity to MRT and restaurants
desc: I spent two nights there. Tanjong Pagar MRT is right behind it. There are many restaurants along Tanjong Pagar especially if you like Korean and Japanese food. I had a twin room which was spacious and clean. The staff are friendly. I would definitely come back to stay.

title: Excellent Hotel and Location
desc: I highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a place to stay in a very lively area. Very friendly staff. Shout out to Ravean who helped me at the entrance, very nice person, good conversationalist!!

title: Great Holiday
desc: Iâ€™ve stayed here on business before and chose this as a location for a family holiday and was not disappointed at all. Just fabulous from the moment we arrived to the day we left. The rooms were clean and spacious the staff were friendly and attentive all throughout the hotel. Breakfast was excellent and lots to choose from.

title: An Excellent Business Hotel
desc: Iâ€™ve stayed here many times on my frequent trips to Singapore and it is a fantastic business hotel. The service is friendly, fast and efficient. Their standard rooms are large for Singapore standards and are specified to a very high standard. There is a â€˜handyâ€™ phone and a good working desk with large windows with good views. WiFi is fast, free and reliable. The bar on the top floor is great to chill out with a beer and a book and the Club Lounge is very good with very friendly and efficient staff. In terms of location, it is next door to Tangong Pagar MRT station. It is across the road from a hawker centre, fruit markets and a grocery market. You can walk to many bars, restaurants and you can easily walk to Chinatown. The pool area is nice and decent enough for doing laps.

title: Great place to stay
desc: Really great hotel in Singapore. Rooms were large, clean and included all necessary amenities. Staff are very friendly. Breakfast is very good. I recommend getting the club room package. They serve really tasty finger foods and a range of free alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks.

title: Beautiful hotel well worth a stay
desc: Hotel is well located in the city and the bar on the roof is well worth a visit for the views over the city.The rooms are very well kept and staff are so polite and helpful. Only 5min walk from china town and 15min walk to Boat Quay.

title: Good Businessman's Hotel
desc: Got a reasonable deal online. Asked for a quite room and got one of the quietest hotel rooms ever. Very grateful for that. Offered an upgrade which I took up and was not disappointed as we got a view and it probably contributed to the quietness Decided to include breakfast against my better judgement as hotel breakfasts, especially the large hotels, are Always Bad Value. So was this. Noting wrong with the food or service but I eat a light breakfast and SG$20 is very expensive for what I eat. Negatives were ...really confusing light switch system. ... cold air con with little control of the room temperature ... deposit (for incidentals ) required you to make a credit card payment at check in and make a 2nd payment at check out with a promise that your 1st payment won't be

title: Gem in heart of city
desc: For a hotel in the heart of the business district, the room was surprisingly big and very comfortable. What stands out most was the service staff from the front desk and concierge. specifically concierge Xavier, and Duty Manager KimSang. they assisted me in all ways they could due to some error in my reservation made thru a third party app. On top of that, concierge Xavier knows the country inside out. overall I'm very impressed with Carlton City Hotel.

title: good size room
desc: its in town and walking distance to Tanjong Pagar Mrt with all cheap food and stone throw away. This hotel was clean and new. The toilet are 100% very clean. The toilet are very well plan and layout. And the marble tiles were evenly placed. the only thing is missing was the electric commode, other than that is perfect. The room is big and cosy come with a big window, day and night curtain are very effective. the malay guy in the check counter will make ur day when you check out, unfortunately i can't remeber his name.

title: Fantastic
desc: Great Hotel with fantastic staff who are very helpful. Handy location to local food outlets and MRT nearby. Room was very comfortable with all services you will ever need. Concierge staff were very knowledgeable and always willing to assist you

title: Great Services
desc: I would recommend Carlton City Hotel to those who are looking for a convenient location and great service. I stayed during the F1 weekend, and despite a full house, the service was still very efficient and above all impressive. I was especially touched by their concierge Xavier Kok who went out of his way to find my jacket which I lost in the taxi and he called the taxi service and had the driver delivered back to the hotel. He was attentive, patient and above all reliable with a great sense of humor. Thank you Xavier for making my day and my stay a very memorable one!

title: Great location.
desc: The hotel was clean, functional and conveniently located in the city with many nice restaurants nearby. MRT was close so that was a plus. One thing I must say is the Concierge Manager named Xavier went out of his way to help me. His service was the best Iâ€™ve experienced in all hotels Iâ€™ve stayed at. Recommend this hotel for anyone.

title: A week in Singapore ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¬
desc: We have enjoyed our stay at Carlton City. Its very close to the MRT and that made getting around the city very convenient for us. The hotel is also quiet which is a plus for much needed rest after a day out touring. It is worth a visit again and again.

title: Top hotel choice in Singapore
desc: Stayed in the hotel twice and will definitely be back every time I visit SG. Very comfortable stay, clean and has everything we need. Room space is adequate and gives a good window view. Very friendly and helpful staff! I booked two rooms during my most recent stay and wanted them to be linked to each other if available. They were very accommodating in helping me on the request. Hotel is only few minutes walk from the MRT station. There are plenty of popular Japanese and Korean restaurants down the street, a Japanese mall next to the hotel, and Chinatown is only further down. Very accessible and super conveniently located!

title: Long weekend in Singapore
desc: We inadvertently booked a trip to Singapore during a Formula 1 race weekend. Despite that, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Carlton City. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, we very much liked the neighborhood of the hotel and we were able to easily get on Singapore's subway from the hotel. Our concierge, Xavier Kok, was especially helpful, booking some tours for us and advising us on the best ways to travel to our destinations. He always remembered us by name each time we approached the station and always went above and beyond to help us. If we make it back to Singapore, Carlton City is where I want to be!

title: Good service
desc: Great service and attitude from the staff here. Requested a birthday surprise for the bed to be filled with rose petals and was pleased with how attentive the staffs were to my request. One of the staff called Xavier even made the extra effort to help me look for the present which i wanted to get for my girlfriend. Well done!

title: Good value for money hotel
desc: Used this hotel for a week during a business trip to SG. Nice room with comfortable bed. Nice separate rainshower and also a bath. Breakfast is buffet style and caters for all tastes. It can be busy in the morning, but I was accompanied by a colleague, so had nice table. Also tested the small swimming pool in the evening, which I really liked. The service oriented staff make this nice hotel. It is close to the MTR metro station which is just one stop from the business district.

title: Feeling home in the heart of Singapore
desc: After having lived 8 years in Singapore our first return to the Lion City was very pleasant because of our stay in the Carlton City Hotel. Located in the middle of the CBD (Business District) the hotel is extremely convenient to travel to all corners of the island by taxi, bus or MRT. The staff of the concierge service, reception and various bars and restaurants are very friendly and efficient. The rooms are spacious, comfortable & quiet and well equipped to cater all your needs. The breakfast buffet offers a variety of Asian and Western cuisine, a good cup of coffee is served at Tuxedo in the lobby and for evening drinks the sky bar offers a spectacular view. Not the cheapest hotel but surely value for money. We will be back next year!

title: Right at the heart of central district
desc: food, drinks, transport, taxi, MRT, all within few steps away, with 3-5 mins we even get to walk by foot around the whole shenton way on Sunday, quiet and so different from weekdays, we walked to Chinatown as well, can go there by bus or MRT or foot

title: Professional business hotel
desc: My impression is they taking their guest seriously. I remember when i checked in i have another people, one bus full of stewardess & pilot but they dont keep me on the waiting. They are treat all the same. The lobby is fancy, i like all the detail. The breakfast is adequate. The room is extraordinary. It has big bed which i am alone so i just use one side of the bed. Then it has bathtub which is perfect. I usually use it when i end up my day after long day. Its super easy to get a taxi because the staff was very helpful. I wouldnt mine if i went to singapore then drop in this super cozy hotel again. Oh yeah dont forget the pool, i took a dip on my first day. ðŸ˜‡

title: Singapore visit
desc: My 2 daughters and son-in-law stayed for 3 nights in October .We visit Singapore to see our son, daughter-in-law & new granddaughter several times a year. This was their first stay and they loved the Carlton City Hotel. The location, the beds and the staff all combined to ensure they enjoyed every minute.

title: E Venison
desc: Great Location just 10 minutes by underground to Orchard Road. Surrounded by trees, gardens and amazing restaurants. Located by the very vibrant China town. Rooms very clean with every amenity and comfortable bed. The rooms were completely soundproof and the views over China town was amazing. I would definitely return to this hotel the staff were so helpful and charming.

title: Clean, great location, nice hotel
desc: Hotel's just 5min away from the MRT station, prime location with supermarket and mall nearby. Amenities were sufficient and the pool was clean. The room is spacious and concierge were friendly and efficient. They even provided a bottle of complimentary wine as I was celebrating an anniversary.

title: Amazing, awesome, enjoyable, impressionable, outstanding!
desc: My 2 day 1 night stay in Carlton City hotel has been wonderful, not only because it was because it was the anniversary of my boyfriend and I but because the concierge staff did not fall short from making it an even more romantic experience. The hotelâ€™s location was also really great as there were many restaurants and bars within 1 minute walk from the hotel. When we checked into the hotel, I was very warmly greeted by the concierge staffs, Mr Xavier and Mr Raj, which I really appreciated. It really made me feel very welcomed. Next, I had actually made a mistake in my booking by choosing two separate beds instead of one queen sized bed for my stay. Knowing that I booked the room for my anniversary with my boyfriend, Mr Xavier very kindly changed (or upgraded) my room for me

title: Classy, Comfortable and Central
desc: We stayed at the Carlton for 3 nights at the start of our holiday. It is a beautiful hotel in a great location with amazing staff. The wifi is great and the rooms are spacious. The showers in the bathroom are wonderful with a rain shower and bathtub! There is an MRT station less than a kilometre away, and the markets are not much further either. If youâ€™re up for a walk, itâ€™s about 2.5 kilometres to the Marina Bay Sans shopping district and sky garden. The mini bar isnâ€™t well stocked, but you have the offer of bother Graffiti and the downstairs bar if youâ€™re a tad thirsty! The hotel has a lap pool, 1.4m deep, located next to the gym, it is a great place to unwind. We didnâ€™t have breakfast at the hotel, but the restaurant looked lovely, and if the service downstairs at

title: Excellent service, location and rooms
desc: The staff were some of the friendliest I'd ever met, why the concierge Raj even offering to let me hop in the taxi he already got to go to the airport for free. The lounge was open frequently for great views and free drinks including liquor and beer, as well as a hearty breakfast,and the rooms were very modern, clean and well-made. Free laundry service and minibar were appreciated. Right next to the metro and all the sights so it was extremely convenient.

title: Comfortable biz hotel
desc: Stayed for 3 days, 2 nights for a work trip. Stayed in an Executive Room which had a spacious room, and large double bed. I was on the 18th Floor, and the room was well-lit by natural light. The bathroom was modern, clean and bright as well. Lots of small Japanese and Korean restaurants nearby, and China Town is about 15 mins walk away from the hotel. Good hotel staff service overall. Did not get to use the gym, only the pool, which was quite nice. Small but does the job for a short lap swim.

title: Singapore Stay
desc: The Hotel was very nice and the Staff was really friendly. Very Smoot Check in and Check out process. Room was very tidy. Hotel is centrally located. Bathroom very very clean and there was a very nice City view from the Room

title: Wedding visit
desc: I stayed in the Carlton City while in Singapore for a family wedding, and was extremely happy with the accommodation. Ideally situated virtually steps away from the tube station, as well as pleasant walk from Chinatown, this business class hotel is of a very high quality. I would happily stay here again, and would wholeheartedly recommend to any others.

title: Awesome hotel experience in Singapore
desc: Didn't expect much thinking it was a mid-range hotel (closer to 150$/nite). We were taken away with the great reception as soon as we got off the taxi. Bellboy helped unload and took our bags away swiftly. Entered the beautiful lobby and was very impressed with the value we got with what we paid. Rooms were clean and bathrooms were spacious. My five year old enjoyed the huge windows. The complimentary breakfast buffet was absolutely impressive considering what we paid. We were so spoiled at this hotel and thought all Singaporean hotels must be this great. Tried another hotel to save a few more bucks, but realized we should just stick to Carlton City.

title: Great place to stay in Singapore- will be back
desc: Stayed here for two nights Located within walking distance to the MRT, nearby shops, supermarket and loads of food options and nearby parks. Great dinner options and bars nearby Room was a good size and modern. Bed very comfortable. Modern amenities Buffet breakfast selection was good- preferred the general breakfast area vs club level Swimming pool was cool in the morning but nice outdoor setting. Lots of deckchairs Staff very helpful and very friendly with young children. Easy to get a pram and out of the hotel with plenty of flat areas outside/ramps. Taxi ramp out the front of the hotel really enjoyed our stay- would definitely stay here again

title: nice hotel and very helpful concierge.
