desc: The hotel is very nice with good breakfast and helpful concierge. Raj, at the concierge was very welcoming and helped us a lot for taxi booking and advising places to visit during our stay. Great location and very convenience.

title: Nice, clean hotel in a good location
desc: Stayed for two weeks at Carlton City in Tanjong Pagar in November. The hotel is located in a good area and is very accessible to public and private transport. Special shout out to the hotel's concierge team, Xavier, Raj and Rayven for the excellent service and attention. We felt well taken care of from the day we arrived to the day we departed. Rooms are clean too. Although we faced some issues during check in, the issues were solved fairly quickly. Breakfast was ok, but could be better. Pool is clean and fairly underutilized. Rooftop bar is worth checking out too for the nice view.

title: Excellent place to stay in the centre of activity
desc: The service at the hotel is super excellent. The rooms that I stayed in had a beautiful view. Do ask for the higher floors. The even numbered rooms have a good view of the old harbour area, container port and sea. There is a very well placed â€˜built inâ€™ seat by the window to sit and enjoy the view of the setting sun. The 17th storey room I stayed at had a better view than the 6th as the hotel next door was blocking the view. The safe is well placed for accesibility and easy to program. The bathroom is lovely with a shower cubicle and a tub. And for the exhibitionist there is a "See no Touch" window with a blind. I always wondered why they have such windows between the bedroom and bathroom. Toothbrushes, soap and shampoo is supplied. The beds are comfortable with pillows

title: Best concierge ever!
desc: We've been to Carlton City twice with a brief interruption. At the first arrival in the morning unfortunately no early check-in was possible. But the concierge Salam took care of us so cordially that we still felt comfortable. At the second arrival Salam greeted us so warmly and like family members that we felt at home from the very first second. People like Salam make the difference today, his friendly and heartfelt nature has made Carlton City the most recommendable hotel in Singapore for us! By the way, the rest was perfect, no complaints.

title: Excellent place for a comfortable and carefree stay
desc: Warm welcome on arrival, then tips and advice on how to get around Singapore by the attentive concierge people. Lovely and helpful staff. Don't miss the breakfast buffet. Excellent restaurant with fresh food at all times of day. Rooms are spacious heavens of calm and quiet, with comfortable beds, soft white linen and sparkling bathrooms. The atmosphere generally is happy, lively, never feels crowded. We enjoyed our stay.

title: Good rooms. Hit and miss breakfast
desc: I stayed a few nights at the Carlton City and found the rooms were good. Clean and well appointed. Tea/coffee making in the room. Luxury towels and bath robes. Good size desk for working and free internet. Very good. The buffet breakfast was hit and miss in terms of food quality and quantity. If you go to breakfast early, the food is fresher and it is easy to pick what you want. At peak times, food items run out and you have to wait around and ask for replenishment. If you go late to breakfast, the fried food is dried out. So pick your breakfast time carefully. The hotel location is close to an MRT station which makes it easy to get around. Also a reasonable number of good restaurants near by. A plus is a supermarket (Fair Price) across the road from the hotel. Great if you

title: A case of â€œJustâ€
desc: Letâ€™s start with the positives and there are a few. Itâ€™s in a good location, not close to shopping but the MRT is only 2 minutes away and so everything is very accessible. The rooms are better than average, not large but have everything you need. The pool whilst not huge is good for a lap swimmer and the surrounds are ok. The club lounge has a nice outside area which is very unusual for club lounges and is a benefit. So why am I saying â€œjustâ€. Just because of my experience and it is mainly service related. The check in was unwelcoming, unfriendly and I even offered not to check in. I had a confirmed booking and they did not want to honour that. The room card they gave me did not have the right access and the wrong password for the WiFi. Not disastrous but just not good. The

title: Awesome Concierge @ Carlton City Hotel Singapore
desc: I have been staying at the Carlton City Hotel regularly lately on my business trips to Singapore, each stay ranging from 4 to 6 days. My recent trip turned out to be an eventful one, and it was all due to my carelessness in leaving a box containing 20 of my books when I alighted from a taxi to check-in to Carlton City. When I realized it, I told the Concierge about the matter. The whole Concierge Team got in to action to help me recover the box of books but unfortunately, the taxi driver has sent it to the Taxi Officeâ€™s Lost And Found. I needed to deliver the books that evening to my students who have ordered the book from me much earlier, failure to do so will have caused them to be very disappointed. Despite the Taxi Office been closed at that time, the Concierge Team took

title: Comfortable and convenient
desc: Good service and convenient location. The room is spacious and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance to Tanjong Pagar MRT station and several shopping malls, even to Chinatown. Food options are aplenty, and it is easy to get vegetarian options too.

title: convenience location, warm hospitality
desc: this hotel located near MRT so it's very easy to go around Singapore, also the room is nice, we also try the swimming pool and fitness room. Please send my thank you to Mr. Kim Sang, Jane, Cherry and all the reception staff for the warm hospitality and always welcome us with sincere greetings. I stay there from 8-11 Dec they also have christmas tree light up for charity, such a brilliant idea for christmas event. Thank you Carlton City Hotel. Looking forward to come back there soon :D

title: Great stay
desc: Good quality bed, linens, towels. Very clean room, cleaned daily. Very fast internet. Convenient or grocery stores across the street if you need something. Very close to a subway stop - Tanjong Pagar and the famous Michelin star chicken rice by Mr Chan.

title: Mr.
desc: Enjoyable hotel for business trip. Near to MRT station, Plenty of restaurants nearby, Chinatown at 800m distance, reachable by walking easily. ATM right in the front of hotel, reachable by crossing The road, same as a small shop when needed for buying something. Fresh fruits market nearby. Clubs at distance of 600-800 meters. Good position for enjoyable stay. Clean rooms, access at pool, gym, nice staff. Sky bar at 29 floor offering a great view of the city, and , at third floor access to breakfast buffet. A hotel to return.

title: Excellent business hotel with a very convenient location
desc: I have stayed here on multiple occasions during 2018. The hotel staff are really amazing and the rooms are always clean. If you are a long stay customer there is discounts available and a special weekend treat... Some of the hotel staff are now considered as friends, keep up the great Service...

title: Excellent hotel staff
desc: The service in the hotel is impeccable with the staff being thoughtful, accomodating and patient. They anticipate your needs and is concerned that you enjoy your stay not just in the hotel but also in singapore. Special shoutout to Xavier, Ali, Gopala, Samal, Charice and Ravean who have all been so helpful and made my teamâ€™s stay less daunting.

title: Good choice
desc: For us, the location was what mattered the most. The hotel is on MRT green line, which makes it really easy to get to the airport. Connections by bus were very good - taking us to the VivoCity (entrance to the Sentosa Island), downtown etc. Chinatown is within a walking distance, and there are many good restaurants around the hotel. We had our breakfast at the Tanjung Pagar Food Centre, which is literally across the street. Staff were cordial and friendly, and facilities seem to be well maintained.

title: Wonderful staff...
desc: Leaving the Carlton City this afternoon to continue our Holiday however our stay here has been very enjoyable and relaxing. The staff are very warm and helpful however the Concierge and Greet staff are very sincere and genuine in their assistance. We feel they have really looked after us and our needs to ensure we made the most of our time with them. Nothing has been too much trouble and they have been consistent in every interaction. This is my first time in this hotel and I would definitely return.

title: Contemporary cosy room
desc: A modern comtemporary room, decent room size for a couple. I like the concept of having the complimentary smart phone usage for room guest as its ideal for foreigners so we doesn't need worried about data. Cleanliness of the room is OK but personnal myself who have a sensative nose might get allergy due to the carpet dust inside the room as well on the outside passage way. Location of the hotel is a short walking distance to LRT, Cafe and bars. Overall my stay and rating here are 7 out of 10.

title: OUR STOP OVER HOTEL IN ASIA
desc: We found this skyscraper hotel to be quite good with friendly helpful staff. Room was nice with an extensive view towards the sea ( over Container port). We advise looking into membership of their club- to gain access to their club restaurant on the 26th floor. Leanne was very good as was her colleague in the club. Nearby restaurants were mostly Asian as we were on the edge of Chinatown.

title: Great Rooftop Bar
desc: My wife and I stayed here a few times while relocating to Singapore. Now that we live here the rooftop bar on the 29th floor has become one of our favorites. It has a great view, reasonably priced and the staff is warm efficient and friendly. Zi-Min, Joel, Rodney and Davin always greet us like close friends. Their service is top-notch. There are many other cool bars in the area but this is one to where we consistently return. Highly recommended.

title: Opposite Chinatown and the gay district
desc: Great location with local bars and clubs. Plus thereâ€™s a neat pool on the 3rd floor. Itâ€™s around 5 mins walk tot the MRT. However I would recommend taking a taxi from the airport as the train is slow. The Maxwell hawker food centre is excellent and some great dishes and very little cost. Staff at the hotel were friendly and polite. Only thing that was odd was the window between the bathroom and bedroom????

title: Affordable Hotel in the city
desc: Carlton City is well based within walking distance of 2-3 minutes from Tanjong Pagar MRT station and many restaurants are available at near distance. The staff were very friendly and greeted me when I enter and left the hotel. Price was really affordable and they have bath tubs in their rooms which I was pretty amazed because I had stayed in many more hotels at a higher price tag and bigger rooms which doesn't have a bath tub. Their bar at the highest floor was pretty decent, not really big. Drinks were alright. Never got to try their bar food.

title: Excellent
desc: The hotel met our expectation for 10 out of 10. The pros: 1) Asked a room on the high floor - received a room on 24 floor with amazing view (number 2421). 2) the room was well furnished including iron. 3) the hotel gives you a personal smartphone with unlimited 4g internet which is really helpful 4) the hotel provides a â€œhappy hoursâ€ starting from 6 pm which looks like dinner. 5) hotel is close to a subway station Tanjong Pagar (2 mins) 6) breakfast & dinner are tasty Cons: Difficult to think about I can complain :)

title: Carlton city hotel
desc: I accidentally booked into the wrong Carlton hotel in Singapore so ended up at this one which was located in the business district. The hotel itself is lovely, nice facilities and staff were good. The location meant it wasnâ€™t great for food places as most places shut early in the area but it was close to the MRT (10 min walk). I wouldnâ€™t stay here again just based on location but if youâ€™re on a business trip then yes itâ€™s perfect.

title: Comfortable
desc: The hotel was very good. Our room was quite big and comfortable. The bed was heavenly. The bathroom was, unfortunately, not very clean, but otherwise the hotel was quite satisfying. The service was excellent. The breakfast at Plate was quite all right. Very good minus. Look for more reviews by MulleEllum.

title: Great location
desc: Very nice hotel which was modern and clean. Super convenient for bars, shops, restaurants and MRT (Tanjong Pagar station) with friendly and very helpful staff. It was only a 10-minute walk to Chinatown which was a bonus. The rooftop bar was nice as it was outdoor and the pool area was small but never busy and you could relax with ease. While the hotel is not in a well-known tourist area like Orchard Road, in many ways that was a bonus and we would still recommend it as it ticked a lot of the boxes.

title: Nice location and good beds
desc: The Carlton is located next to China town and just accross the street is a passage with many restaurants. The breakfast is average. On the topfloor is a nice rooftop bar with a view. Rooms are spacious and clean.

title: Anniversary
desc: The staff is friendly. They even have a basement carpark for guest. You just have to ask for exit coupon every single time you wish to exit from the carpark. They gave a 2 cup complimentary cupcakes for our anniversary celebration

title: Decent hotel, average food
desc: The hotel is decent. The rooms are clean, no gripes there. The buffet breakfast is very average. The food is quite often cold. Scrambled eggs, cold. Baked beans, warmish. Grilled tomato, stone cold. This was the case in several occasions so I stopped eating there. Room service options are very limited, I just used deliveroo. The location is decent, close to MRT and walking distance to plenty of locations.

title: Awesome stay
desc: I booked my stay at Carlton City Hotel to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday. This hotel is very convenient, short distance walk from the MRT station. There are also shopping mall, eateries nearby. I love the room as it is very spacious, comfortable king size bed, and very nice city view landscaping of the central business district. The hotel is able to offer me very pretty decorations in the room with complimentary cupcakes. The hotel staffs were very friendly, very accommodating my request with the surprises planned for my boyfriend. I would specially want to highlight to staff: Mr Xavier Kok and Mr Salam :) I must say that Carlton City is willing to go extra miles to bring happiness and satisfaction to every customers. My boyfriend and I love this hotel and we will

title: Nice club room experience!
desc: the location was perfect for my business trip, it was also in front of huge supermarket, is easy to get whatever I might need. I stayed in club room. the room was fabulous and super comfortable. I had good rest after exhausting business meetings whole day. The facility of the club room was also great, although I would say the "free mini bar" could contain something more like a club room, rather than just few cans of soda and chips. They provided more on club lounge, where we have access at any time during the opening hours. They offered more various delicious hot meals and drink (including wine etc) free for us to grab. But the thing is, with very pack schedule, I rarely have time or energy to go upstairs, and need some quick grab from the minibar - i am hoping that they

title: Consistent Great Service!!
desc: Good to be back â€“ consistent great service! From check in to check out â€“ excellent Room functional, clean with everything working just fine. Club lounge great to get away from the hustle and bustle and just chill and/or enjoy a sundowner or two. Great location â€“ in walking distance of the markets, and not far from great night lifeâ€¦ Again, only gripe is the tiny gym squashed into a room with no air-conditionâ€¦ surely there must be another area for the gym that can be used?

title: Only good things to say: modern, convenience, pleasant staff and first class service
desc: I stayed for eight days while working in Singapore -- I was in court for three days on a heavy trial and I had mountains of work. The hotel is brilliantly located on the edge of the business district towards the port. Only good things to say about the place, and I am generally difficult. The rooms are brand new. Comfortable bed. Well designed. Striking views over Duxton Hill on one side and the port on the other. Very quiet. I (over) used the executive lounge on the 28th floor, running my office out of there for days on end. Staff were brilliant, attentive and kind. Just so helpful and genuine. Food in the lounge excellent. My client and various witnesses came in and out of the lounge and were generously accommodated with drinks etc during meetings.

title: Perfect Location
desc: 24 hours supermarket just opposite the hotel and a food centre too. Local eatries around and MRT train is just 5 minutes walk behind the hotel. Gym is small but equipped. Hotel lobby lift carpet looks dirty though. Friendly staff and will surely recomnend this hotel to friends.

title: Flawed
desc: Stayed in this hotel a few nights with friends and there are many areas it can improve on. The walk in shower doesnâ€™t block water well so often times it gets the floor wet and slippery. The water tap control is too loose so when lifting to get water, the control handle falls down right away. Thereâ€™s squeaky sound on closet doors so it can be bothersome at night. The blinds not blocking the sunlight 100%. Always long queue for breakfast. They opened another room to accommodate more guests for breakfast, but the coffee machines outside was not turned on. Even in the main area, many time the coffee machines run out of milk. Ketchup is used up without refilling. Bakery food not great. Swimming pool no changing room. If I wear the disposable slippers to the pool, the chairs are very

title: Location and wifi were great
desc: Stayed for two nights for work. Great location. Great facilities. Wifi had good range around the hotel which was very ideal, no connection issues from the lobby to the sky bar and walking along the hallways. Walking distance to markets and restaurants. The room is very cozy, it has everything you need including a bath tub. Minibar could have been a little more filled but that wasnt an issue for me. Breakfast was ok, it had everything you can ask for in a buffet setting.

title: Zentrale grÃ¼nere Lage
desc: The whole concierge Team of Carlton City Hotel is Great Today I Met Haarun very friendly helpfull member sees the help needed before you know it yourself They help you with directions,best ways,best locations. Just fantastic.thanks for a Great Stay. ðŸ‘

title: Very nice clean and strategically located hotel
desc: We stayed 2 nights at Carlton City Hotel. The hotel is very close 2-3 minutes walk from the Tanjong Pagar MRT exit. Very strategically located and our fav store Don Donki Japanese supermarket is just 2 buildings away. Across the hotel you can also find some famous Ramen place. The room was modern, clean and spacious. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent Hospitality
desc: I stayed at Carlton City Hotel March 2019. Without doubt one of the favorite hotels I stayed during my time in Singapore! Upon arrival at the Club Lounge, we were warmly welcomed by the staff named LYANNE. She has a bubbly personality and highly motivated, really her face is a breath of fresh air. She has always been a reliable, honest, positive and diligent employee, her work surpassed our expectations. She deserves a raise or even a promotion. All respect for all the staff who does a great job here.In addition to the amazing food, service and accommodations, your prices are quite reasonable which made our stay even better.

title: Excellent service.
desc: The concierge, Xavier Kok, was extremely helpful and kind to me during my stay at this hotel and went above and beyond. Clean and sleek rooms, comfortable beds and a pretty cool view as well. I highly recommend a stay at the Carlton City Hotel!

title: Wonderful
desc: We checked in after 27 hours of flying and were whipped. We got to our room and there was a small issue. Even though it was the middle of the night the desk person (effendi) did all he could to help. The next morning, as we were staying for 3 days, the manager jumped in and changed our room, plus added no charge breakfast and club level for the rest of our trip. His name was Mr. Hardi and he did not need to do this. He was great. Overall the rooms were excellent, the food very good, and location fantastic. The price was resonable for the area. Would recommend.

title: Friendly, efficient staff, clean and bright.
desc: We visit Singapore frequently to meet up with our son, daughter-in-law and granddaughter. This last time we stayed in a suite, which was a very relaxing refuge from the humidity& heat outside. Rooms are very clean and bright which enhances the feeling of relaxation & a 'home away from home' atmosphere. The Club Lounge was quiet and comfortable & the pool clean. Effendi provided us with first class care & consideration, he is a delightful asset to the Carlton City Hotel. We also enjoyed wonderful coffee in the Tuxedo cafe . We look forward to our return visit soon.

title: Food Food Food
desc: Strongly recommend this place for tourist. Food eatries everywhere, need not worry that your stomach will go hungry. Tourist who want a taste of authentic singapore food can just cross the road to the hawker centre. Very centralize location, accessible to orchard, Clarke quay, chinatown, sentosa & etc within 15mins

title: Good but could be better
desc: I came early in the morning for check in around 9am, I paid 30$ extra for an upgrade with minibar complementaryand higher floor. Location, reception service, breakfast and swimming pool was amazing. There was no turndown service in my room and little flies in my bathroom. No 24 hours room service.I expected more for a 5* hotel.

title: Good business (class) hotel
desc: The hotel is relatively new and is near International Plaza and the far end of Shenton Way. I have stayed here several times since the hotel opened. The hotel remains fresh and in excellent condition. High floor rooms have better views but mostly any room facing east above floor 12 will have a good open City view. Beds are comfortable, but pillows are firm and foamy. Nice bed linen. TV, desk, wifi are all very satisfactory. Pool is a little bit narrow but 23m in length so suitable for serious swimmers if the pool has only 2 or 3 other occupants. Roof bar has good views, but wines by the glass are very limited. Immediate surroundings offer cheap eats and a Starbucks. Also other hotels with different food / bar outlets are close by. Room pricing is fair. Would I go

title: Great Stay
desc: Had a lovely stay here at the Carlton. On our arrival we were given an upgrade to a studio room which was exceptional clean and spacious. We found the staff were very helpful and went out of their way to help us with anything we asked for. Would definitely stay here again as the location is brilliant with the Raffles and Chijmes just across the road.

title: Has improved since it opened
desc: I left a review a year or two back, having stayed shortly after it opened. At the time I didnâ€™t think it rated as well as the Carlton on Bras Basah - but thatâ€™s changed. Itâ€™s a cosier feel, not as busy, has itâ€™s own roof top bar now which it lacked before. My main criticism would be the premier floor breakfast - it lags behind itâ€™s sister hotel in choice and quality - for example the 3 days i was there, no fresh fruit for breakfast, though the team said they would organise for day 2...sounds picky, but the standards and choice in Singapore and especially around food is so high, it is the norm to expect more! That said, Iâ€™ll likely stay here again next time I am in town. Itâ€™s in the central financial district, close to MRT (2 min walk) and the general area has had a lot of

title: Nice view
desc: Love the hotel bath tub. Nice view. Very nice to be at. So convenient. Love the staff and good check in and check out. Overall was good. Love this place so much.might be coming back soon. Good job nice place

title: Amazing service
desc: This hotel is convenient and looks after you very well, I have stayed there on 4 occasions this year and the staff will go out of their way to make you comfortable. The rooms are well appointed and spotless, I highly recommend and it is good value for money.

title: Great location
desc: I have now visited Singapore over 20 times now and stayed and reviewed all properties that I have stayed in. The Carlton City Hotel was the first property that I have stayed in which is located up in the region of China Town. Let's start by saying that I was very impressed with the location of this property because it was in a stones throw to all the necessities that I needed, a healthy choice of nice restaurants, supermarkets, laundramat bus stops and Tanjong Pagar MRT Station. The service and cleanliness within this property was very good, the rooms were spacious and a nice sizes pool and entertainment area. There is a gym as well.

title: Spacious room in good location with good mini bar!
desc: Very close to subway but taxi is more convenient Room is specious with good quality of mattress and pillows not too soft or hard, ensure that you can have quality night! Bathroom is specious with good toiletries. You will have both tub and shower! Minibar is the star - you have standard soft drinks with S.Pellegrino and Aqua Panna water!!! This for normal room Clean and enough space for swimming pool, the mall plunge pool is so comfy! Staff are very attentive with smile whenever youâ€™re around... We have not tried breakfast at the hotel as very close the Chinatown which is Korean and Japanese restaurants side... walking a bit to the maxwell food centre. Luckiest is we found Blue Ginger Restaurant- super delicious ðŸ˜‹ Opposite is super market you can find all you need

title: Good location, great service and one of the best beds I have ever slept on!
desc: I stayed at the hotel for 4 nights during a holiday trip. Location: The hotel is situated close the Tanjong Pagar MTR, it's a 3 minute walk. From there to Raffles is only 1 stop. The hotel itself is also close to several restaurants nearby and there is a 24/7 open McDonalds within walking distance. The rooms: The rooms are spacious and have a view on either the city or the harbour. In my opinion the harbour view is more beautiful at night, while the city view is nice during the daytime. Both are good choices. The rooms have a good rain shower, a blow dryer, ironing board and bath robes. The drinks in the minibar are complimentary which is also very nice! But the bed, I have stayed in numerous hotels around the world and this was by far THE best bed I have ever slept on. It was

title: MY experience with this hotel
desc: I stay for two nights in this beautiful hotel, Loved every bit of this hotel and my room which was 712. It was a fantastic short family trip in singapore. Would really recommend you guys to book this hotel for sure, staff is really nice and helpful. Concierge Raj was really helped while the check out time he helped me with my travel as i couldnt speak the local language, staff was so nice and very helpful. Go book this hotel to make your trip memorable. Thank you Guys.

title: Wonderful hotel
desc: I stay at this hotel frequently and cannot speak highly enough of it. The rooms are quiet, spacious and plenty of natural light. As for the staff ... they are wonderful. On my recent trip there I had a birthday, so I was treated to a care bear and chocolates at my breakfast table on the 28th floor. Then, at night, I was presented with a birthday cake and had "happy birthday"sung to me and then more cupcakes back in my room. The hotel staff are just so caring. I would not stay anywhere else.

title: Great place to stay for business travel
desc: I stayed at the hotel for 2 weeks. The hotel is just 2 minutes walk from the Tanjong Pagar train station. The property is well maintained and clean. The front desk staff was friendly professional and courteous. I was highly impressed by the front desk manager Peter Cui and his politeness to everyone. Always available for any issues. His team was very supportive and helpful to provide useful information needed to have a comfortable stay. My compliments to his team like sharifah, Kim sang and Ravean and others as well. My two disappointments were quality of laundry service and breakfast menu. The breakfast menu needs some changes and more options for vegetarians. The laundry service was quick but the cleaning quality was not very good. Overall, the ambiance of the hotel is nice

title: Amazing service
desc: We was staying at Carlton City and from check in to we left it was really good. Nice rooftop bar, nice rooms, to small gym for me but most things you can do if you have been in a gym before :-) But that thing that made our stay remarkable was Raj and his service!! Thank you so much! See you soon

title: Very nice hotel
desc: I stayed at the Carlton City Hotel for 4 nights during a business trip. Pleasant hotel with friendly staff. Rooms are great, breakfast reasonably good and location was good too. It came very close to a 5 star review from me but when comparing to some other 5 star hotels I have stayed at, I felt it just fell short a little in the details. Would definitely recommend it though!

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Had a staycation at Carlton City for the first time and it was a good experience. Rooms are clean, bed are comfy and generally slightly more spacious than other hotels. Many good food places around the hotel e.g. tanjong pagar food centre. Will return again.

title: great experience
desc: stayed in this hotel for one night and i thought it was a good hotel with good service provided in overall. the room was great and the bed was comfortable, though it was a little tough to adjust the water temperature of the shower, but thatâ€™s fine. i didnâ€™t really explore the facilities that much, but it was a good time chilling by the pool and though the gym is small itâ€™s enough to get your workout done. check in and checkout procedures were smooth, and i was allowed to extend my checkout time due to the late flight schedule, so thatâ€™s helpful.

title: What a GREAT Feeling
desc: In all aspects of good foods, great ambience and excellent service, they have them all. Particularly mention and applaud the following staff for their friendliness, acommodating and service with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the organisation. I certainly have most memorable and pampering experience which was made possible bt the staff. There are From Front Desk Peter Chua and club lounge staff Jackie, Mira, Atteqah, Kel and Julian not forgetting Jackson from Plate Restaurant. The hotel is centrally located and easily accessible to public transport / train station, shopping mall, F & B outlets, etc which there is everything of all ages. The Hotel has comprehensive facilities of a swimming pool, gym and restaurant. The room was clean and modern with plenty of natural

title: Inability to meet the client's needs
desc: We have booked this hotel for 2 nights in May, as we were travelling from Thailand. We were very unlucky with the flight, and there was a problem with the booking that resulted that we were not allowed on board that day. Imagine how disappointed we were to miss that flight. At this moment, being stuck in the airport of Krabi, I have contacted the hotel and was hoping that they would understand our situation and would agree to change the booking dates, so we can still catch up with our travelling later on. But to my disappointment the hotel representatives were not at all helpful. They offered to move the dates for a few days, but with the price that was 2,5 times higher than the price we have payed originally. When I asked if they could move the reservation to any other dates

title: Perfect business hotel, modern and well located
desc: Perfect business hotel, modern and well located, luxurious interiors and furnishing, great staff attention and hotel amenities. Good for a weekday trip to Singapore , near many bars, restaurants and offices

title: Comfy room and location
desc: Very convenient location and comfy room Good bed and swimming pool I booked no breakfast but itâ€™s near to china town. So many local restaurant and pubs are thereðŸ‘ the only one thing was the one of guy staff wasnâ€™t really friendly when I checked in.

title: Great hotel
desc: Nice and clean room. Love the bathtub as well. Helpful and friendly staff. Walking distance to MRT station and location is good too. Overall, great place to stay and will definitely will be back again.

title: Excellent Hospitality
desc: I stayed at Carlton City Hotel for a few days during my business travel. I would say, the experience that I got was incredibly something worth to share. Their level of service is just beyond expectation. From the concierge, to the reception as well as the check in process was just great. Special thanks to the concierge Harun, who has been so friendly and helpful during my stay as well as the Lady Manager named Sharifah who assisted and accommodate my request through out. Thank you to all who have attended me during my stay. keep it up.

title: Becoming a regular!
desc: My third stay here I think and its still a great hotel at a good price in a brilliant area. I've stayed in far flashier / more expensive hotels in Singapore but this is becoming my go to place for short stays in the city. The Tanjong Pajar area has loads of bars / restaurants so no need to take a taxi. The rooms are clean, modern, well thought out and just the right size. The hotel is also quiet - I've never been disturbed by noise and the staff are efficient and helpful. Beds are comfortable and the bathroom great. The cafe in the lobby does excellent coffee too!

title: Very good; not quite 5*
desc: Stayed over for 4 nights with work; two colleagues also staying hence the choice of hotel. Stayed in a club room; nicely appointed though not up the standards/size of previous club rooms I have stayed in previously in other hotels/locations. Club lounge was ok. Clean, friendly staff and some food. Not very exciting though. Breakfast is steep in price at $35 per day; included in club allowance. Pleased with that as would've been upset to pay that amount for what is a good, though not great, choice. Fresh fruit (tasty, though only 3 choices each day), egg man/lady, lots of warm choices. It was fine. Bar in lobby not big, but again friendly staff, and a good happy hour promotion on a pint of tiger. Decent; would stay again if chosen by colleagues, but will look around for

title: Nice big room and very good location
desc: Very close to Tanjong Pagar MRT Station and we can walk to Marina Bay also. The hotel is in Chinatown area which beautiful old building surrounded. Moreover it s very close to Maxwell food center, so we can easily try some local food there.

title: Spacious, bright room in excellent location with room for improvements
desc: Location: Excellent location located right next to the MRT. Walking distance to China town, CBD etc. Room: Very spacious room with a huge bed and lots of natural light. Loved the grand window allowing lots of sunlight to pour in. The bed was spacious & comfortable. The bathroom had both shower & bathtub facilities. The room was very quiet at night and you could only hear the neighbours when they were out in the corridor. However the lighting system was troublesome to turn off as the "Master" switch doesn't turn everything off. Cleanliness: This needs improvement. I sliced my foot from stepping on something sharp on the carpet, i don't think it had been vacuumed. The room was cleaned daily however felt the clean was superficial. Put my shoe bags in the cupboard, when i took

title: Best customer service
desc: Comfortable place, very central for commuting around Singapore. Excellent service by staff, Raj. If youâ€™re looking for a short relaxing trip with friends/family/solo, definitely check out this place. You wonâ€™t have to worry about getting to places.

title: Very Good
desc: For sure will stay in this hotel again. Have interesting feeling when swimming in the pool surrounded by skyscrapers. + good area + night burger on good level with room service + nice view even from the bathroom :) + nice bar on 30+ floor

title: Great stay!
desc: Two week stayed here for business and I absolutely loved it. Room: very spacious, has everything needed to get ready for business, safe: can only access your assigned floor aside from the common floors (dining, lounge etc) that was the cool part. Location: excellent and centralized; near to the MRT, walking distance from shops like fair price, seven eleven, several food outlets including McDonald, malls etc. View: excellent. Customer Service: excellent concierge service; a-few names I remembered who left a great impression were Ravean and Raj, there are others as well but can't remember theirs. Food: Breakfast was excellent but needs improvement on changing the menu maybe twice a day, for instance add two different dishes and removing two old ones from the menu. Breaking a

title: Better than I expected
desc: the location is very good Concierges were absolutely professional * Hotel room was neat and nice The staff were really helpful the manager agreed to change our room when I asked for it . The baby cot that they provided was one of the best my baby slept good. The only and only down side was the long check in I'm not sure why perhaps we arrived late at night and they said the cot is not ready and subjected to availablity although we have had emailed before we arrive. Any how the next morning things was much better and smoother This hotel was set more for busines and professional trips than family . Overall good and we will go back there.

title: Great hotel for your stay in Singapore
desc: Hotel very close to chinatown, great eateries close by, Korean BBQ just up the street was great value and very popular with locals. the Concierge Xavier Kok was so helpful with advice, Hotel is close to all attractions and hop off hop on bus,

title: Great location
desc: We took the train from the airport to City Hall costing $5 and just a short walk away to the hotel. On arrival we were upgraded to a premier room. The room was brilliant with a view over the city. The hotel is in a great location, walking distance from the bay area and plenty of food options just over the road. Two MRT stations are in close walking distance enable getting around the rest of the city. The pool on the 5th floor was good and an unexpected extra on a city break but great after a hot day out and about. Pool towels are available by the pool along with drinks and food.

title: Extraordinary service!
desc: Peter CHUA and his colleagues spared no effort to make my staying comfortable, they have provided excellent professional services! Including providing me with a book (loan) to read trying to beat my jet lag. Bravo again!

title: Great new hotel in excellent location
desc: Stayed here recently with a group of travel agents. This hotel is very centrally located in Singapore, close to Marina Bay and Chinatown, with lots of shops, restaurants and bars very close by. It's a fairly new hotel, so everything is quite modern and well maintained, and rooms are spacious and have all the mod-cons one would expect from a new city hotel. There is a rooftop bar and terrace with great views, and breakfast in the restaurant was delicious. All staff were extremely helpful and friendly, service provided was excellent. I would definitely recommend this hotel for any business or leisure travellers looking for a modern and well located property.

title: Need some improvements
desc: Have stayed here quite a few times now and there is no doubt it works pretty well. On the other hand there are some missing pieces as well. The gym is honestly disgraceful. It is simply TINY and extremely demotivating to be in there, it should be 3 or 4 times as big and with new equipment. And a proper AC as well. Also its a good thing there are good restaurants all over Singapore and nearby, as there is virtually no options in the hotel. All that said, staff is friendly and for business stays its fine, except if you need a gym...

title: Friendly Staff, Excellent Service but Can be Improved
desc: I had a staycation on weekends with my kids and it was super chilling. Booked the Deluxe Room and the kids love the existence of a bathtub. Room was spacious and the cleanliness, room amenities were thumbs up. Nevertheless, it would be good if there could be more variety of TV channels such as cooking & cartoons for kids. There is also complementary parking for hotel guest thus you don't have to worry about the charges if you drive there. We were greeted by a friendly concierge on duty. Location is great as it is nearby Tg Pagar MRT, 100AM mall & other neighbourhood shophouses. The 1.2m deep s/pool was big enough comes with also 2 wading pool (0.5m & 0.9m). However, the cleanliness at pool area could be better & improved. There were quite few spots of algaes around especially

title: Congrats for having a great staff @ Trading Room!
desc: I come by your The Trading Room occasionally for drinks. The lounge is cozy for relaxation and personal reflection. One particular staff always caught my attention. I must commend Mr Deven for his excellent service. He is always smiling and especially warm in his welcome. And I noticed he is consistent in his manner to anyone who visits the lobby bar. Such employee like him should not go unnoticed. Congratulation to Carlton City Hotel for having such good staff! Well done! Alan Chua June 2019

title: Family Friendly hotel in singapore
desc: Hotel located at the prime location, easy to access MRT and food street. It's convenience to travel to all attractions like Raffles, Chinatown, Sentosa, etc. Hotel has a nice view and value for money. There is a 24hrs Japanese supermarket near the hotel , can go there shopping if sleep at night. Definitely will come back for another time.

title: Great stay - excellent hotel
desc: Second stay for 4 nights. Friendly and helpful staff particularly Raj who works in the lobby. Great rooms, lovely breakfast and great 20m pool for those who train. Only improvement needed is for a bigger gym with more equipment.

title: Nice Hotel & friendly staffs
desc: It is a beautiful and clean hotel with indoor gym and swimming pool faccilities. It is also conveniently located near MRT station and most business offices. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. I had a good experience during my stay there for the last two weeks...Thanks and keep up! @Carlton City...:)

title: Excellent service rendered by staff
desc: The room, amenities and ambience of the hotel were certainly very welcoming. I would like to extend my greatest appreciation to Mr Xavier from the concierge department for being very accommodating to my request of having a post-proposal set-up in the room. He has plenty of ideas up his sleeves and the price quoted was certainly reasonable. You might know who to approach to now for future set-ups!

title: Best 5 star Hotels I had even stayed in many cities round the globe
desc: I stayed there for 2 nights and it is one of the best 5 stars hotel I had ever stayed. Good view on the 18th floor and room is very modern and spacious. Bed is conformable and soft.The staffs are so friendly and professional and very courteous. The staff Thran greet me by my Surname and make me feel a VIP quest when I pass the reception.As my room was not quiet ready I was treated to complimentary drinks on the Sky bar. The swimming pool is good and new gym equipment. Location is perfect near MRT and lots of eatery place around. Will definitely return to the hotel

title: Responsive to feedback
desc: This is our repeat stay in this hotel. Our first stay was very satisfactory. We like the location, a feel of the local neighbourhood and convenient with MRT station just next door, away from the hustle and bustle of orchard. On this stay, there were some initial hiccups. But the most important thing is the manner in which a hotel responded to feedback. Peter Chua, front office manager, was responsive and responsible. He investigated our feedback and updated us. And the issue was resolved. Peter didnâ€™t attempt to make any excuse. Essentially, the buck stops with him. Even the bellman doing the night shift (whom we canâ€™t recall his name) was also responsive. With such impressive team, Iâ€™m sure this hotel will continue to uphold its excellent customer service.

title: Have a great time in Singapore!
desc: It's one of the best trip in Singapore, I ever have been. The overall Carlton City Hotel was really very good. Especially, people in the reception and gate, were really nice. The name called Salim and Harun has served noticeably.

title: Comfortable, Clean and Good Facilities
desc: Positives: Welcoming staff and a comfortable bed in a spacious room. Each room is provided with a smartphone for you to use free of charge which is very helpful for internet access outside of the hotel. Hotel is close to 2 subway stations which run on different lines making transport easy. Negatives: Had to travel to most attractions however felt this is because of Singapore's geography and all hotels will suffer this. Breakfast was a little pricey but cannot comment on the quality as we never paid for it - There are many local cafes around.

title: Great Choice
desc: We chose this hotel for its proximity to Chinatown and easy access to public transport and it really fitted the bill. Our room on the 18th floor was spacious and well fitted out for our 8 night stay, with complementary minibar and mobile phone a added bonus. Good value for money, pleasant and efficient front of house staff and all the facilities you could ask for. Highly recommended.

title: Another great stay, thanks to the club team!
desc: My wife and I returns to this hotel every time we visit Singapore. Besides the great location as I'd mentioned before, we are very well taken cared of by the whole Club Floor team, lead by the ever-so-charming Jackie! The Club Floor was very busy during our stay, but Jackie and her team worked tirelessly to take care of all their guests. They did their best to remember the likes and habits of their returning guests, which is wonderful.

title: British Travellers in Singapore - 3 nights
desc: We considered so many hotels in Singapore and it took us ages to land on this one to cater for what we wanted. We considered the Mandarin Oriental and Marina Bay Sands... but after reading lots of reviews from regular travellers/business people we decided on the Carlton City, I think we dropped on. The Mandarin was miles out and the Marina Bay got poor reviews for rooms. The only positive was that pool - to say youâ€™ve done it. Carlton City was a great location to visit sites. 10 mins in a taxi to Gardens by the Bay. 10 - 15 minutes to Sentosa Island/Universal Studios. 10 minutes to The Long Bar at Raffles. Taxis were really reasonable. 15-20 minutes from airport. Good location for China town. I canâ€™t see what better location you could have to be honest as

title: Immaculate service, going the extra mile for customer satisfaction
desc: Went for a short staycay in August and was impressed by the hospitality of the hotel and staff, especially Xavier from Concierge who made sure that the guests and I had everything we wanted to prepare for. Room was nice and clean, great city views and prompt room and housekeeping service. Very gracious and polite crew as well, will definitely go back if I have a chance to!

title: Modern, immaculate and blingy
desc: The Carlton City is a bustling hotel on the edge of the central business district. So it's not in the most convenient location for most of the popular tourist sites, however, the nearby MRT station makes it easy to get around. Check-in was efficient in the very grand lobby. Elevators were fast and efficient. One difficulty we noted was that the keycards only allow access to the floor your room is located â€“ our party was split between two floors, so we couldn't visit each other's rooms without arranging to meet at reception. The rooms are furnished to a very high standard and are comfortable. The room TV didn't have the BBC World channel but we survived! The decor and cleanliness were of a very high standard. One amusing feature was the large picture window in the bathroom

title: Near China Town
desc: The Carlton City Hotel is a huge hotel, catering to masses of tourists. In its layout and decor it feels a bit cold. As most things in Singapore it is very efficiently run and clean. The staff is also friendly and effective. It is located near China Town and many local restaurants which makes eating outside easy. Breakfast buffet is a bit problematic, as it is crowded, resulting in a wait to get in and then to approach the buffet. The best experience was a Singapore Sling in the bar at the lobby area which was mixed perfectly and served with a friendly smile.

title: Two thumbs up for our staycation
desc: Excellent front desk service by Mr Peter Chua. We were in line for about 10 mins and, and he politely ask those in queue who came first as there were many other guest. He make sure he attended to guest fairly. We were told our executive room was fully book but he graciously upgraded us to a suite saying â€œcongratulations!â€ excitedly. Thank you Mr Peter Chua for everything and also allowing us to check in early and late checkout

title: Mr Tuan Tran.
desc: It was a pleasant experience from front desk service to lounge staffs and concierge especially Mr Raj, Mr Xavier, Mr Ravean and Jagan (bellmen). The services were exceptional, the room was great, location was excellent.

title: excellent stay
desc: Great location and an excellent stay. The room was spacious and comfortable, Thanking the concierge Raj for his excellent customer service, always ready to help and assist! Definitely recommend this hotel.

title: OVERNIGHT STAY IN SINGAPORE
desc: We arrived at the Hotel quite late for an overnight stay and were very pleased to be able to get a nice meal served to our room. The next day we went sight seeing and left our luggage at the Hotel for later collection. Again we arrived late, hot and weary from our exploration.We were due at the Airport in a couple of hours for a post midnight flight to Europe. On our arrival we were offered the use of a room to shower, change clothes and generally freshen up before the flight. We thought the Hotel facilities and the friendliness of the staff throughout were great, but the use of the room to freshen up before the long flight was absolutely outstanding!

title: Outstanding, yet again
desc: I recently had another long stay at the Carlton City. It was again outstanding. The staff go above and beyond to assist, the hotel is continually making improvements to food selection. I cannot speak highly enough of this hotel

title: Amazing experience
desc: Not sure where to start from.Everything from check in to breakfast to conceirge to housekeeping to ammenities provided was wonderful:))Xavier has been so helpful and excellent customer service provided by him.Face of Carlton:))Thank you to Xavier and the entire team for a comfortable stay and highly recommended to anyone who is visiting Singapore:)Would love to stay back again..Customer service at its best !!!

title: Jennifer Y. - Duty Manager
desc: Horrible experience. Condescending and unprofessional manner. Wanted to check out and quickly and made my way to the airport, but encountered subject staff that yelled at us for â€œnot queuingâ€ - we were simply enquiring if there is any express line for check out. So then we queued up, and people behind us from the same queue kept slipping to another one that got serviced first. So much for not having an â€œexpress queueâ€. The gentleman who was in front of me in the same queue had the same frustration as us, seeing people being able to jump queues and we had waited so long on the other hand. It seems that she picks which customers to serve first, not if they get in line first. When I finished check-out and asked to speak to her - as her manner was very impolite and

title: Duty Manager Jennifer . Horrid experience.
desc: Horrible service from the duty manager herself l, Jennifer Y. who â€œshoo-edâ€ us away from checkout queues. She speak in such demeaning way that we felt so uncomfortable and discriminated against. Even when we approached her, she laughed and continue being defensive and lectured us. We are paying customers, we donâ€™t pay to get lectured.

title: Great hotel and view
desc: Stayed at the hotel for 1 night, superb view.. very convenient and accessible to the MRT station.Friendly and approachable staff, very accomodating to our needs. Will definitely return here, highly recommended..

title: Business trip ...
desc: .... in recomendable place to stay in s quite central location. Interior not brandnew, however well maintained. Very friendly personnel, essy and fast check-in : check-out. Always happy to get back there.

title: Had great time staying here
desc: Carlton City Hotel is very near to subway station. The staffs are hospitable. Carlton Club Lounges are available from 6:30am to 11pm and donâ€™t forget to enjoy free drinks and cocktails there from 6pm to 8pm.

title: Loved it!!!
desc: This hotel is in a great location only a few minutes walk from an MRT station and about a 10 min walk from Chinatown and Maxwell Food Centre. The check in was seamless, the rooms are clean and spacious with great views. The rooftop bar is spectacular at night and Iâ€™d like to give a special shout out to Rodney, Joel and Zin Min for their spectacularly friendly service. Also the concierge whose name escapes me gave us some great tips on things to do and how to get there. This is not a negative but I highly recommended taking your own hairdryer as the one in the room had very little power or go across the road to Tanjong Plaza and pay $20 for a wash and blow wave at a salon. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Beautiful Hotel in a great location.
desc: Magnificent, modern Hotel located right on the edge of Chinatown with its shopping and innumerable restaurants and local eateries, only about 100 metres to the local MRT Station which gives easy access to the rest of the City. If you are looking at a location in the heart of the City, this is not the Hotel for you as it is on the edge of the Business District. We stayed in a Carlton City Club Room which are located on the 25th floor giving you great views. The Club Rooms are large and well appointed and come with a range of extras, of course, those extras do cost that little bit more. Staff are extremely accommodating. Rooms are spacious and well maintained. Mini bar and tea/coffee making facilities. Hotel has a good sized pool and facilities for children. Breakfast is

title: One of the best stay ever
desc: I checked in this hotel on the 31st for a one night stay. Upon check in, the friendly staff already handled my luggage very effectively and the check in progress is fast and clear. I requested a king bed and non smoking room but unfortunately that day left with king beds only on smoking floors. Astonishingly the room don't smell like cigarette smoke at all. Nice view outside the window .Very comfortable environment to rest in. The next day check out, me being forgetful left a big amount of cash in the safe and I received an email from duty manager, leroy an hour after. Very kind and honest staff indeed . Thumbsup, will definitely stay there for the next visit! One of the best experience ever for a frequent traveller like me.

title: Fantastic service
desc: We had a brilliant time. Food was great and with the humidity outside, it was a godsend being able to come back to the hotel and hop in the pool for a swim. In particular though, the service was outstanding. I lost my phone in a cab and a staff member, Raj- Concierge, went to extraordinary lengths to get my phone returned to me within the hour. Would thoroughly recommend!

title: Amazing
desc: Had an Absolutely amazing stay. Staff where so friendly and helpful. Rooms were comfortable and stylish. Rooftop bar had a great atmosphere. Great location and close to bus stops. Definitely recommend and would stay again.

title: Great place to stay
desc: This is the first time we have stayed at the Carlton City hotel and we will definitely stay here again. The rooms are big, the bed is comfortable and there is no noise to disturb your sleep. The buffet breakfast had plenty of options so we filled up for day. The best thing about this hotel though is the it is just around the corner from Tanjong Pagar station where you can buy a tourist pass for the metro. If you like to walk, China Town is a couple of minutes walk away. There is also a great range of eateries ranging high class steak houses to local eateries where you can buy a meal for SGD 5 - 6.00. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay.

title: Excellent service and super friendly staff
desc: We spent 9 days in Singapore and chose the Carlton City by recommendation. Experienced a very warm welcome by the reception staff, namely Ratna took care of everything and always had a smile on her face. We had breakfast a couple of times in the Carlton Lounge on floor 28 and again - all the staff was very attentive and friendly. Jackie, Lyanne and eyeryone in that team knew how to make you feel welcome. Clean modern rooms, attentive room maids - everything perfect. Located close to Tanjong Pagar MRT Station any tourist attraction or business destination is easy to reach.

title: Great Loacation
desc: Recently stayed here in a club room, which gave us access to the lounge, with a good breakfast and evening cocktails. The room was good with comfy beds. Excellent location just minutesâ€™ walk to Chinatown and Maxwellâ€™s the food centre. We unfortunately were not given the complimentary use of a smartphone as we were told it wasnâ€™t working which is a shame as it was would have been helpful getting around Singapore. Rooftop bar was very good the staff were excellent a big thank you to Zin and the other bar members (sorry canâ€™t remember the names) they made are stay very enjoyable. However, I will say there is very limited wine selection by the glass which was a bit of a let-down as you either had to buy a bottle which was expensive or cocktails which I donâ€™t really like and

title: Nice city Hotel
desc: Very nice hotel in a central location. Chinatown and the nearest MRT station are just a few minutes' walk away. The rooms are spacious and clean and the service is very friendly and accommodating. From the upper floors you can enjoy a beautiful view.

title: Great Location
desc: We stayed here recently in club rooms with family and loved the location of the hotel. It is close to Maxwell Food Centre, Telok Ayer, Tanjong Pagar, Marina Bay, etc. The rooms are small but comfortable, the staff are wonderful and the facilities are good and well managed. I would thoroughly recommend this hotel if you are coming to Singapore.

title: Great value business hotel
desc: Good location. Clean and well appointed rooms. Great bathrooms. Good service throughout. Much better than the Sofitel nearby. The Carlton Club is a good and useful space. Perfect place for a business trip to Singapore.

title: Lovely Hotel
desc: The rooms are in great condition and the staff is wonderful. Also, the location is perfect for sightseeing. I highly recommend staying here if you are going to spend a few days in Singapore or have a business meeting.

title: Carlton City Hotel!!!
desc: Ignoring the bustling shopping of Orchard road or the lively Clarke Quay, I stayed at this hotel 3 nights after reviewing a lot of reviews online. The hotel has been operating since 2013 but the facilities are still new and clean. The location is perfect, just a 1-minute walk to MRT with direct access to the airport and around 10 minutes walking to China Town. Large room with a beautiful view. Decoration and cleanliness are a very high standard. The receptionist and bell man are very agile and extremely enthusiastic. After checking in, I was given a small box of chocolates and 2 free vouchers for drinks at the rooftop bar, but unfortunately, we didn't have time to enjoy it. I will definitely stay here if I have the opportunity to return to Singapore.

title: Great hotel, great location
desc: Great rooms, great staff, great views. Location excellent, tube station 3 minutes walk away gives access to entire city. Chinatown 5 minute walk up the road. Clarke Quay only 10 minute walk away. Rooftop bar excellent but slightly expensive in comparison to local bars, but then again, you have the views and the quality expected from the Carlton chain. Breakfast was really good and food replenished regularly and the serving times fit in really well if you are on a city break and like a little 'lie in'. Loved the place, will certainly return in the future.

title: Xavier is a magician
desc: Last night on my way to Carlton City from the airport - rather jet lagged after a fourteen hour flight, I accidental left my jacket in the cab - containing a Mont Blanc pen which had very significant sentimental value. Luckily I had a receipt which identified the car and driver. When I woke this morning to discover my loss, I went down to the concierge desk with the receipt to see if they could assist. Eden was the first to very efficiently set to work on the challenge - and then Xavier leapt into action. Within three hours - Xavier had hunted down the jacket and pen personally delivered them to me in the club lounge (which is a serene place to work with a great view)... What incredible attentive service! Thank you Xavier (and Eden) for working your magic. I am so so grateful.

title: Excellent
desc: Carlton City Hotel one of best hotel in Singapore. All staffs are friendly behaviour and courteous. Especially conceirge Raj, he is very nice and helpful as well receptionist Angel and Hazirah are very cooperative and perfectly meets customers requests. Whenever next I come to Singapore, I love to stay here. God bless all staffs of Carlton City Hotel, Singapore.

title: Good position and high level of service
desc: The location is really good. I was here in business trip but together with my wife. Best position for the metro line. Good to stay also deciding to walk toward downtown. Nice places around for dinner and drinks. The hotel is a high quality one. All the team (reception, concierge, room make up) support you in a very nice and proactive way. A place to come back again. Not tried the restaurant but breakfast is a five star one. Grazie one day hope to come again. Ciao

title: Great welcome
desc: The welcome from the receptionist department is super, As hotelier myself, impressive! The belboy is quickly helping me with my luggage and ms. jennifer from the front desk is super friendly and warm. So i am going to stay here for 4 days and lets see hows my experience later

title: New and clean hotel
desc: Service is good, clean hotel, cosy bed and pillows, large window opens up to undisturbed views of surrounded buildings. Daily buffet breakfast was good however with limited choice despite constant top ups. This hotel is near mrt tanjong pagar and near to Maxwell hawker place.

title: Amazing staff, excellent stay
desc: Close to shops, food and transport - pretty much anything you want, our stay in this beautiful city was made even better by the wonderful staff especially Xavier (Concierge). From the moment we walked in he was so helpful and actually made our time in Singapore as wonderful as it was. Xavier truly went the extra mile and we can't thank him enough. Our room was great and so was the food at the restaurant. The lovely men who served us at dinner both nights were also amazing (unfortunately we didn't get their names but they were working 24 & 25 November 2019). Taking the hop on hop off bus (the stop was only 5 minute walk from hotel) we were able to get to all the major sites easily. Will definitely stay again.

title: A lovely stay
desc: This was a great hotel. While not new, it was in good repair, with pleasant and tasteful public areas as well as guest rooms. I think the only difference between our Executive Room and the more basic room was the free mini bar, which, while not stocked with alcohol, was still welcome. The beds were comfortable, and our bathroom had both bath and shower room, which is very rare these days; high and low lighting options were plentiful. The only thing the room lacked, in my view, were a few more hooks for jackets, robes etc. My first impression was that the room was small, but it felt well arranged, and the rather ingenious touch of having a glass wall between the bed and bathroom (with blind if needed) certainly left an impression of more space. On our first morning we failed

title: Excellent Stay
desc: A true 5 star Hotel in a top location. Spend 4 days here with my family and they all loved it. We had a lovely room on the 26th floor with a gorgeous view overlooking the harbor, this came with club lounge access which had an excellent selection of hot breakfast as well as a lovely selection of cold cuts and pastries with top class service from the lovely staff that attended to us (very sorry I forgot their names). When we needed recommendations for places to go and visit, Xavier and his concierge team were extremely helpful and gave lots of tips on where to visit. Raj and Eden were both very helpful. Graffiti is another must visit in the Hotel, a bar on the 29th floor that is open til late. Thank you for making this a memorable first family holiday! We will definitely stay

title: Helpful Staff
desc: I do like to offer my thanks to the Concierge Department, which includes Mr. Kok and Ravean. They voluntarily gave us service and assistance even without being asked. Their constant polite greeting let us feel the warm welcome.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Located in Chinatown Close to train & smaller shops Nice rooms Mini bar included in club room just soft drink,beer, Pringles Concierge staff and reception staff lovely Pool & bar nice Breakfast in club room lacking basics like bacon, had to ask for scrambled eggs. Not the best variety. Staff in club room could be a little more helpful asked for fresh pancakes as ones in buffet were rock hard and dry. Took the ages to make just two then they were burnt. Room was a good size Quiet location Coffee machine provided with pods 2 pieces of washing included daily with club room Cocktails, spirits and wine in club room with light snacks between 6-9pm Afternoon more few biscuits and museli bars seen better afternoon tea in club rooms. Tea and Coffee, beer, soft drinks all day

title: Great location!
desc: This hotel is great for a short stay in Singapore. Location is excellent. Just next block to Chinatown. Metro station is behind the hotel. There are countless restaurants nearby. If you feel like walking, itâ€™s also only about 20mins walk to Clark Quay and the Merlion Park. Hotel room itself was spacious. Good size bathroom too. Comfortable bed and bedding. It states that this is a five star hotel but the amenities provided in the room are just average. Hotel swimming pool is nice. Staff at front desk were friendly. The street outside the hotel is stinky. Only because of the market across the road. Happy to stay here again if the price is good.

title: Service commendations
desc: My friends & I visited Carlton City-the Trading Floor on 6 November 2019 & were very impressed with the staffs maning the Outlet. Mr Deven, the o-m-o guy who maned the outlet all by himself was very pleasant. He was very helpful & have the patience to advise customers on various types of promotions the hotel offered. He was very dedicated in his job & many a time will serve customers with a smile. As for Mr Jack Chan, the F&B Manager, he was very alert, humble & courteous. Working as a team, Mr Chan relieved his staff when Deven was on meal-break. Jack was not proud at all & he took the initiative to serve the tables with interest in this service line. We realise the value of time to a busy person like Jack & this makes us all the more appreciative of the time Jack has so

title: Simply a Great stay
desc: The hotel is nice and comfortable with beautiful staff. All the staff were very warmth and friendly, from the Bell Staff, Concierge, Reception to the team at the restaurant. We loved the view from the room and the location of the hotel. It is very near lots of shops and eateries. We took a pleasant stroll down to Chinatown after our dinner in the hotel. Thank you very much for a relaxing stay. Kudos for a job well done. We will definitely come back.

title: A four day holiday in Singapore
desc: The hotel's location is great, nearby MRT-station, 2 minutes walk. China town is as well close to the hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The club-room was quiet and the bed was comfortable with many pillows.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Hotel is very nice and in a super location. the very friendly staff, especially the concierge Raj who made us feel so welcome. He was always on hand to help us out with our questions! Singapore is awesome we will back again

title: Awesome stay
desc: Greeted by smiley Mr Ravean upon arrival. Check in was smooth and flawless. The receptionist were friendly and accommodating, they upgraded our stay to accommodate my impromptu request for connecting rooms. The room was well appointed. The plate restaurant was full for dinner on Saturday. The vicinity around the hotel has lots to explore. We had breakfast at plate on Sunday, the place was busy. I noticed Mr Jackson, the manager was very efficient and attentive. He also welcomed us very warmly. The food at the restaurant was of good quality. My family had a great stay and we enjoyed ourselves ! Thank you !

title: Good, comfortable hotel in revamped Tanjong Pagar
desc: First time stay at this place. Nice spacious rooms. Clean and comfortable bed. What impressed me was how close is to MRT station, restaurants, shops, markets, bars. Nice treat in the middle of the City.

title: Dinner @ Plate
desc: Made arrangement for my Dad's Birthday and Outlet Manager, Jackson, was very helpful with the arrangement from reservation till seating arrangement for actual day. Service Staff Gopala & Sathys was attentive in clearing our plates and assist with our request promptly. Good variety for the price of S$59nett (promotion). Fresh Seafood (especially Oyster). A slight recommendation for the Laksa/Pasta section to be more prominent. The Carving Station good to have the beef sliced when required. As it was too tough after leaving out.

title: Comfortable stays and Good Location
desc: We have great and enjoyable stays in Carlton City hotel for 6 days and 5 nights. And we were impressed with the amount of hospitality from all the staffs in the hotel, particularly Raj from the concierge. With good location, 5 minutes walked to MRT station and tons of great food around in Tanjong Pagar. Clean room with comfortable bed and pillows.

title: "Excellent Trip" And,Special Thanks To Concierge Mr. Raj and Mr. Eden
desc: Well, The Trip And The Stay Was Quite Awesome To Me...... Special Thanks To Concierges of The Hotel; Mr. Raj And Mr. Eden..... The Service They've Rendered Was Quite Good:- Not forgetting to mention their Professionalism And Courtesy.... ðŸ’ But,The Breakfast Buffet Could have more items and the Size of the Buffet Needs to Get Quite Larger..... Also Need A Whole Direction And All-in-One Map of the Hotel Facilities...... Whatsoever; I'd Recommend This Hotel To Every One..... *Sorry Mr. Raj and Mr. Eden; Because I Can't Submit Your Photos With Me......ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜”

title: When the one person make your stay memorable!
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights during Christmas 2019. The hotel is very nice and in very good location, but the most pleased with the concierge person we meet. We were very lucky to meet such a helpful and smily person as Xavier! Every time he was suggesting us not only the right places to visit, but also was giving some helpful tips about best time of visiting each place, saving money and so on... and always with the most charming smile we ever seen! Thanks to this guy we were lucky to see amazing Christmas show in Gardens by the bay, as we're going to visit it other time and could miss such a feeric show! Thanks for our wonderful stay!

title: Christmas Trip
desc: This hotel is absolutely fantastic!! Very clean, comfortable and large rooms. The staff are extremely friendly from the reception staff to the porter staff who met us on arrival at the hotel. Breakfast was nice at the hotel and well worth the daily rate which they charge. On one occasion they couldnâ€™t get us in the main restaurant or breakfast so they asked if we could dine on the top floor which we did and it was lovely. Very central hotel to bars and restaurants, 7/11 on the corner of the street also. Love the room concept with the glass panel window from the bathroom to the bedroom, there is a roller blind which you can draw for privacy. Also worth a visit to the sky bar on the 29th floor great service and incredible views of the city. Would definitely return to this

title: Pleasant surprise
desc: A great hotel with good location. Comfortable room with nice beds. Accommodating staff. Delicious and varied breakfast. I am not usually a fan of â€œbigâ€ hotels, but this place is very nice. Taxis and Grab cars readily available. Interesting shopping street behind the hotel.

title: Above and Beyond
desc: Perfect stay for the festive season! Top service, polite and attentive staff and overall welcoming atmosphere. Clean and spacious rooms. Graffiti Sky Bar on the top floor is a must - Bartenders Rodney, Joel and Deven definitely made our stay even more pleasant and memorable. They knew how to make us feel warm and welcome and cracked jokes to make us laugh. They were very patient with us when we asked questions or asked for recommendations with orders for drinks and bar food. They went above and beyond in providing the best quality service to us. Rodney, Joel, and Deven, thank you for making our stay such an enjoyable and memorable one and we look forward to coming back soon!

title: Great Spot
desc: Staff are super friendly - like most people in Singapore - and the hotel is new and very nice. It is located close enough to most things so taxis are usually $10 to most places and about $15 to the airport depending on premiums. We would recommend to friends.

title: Great Spot
desc: Great hotel, really good location with some amazing restaurants nearby. Got to thank Jekamaiah, Xavier, Harun and Ratha for their concierge work. Taxis, bags, restaurants all sorted. Look forward to the next visit.

title: The best hotel at fair price so far
desc: I came to Singapore a few of times. from my impression, this hotel is the most one CP value. the location is near the mrt. Many restaurants around there and the Maxwell centre is only 8-10 mins walk. The room is neat and the lobby is good. Reception is comparatively good to other hotels. it's recommended to others living if you pick chinatown. æˆ‘ä¾†éŽæ–°åŠ å¡å¹¾æ¬¡ã€‚å¾žæˆ‘çš„å°è±¡ä¾†çœ‹ï¼Œé€™å®¶é…’åº—æ˜¯CPåƒ¹å€¼æœ€å¤šçš„ä¸€å®¶ã€‚è©²ä½ç½®åœ¨åœ°éµé™„è¿‘ã€‚é‚£è£¡çš„è¨±å¤šé¤é¤¨å’Œéº¥å…‹æ–¯éŸ‹ä¸­å¿ƒåƒ…8-10åˆ†é˜æ­¥è¡Œè·¯ç¨‹ã€‚æˆ¿é–“æ•´æ½”ï¼Œå¤§å ‚å¾ˆå¥½ã€‚æŽ¥å¾…ç›¸å°å…¶ä»–é…’åº—é‚„ä¸éŒ¯ã€‚å¦‚æžœæ‚¨é¸æ“‡å”äººè¡—ï¼ŒæŽ¨è–¦çµ¦å…¶ä»–å±…ä½çš„äººã€‚

title: This hotelâ€™s rooms are dirty
desc: The lobby of this hotel is beautiful. That is where my compliments end. I checked in on Dec. 6, 2019 for two nights. I went to the room and was dismayed to find dirty watermarks on the wall. If the hotel staff canâ€™t be bothered to wipe basic dirt from the walls, they likely are half-cleaning the entire room. I went to the front desk and complained. They immediately moved me. When I showered later that night, I found that the bathroom was infested with tiny flies. I was too exhausted to complain and be moved again. The next morning, I requested that housekeeping take care of the flies, but when I returned to the room, the flies persisted. I complained yet again and was told it was a â€œknownâ€ problem and the flies are in the drainage system. They offered to switch rooms, but it

title: Carlton Club Room
desc: Booked a carlton club room for approx $300+ per night for a birthday staycation. Hotel is a 5min walk away from tanjong pagar mrt station and has restaurants which opens till late, nearby hawker centre and supermarket in the surrounding. Was given one of the room on the top level which was big, comfortable. Said room came with bathtub, shower and toiletries. In-room mini bar is complimentary with drinks and crackers as well. In-room entertainment came with paid movies too so we are given more choices other than the free channels. Breakfast and club lounge access was included with the stay. Club lounge has complimentary all-day light refreshments (Drinks, Biscuits and Granola Bar), evening cocktail which features mini buffet and breakfast buffet. Hotel gave a cake for the

title: Spacious Clean Hotel and Great location
desc: My wife and I spent 3 days at this hotel after cruise vacation. Pro - location is perfect at old CBD area. nearby Green MTR subway line about 5 min walk. - grocery (Fairprice) is 2 min walks and fresh fruit market is just across the street. Basically you can get anything you may need for a trip nearby. Restaurant, coffee shop, grocery, pharmacy, food court etc. - going to Orchid Road or Bugis about 20 min subway. Walk to Chinatown is approx 15 min or bus will tax approx 5 min. - our room include breakfast which is quite okay in terms of variety and food quality. - our room is on 14th floor we get good view of city (partial oceanview). it is clean and spacious. - front desk are very friendly and always keep their smile on their face. Con: - I took some points off from

title: hotel broke our luggage
desc: hotel broke our luggage during the hotel porter brought it to our room but hotel never pay for the repair fee the hotel never makes an apology and never explained what was happened also hotel engineers gave additional damages but never admit it the luggage was not so much heavy and not so much old

title: Christmas Eve buffet dinner
desc: Food is extremely fantastic delicious. Pleased with Services for being so comfortably good. WE will visit Carlton City Hotel for buffet dinner and in near future, we will book the rooms for our friends. Highly recommended ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

title: Comfortable stay; Awesome Concierge Service; Highly Recommend
desc: Stayed in the hotel for 4 nights with breakfast included Location of hotel is in the heart of city, very convenient, MRT at walk able distance Rooms are really spacious with all facilities Great service provided by their staff Food is delicious, good options in vegetarian food as well A special mention about the Concierge Staff: Xavier and Hukun.
