Their recommendations, suggestions regarding sight-seeing have been awesome making our stay in Singapore more memorable. During our stay, the weather was cloudy and it did rain for 2 days. They suggested us places to visit based on weather, trying their best so that we have an amazing experience. Really appreciate their efforts and feel thankful to them. It has been a very warm experience staying in the hotel and a special thanks to

title: Great stay!
desc: After a long flight from London, we were looking forward to a good rest. The room was spacious, modern and comfortable. The staffs were friendly and accommodating, particularly the concierge boys, Harun & Xavier. We didnâ€™t have breakfast at the hotel as thereâ€™s plenty of food and hawker centres just opposite the hotel. The mrt station is just 2 minutes walk, making it accessible to get around the city. We also took grab and had no trouble on getting any taxis. The gym was a bit small but sufficient for a short work out. We didnâ€™t use the swimming pool as it was raining day and night. Overall it was an enjoyable stay.

title: Highly recommend
desc: Wonderful hotel in a great location and amazing staff , especially Jennifer from the reception The breakfast is one of the best and the lounge was a Heaven after a long day We love the pool and the gym

title: Great hotel and great people (in particular Xavier!)
desc: The hotel exceeded my expectations in that it has a very convenient location and high quality rooms and facilities (except the gym is a little small) for the price it charged. The hotel staff are generally friendly and helpful. The assistant chief concierge Xavier was particularly warm and welcoming. He made great restaurant and sightseeing recommendations. He gave us a great impression of the hotel and Singapore in general.

title: disappointed
desc: Heard good reviews from my peers about Carlton City Hotel but to my disappointment prior my check in at around 3 PM, I was told that I had to wait until 9/9:30 for my room to be ready due to the the unavailability of the rooms because the flight crew have yet to check out. I booked the hotel 3 months in advance and I was told by the staff that the hotel is currently â€˜fullâ€™. I waited until 8PM and then proceeded to ask the staff when will my room be ready as I was already exhausted waiting for 5 hours and I was told that it be ready at 10 PM. None of them bothered to tell us that they needed additional 30 minutes more to get the room ready, only knew about it when we asked. Out of frustration, I told them that I have booked the hotel months ago & the only reply from him was

title: Very nice check in and check out service..spacious and clean room
desc: Very smooth and hassle free check in and out..very niceee..spacious and clean room..very good service from all the staffs..excellent location..with supermarket..shopping and mrt..all within 5mins walk..you will love it

title: Exemplary customer service
desc: Fantastic Hotel, providing great value, location, and a modern, stylish and comfortable decor with first class service and amenities. Of special mention I'd like to highlight the fantastic customer service from Chief Concierge Xavier Kok, who went above and beyond the call of duty to help a guest in need. It's a wonderful feeling to feel your interests are so cared for by a hotel! I will certainly continue to book my stays in Singapore at the Carlton City Hotel.

title: Very good city hotel
desc: I stayed at this hotel for one night before going on a cruise the next day. Everything was very good from the check-in, the staff and the room itself. The room was light and well organized. The only thing I missed was some USB outlets The bathroom was a bit odd as there was a glass wall between the shower and the bedroom. Nice when you are alone but could be strange if you are two in the room. Room was very clean and the bed comfortable. I didn't used the restaurant for lunch or dinner, only breakfast, but it was ok with the most items you expect to find at a breakfast buffet. Maybe not in class with US hotels in the same class, but fully OK for a hotel in Asia. There were a lot to see and do in the neighborhood as well as many locally restaurants around the hotel. 15 minutes by

title: Fantastic hotel at a cracking price
desc: We stayed for 2 nights and could not speak more highly of the Carlton. Room was spotless, amenities were great and the small touches were there - crucially, we asked to take a shower after checkout and before our evening flight and they gave us access to a room to do so; really appreciated this. The pool is good, and the location is excellent too. Would 10/10 stay again.

title: Wonderful experience in Singapore!
desc: I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights, with my husband, some cousins of mine and some friends, from the 2nd up to the 4th January 2020. We were delighted with the kindness of the staff (a very special word to Mr. Harun (Bellman/ Concierge) and Mr. Jagan (Bellboy), who was very attentive and polite. The rooms were very big, very clean and very confortable. The breakfast was delighful, with many kinds of fruit, bread and so on. We intend to come bach to Singapore in the near future and we will stay again in this wonderful Hotel.

title: Yet Another Great Stay!
desc: Friendly and helpful staff. Check-in was efficient and got our connecting rooms as requested. It was a pity the restaurant was full for dinner on the Saturday. Delighted to discover Graffiti Sky Bar. Nice and cozy ambiance. All staff were great!

title: Hard to fault
desc: A beautiful hotel , well located, with clean comfortable rooms. A steady flow of taxis able to take you to the airport or anywhere else in SG. Also the rooms are spacious and even have a bath in the bathroom. You get what you pay for because the rooms are not cheap! But Only two criticisms are : 1) is that the walls are quite thin and one night I was woken by a crying baby. 2) one night I could not sleep I ordered room service (from the round the clock menu) but my partner was sleeping so I didnâ€™t want to eat it in the room. They would not let me eat it in the lobby and insisted on sending it to the room. I then had to intercept the waiter bringing my food and eat it in a couch on my floor.

title: Small things make a huge difference
desc: The people at this hotel really impressed me and left a great impression Shah and Eden were fantastic people who went well beyond expectations. I had stayed at the best hotel in Singapore before visiting this hotel for 1 night and i have to say - this is where i will be returning. We were drenched one afternoon after checking out. We had left bags at the front and came back to the hotel absolutely wet. Shah made it his mission to get us towels so that we would be half dry going to the airport. Fantastic! Eden is probably the best confidence filling concierge ever! Just told you everything you needed to know about the area in 30 seconds. Great asset to the hotel. Well done to all involved. PS The rooms are really nice as well

title: We had a great time at Carlton and would definitely stay here again!
desc: The hotel is in a great location and everyone is super friendly. Staff was really helpful, especially Eden. He was always there to help us get taxis, make recommendations and just to have a chat. My partner also accidentally left his wallet in a cab and Eden also helped us get it back! This could've ruined our trip and we really appreciated his help; gold stars for him! The room was also modern and clean and we really liked both bars in the hotel.

title: Amazing staff!
desc: We stayed in this hotel during New Year vacation in 2020. The hotel is very nice and in very good location, but the most pleased with the staff we meet at the cafe in the lobby. We were very lucky to meet such a helpful and smily person as Eden! While we waited for a pickup bus for many hours there, we received great hospitality service especially from the guy. He is very friendly, polite and standout in the way of delivering services. We are deeply moved. Thanks for our wonderful stay!

title: 4 nights at Carlton City
desc: Bedroom with high cleanliness class ðŸ‘ comfort bed & pillow. Super clean bathroom. The only thing that should be better in bedroom is TV Channel. Average breakfast menu, but with superclean dine-in ammenities ðŸ‘. Definately will stay again in this hotel for next business trip ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

title: Great place to stay, perfect location
desc: We only stayed for 1 night unfortunately, wish it had been longer! We arrived at 9am after an overnight flight & the very friendly Lady on reception checked us into our room immediately so that we could rest. She also gave us a late checkout for the following day as we were on another night flight. The room was spacious & immaculate, very comfortable bed & lovely & quiet. The location was perfect, a few minutes walk from the MRT & opposite an amazing food court with great cheap eats & lovely fresh fruit stalls. Plus all the surrounding streets are full of cafe & restaurants, so there is no issue with finding a wide range of food options. Only a 30 minute walk to Marina Bay Sands & the Gardens by the Bay, so all in all a perfect place to stay! Definitely will be back, Singapore

title: Great stay
desc: We had a great stay here for 3 nights, the hotel present very clean and tidy. location close to Tanjong Pagar Mrt. in walking distance. There are many local restaurants around there and minimart opposit the hotel. another few hotels close by but this hotel offer better deal and look nicer. will definitely come back for our business trip.

title: Great hospitality
desc: Staying at the Carlton City was a delightful experience. Rooms have a comfortably generous size and as you would expect they are maintained very clean and up to date .The staff is very kind and thorough. Peter and his team at the reception were exceptionally professional and never hesitated to assist us carrying always a smile on their faces! Overall an above standard Asian hospitality! Would come back any time and recommend

title: Architect
desc: I had visited Singapore many times but mostly for business. This time around I had went for Business/vacation and had the pleasure at staying at the Carlton City Hotel. Xavier who works at the Hotel made sure upon my arrival at the hotel,that was well received and that my stay at the Hotel would be flawless. He introduce me to the local restaurant near the hotel as well as a fine jazz bar which I truly enjoyed with some friends. My stay at the Carlton City Hotel was exceptional and Xavier made the difference.

title: The best Concierge experience ever! Best Hotel in Singapore!!!!
desc: Xavier welcomed us into the hotel, facilitated us through intake and took our bags to our room. We found out that he was our concierge when we went to investigate what Singapore had to offer. He walked us through the maps, then walked us to the subway after giving us a treasure trove of places that are a must to see and visit. Very knowledgeable about finding the best cuisine/entertainment around. The food at the hotel is of 5 stars quality. We will come back there given the five star treatment received there!!!!

title: Perfect Location - Comfortable Room
desc: My gf and I spent 5 days at this amazing place. Location: Great. You can get to all the interesting places. There is actually no need for taxi if you are healthy and can walk. You will get every delicious food you want. Chinatown is around the corner. Room & Hotel: comfortable, spacious room and quiet. We were located on the 7th floor. Nice city view. Pool area is located on the 3rd floor and there is a nice small gym.

title: Dirty room
desc: Stayed there for a week. Awesome service from the bellmen ðŸ‘Œ About the room, it was never vacuumed the whole week, it was dusty and on the third day my husband woke up with bug bites on his arm and leg. Horrible. We will never stay there again

title: Great hotel, great location, nice people
desc: We stayed for a couple of nights at the Carlton City before going to our cruise from Singapore. The hotel is great and the location unbeatable. Chinatown is very close. The concierge, Xavier, was really good. He gave us several tips about places to eat, visit, etc. we went to one of his dining recommendation and it was very good. He was extremely helpful and nice.

title: Very satisfied with our choice!
desc: We stayed in Carlton City and we were really glad for our choice. Hotel is very clean and the room was spacious. Big bathroom with bathtab and shower seperately. Bed matress and pillows were very good, the linens were silky soft. The area around was beautiful. The hotel is near chinatown and telok ayer Food Market, 10-15 min walk. 3 minutes from tanjong pagar East West Line mrt station and around 15 minutes walk from Clarke quay.

title: Terrifically-located business hotel.
desc: We spent a weekend at the hotel in two adjoining rooms. By far, the best part of this hotel is the location. It's close to a train stop, and within quick, easy driving distance of Singapore's most popular and attractive neighborhoods. We appreciated that. The hotel makes a good, solid first impression. Nothing overly special but the facility is solid, clean, and well-kept. Our rooms were well appointed. Good comfortable beds and bedding, a very nice bathroom (shower and bath, no less), and comfortable furnishings. We didn't use the gym but we did spend time at the pool, which we enjoyed. There's a shallow area appropriate for small children, and we appreciated that. Overall, it's a very clean pool (not every hotel maintains that standard!), though primarily a place for adult

title: Excellent service
desc: The purpose of writing this letter is to compliment your hotel staff for their wonderful service. Your staff have used their best efforts to make us feel comfortable stay at your hotel. I was there for 2 days with my family and for all these days I was attended with utmost warmth. I was impressed to see the hotel was well maintained, every need was catered with utmost perfection making us feel so important. I have a rather difficult to pleased personality but yet your staff managed to impressed me. I've been staying at various 5 star hotel since February as my aim was to support local industries during this period but not all hotel live up to their expectations as Carlton city. I would like to compliment your entire team for being so professional. With smile on their faces,

title: Good quality of food
desc: Tried their Spaghetti Aglio Olio with grilled Salmon very tasty worth the price. I would definitely recommend to my friends, relatives & colleagues as well. If you are staying around Tanjong Pagar will enjoy free delivery.

title: Warm and Kind
desc: I really Enjoy while staying in Carlton City because of the nice enviroment and i do really appreciate all the staff especially Pui Vun ,who helped me and guided me while i know nothing about that place.Thanks for patience and friendly attitudes. Stay safe and stay healthy.

title: Stay at Carlton City Hotel
desc: May stay at Carlton City Hotel was very comfortable the staff are friendly. Due to the circuit breaker our company chose this hotel for our accommodation for a couple of months. Thank you for your service Jennifer

title: Surprise Lunch Delivery
desc: Ordered a surprise lunch delivery for my colleague and her family this afternoon. The food arrived earlier than the requested time, delivered by a cheerful driver! They were thrilled by the surprise and commented the chicken was well marinated, juicy and so tasty even though they ate it about an hour later. The orh nee I ordered for them was also well-liked by my colleague's grandmother. This is not my first order from Carlton City Hotel. I've tried the Aglio Olio with Salmon, Nasi Goreng Kampong, Claypot Rice and the new addition to their menu, Nasi Lemak, Mee Siam and Orh Nee. I am impressed by the quality of the food each time they reach me. And each delivery was handed over to me by a cheerful and friendly delivery man, even the one who had to lug the entire claypot to my

title: Thanks carlton City hotel
desc: Thanks to the hotel staff(pui vun) for helping us solve some questions about the hotel during this hotel stay, thank you for the excellent service provided, Also thank other employees for their excellent service

title: employees were so helpful
desc: Great location. this hotel is located in the city center and very close The rooms are perfect - comfortable, clean.The lobby space is beautiful Super friendly workers at the reception, especially (Pui Vun)ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š can using chinese communicate

title: SHN
desc: Fantastic staff taking care of me especially duty manager of the hotel saving literally my life. I recommednding this place as best personal service you can get in the world!! Regrettfully by trip arvisor regulations I cannot mention names but manager J.Y. is the person hotel should be proud of to have on board!

title: Great service
desc: I served a 14 day stay home notice at Carlton City Hotel when I came into Singapore from UK. Truth be told, I have never actually heard of this hotel before. However I must say kudos to the hotel especially because of itâ€™s excellent staff and service. I received courtesy calls every day checking in on me and my needs. The hotel sent up amenities quickly and efficiently. When I had food deliveries, the food was sent up within 10 min of arrival at the concierge. When my office sent me my office equipment, the transfers were done efficiently. The mandatory swab test was conducted in the hotel premises. The staff was super efficient and professional and we were herded to the appropriate waiting areas and test site in a timely fashion. I was impressed with the service and a

title: Quarantine times
desc: Today is my 14th day of my quarantine here in Singapore ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¬. And I want to give BIG THANKS to all the staff of this hotel who took care of me, and helped me to enjoy my quarantine here! They have been super attentive and kind! They followed up on me everyday. I was lucky to be here! The food isnâ€™t great but you cannot expect high quality when you are paying so little for each day here, but donâ€™t be too picky about the food, it wonâ€™t harm you to eat whatever they serve you... My room is 1322 and it is spacious, with a desk, a bathtub and a very nice shower. And anything that asked for, they brought it to me super quick! Thank you everyone!!

title: Best Qurentin Ever Staying in Carlton City Hotel Excellent Service and Very Friendliness,kindness,caring.Thank so Much
desc: Arrived at 29 January Qurentin for 14 days. Frist i will like to thanks for Mr Joel F&B Manager his Kindness, Friendliness and his EXCELLENT SERVICE I really Appreciate about that, and also he Leads his F&B Team, Kitchen Team and Delivering Team, housekeeping Team very well, on time Delivering. Thank you so much I Really Appreciate about your Team and provide a very EXCELLENT SERVICE . I will definitely remember this Carlton City Hotel they provide SUPERB AND EXCELLENT service in every way, Thanks YOU so much for The Carlton City Hotel Team well Done and very Good Job. I would like to Thanks to Receptionists Team for their Friendliness and Kindness and also Excellent Service aspecially Ms Charlene she provided SUPERB service and very Caring and very Kindness, Friendliness,

title: Carlton City Hotel of High Class Furnishing
desc: Carlton City Hotel near Transport Hub of Tanjong Pagar Outrum MRT of superior location near Chinatown. Places of interest include Sri Marimaman Temple Singapore oldest Hindu temple, Buddha tooth temple with buddha tooth and Fairfield Methodists Chruch. Foodies can enjoy various well know up market resturants at Criag Rd and Ann Siang Hill Club Street. Chinatown was within walking distance along Duxton Hills Plain. Famous for authuentic prizza and german foods restrants. Famous Tian Tian Chicken Rice also house in Maxwell Market. Tanjong Pagar Rd house previous Tram Station similar to Hong Kong Causway Bay. Suitable for business traveller as it is 2nd largest business distict other than shenton way and marina bay area. Largest but not least the distict of founding Prime

title: First family holiday post-COVID lockdown
desc: This was the perfect place to take our first family holiday post-covid! It was our toddlers' first time overseas and we were super happy they let us check in early so we could catch up on lost sleep from the overnight flight. All the staff were always super helpful and friendly, the pool facilities were outstanding, the room itself was spacious, comfortable and very luxe! The location worked out really well for us as there were food stalls right across the road, a decent shopping mall one block down and it was easy access to so many sights and attractions. Also loved the green space nearby too. Reasonably priced, we will definitely be coming again!

title: Highly recommended
desc: Well situated in a convenient and interesting area not far from Chinatown and the CBD. The Carlton City Hotel is well maintained, very clean, and has everything you need. The employees are friendly, very efficient, and go out of their way to be helpful. I cannot speak more highly of the assistance they provided. Graffiti rooftop bar has great views and good food offerings. Tuxedo cafe is good for morning coffee and pastries. There is a local market, cafes, supermarket and other amenities nearby. We had a wonderful stay and hope to return soon.

title: The Hotel that Makes me Want to Come Back Over and Over again, My Awesome Room 1501
desc: The experience was just amazing. Entering this luxurious hotel and the reception was very friendly, helpful yet humble. He helped me to get my â€žbiggest wishâ€œ for a hotel room and put me into the most beautiful room at 1501, which has whole view of Tanjong Pagar and surrounded hotels. What I really regret was that I forgot his name but of course not his face. Everytime I call reception, they responded in a very fast and friendly manner. Then when I am going to check out and need taxi urgently, Mr. Suresh helped to find one and he was so kindly help me to bring me to taxi and bringing my luggage. The room itself is just breathtaking, all the facilities are marvelous. All things were provided. Even my favorite camomile tea. I surely will come back again for my business trip and

title: exceptional hotel
desc: This hotel surpassed any expectations i might had. sparkly clean, very good location, friendly staff. Any request I had, met with enthusiastic consent. Since my flight was late at night, i I asked for and was given the permission for a late check out. I asked for an option to come back later and take a shower before the long flight back, and it was taken care of too. I have not a single negative remark about the experience at the Carlton City Hotel. I will definitely return.

title: kind service
desc: Thank you very much exelence service of Mr.Suresh Chief concierge. I lost my mobile he helped me to find mobile thanks for Suresh,s help I can find my phone. Once again thanks for kind service and support

title: Carlton city hotel
desc: All staff there was very nice such as the dining staff and bellboy. We had a nice time there. I spend there for a few days and the room was clean and has a nice view. Also, the breakfast was good and yummy.

title: Recommend for business travel
desc: Good hotel for business - Just above average for tourists. Hotel is very clean, well designed. Amenities isnâ€™t great. Location works for those only travel around by grab/taxi. Although there is MRT nearby, the station is only connect to one MRT line. Many bus stations nearby but one that connect to attractions need at least 4 min walking. Breakfast is ok but not very great. Iâ€™d recommend staying here if you are on business trip only and not the best for tourists

title: Top tier business hotel
desc: Not exactly a 5 stars hotel but definitely a top tier business hotel. We have an early check in and late check out, coupled with a cosy room so nothing to complain about. The rooftop lounge was a great place to chill out with a beer and have dinner.

title: Not worth the price
desc: The club room with big bathtub and nice view and the concierge guy is so nice was so helpful for helping us store our cake. However my partner need to work on next day early morning and we double checked the breakfast time at club lounge was 7am. When we reach there 7.15am, glass door was locked and nobody there. We went down to check with front counter reception, the staff named Andy told us [the staff on duty was no uniform so he need to take uniform from laundry]. He was pretty defensive and tone was not pleasant when I repeat his sentences. Anyway he did suggest us to take our breakfast at lv2 but my birthday mood also spoiled by him. I back to lounge to having my breakfast on 8am, the staff was just sitting on the chair near the entrance and watching his phone video until

title: Best Corporate/Business Hotel in Singapore!!!!!
desc: I work for US based Tech Company, WP Engine. Over the past 3 months we have been launching our brand and services in the Singapore market. During this period. I have stayed at the Carlton City Hotel, on numerous occasions as I travel between our Australian H/O and Singapore. For the business/corporate traveller. I cannot RECOMMEND this property enough! The rooms are spacious, well appointed, and setup well for business travellers. The lobby bar, and cafe areas are perfect for hosting client meetings throughout the day, which is a huge advantage if you are doing business around the CBD. In terms of amenities, breakfast is great with plenty of choice, and the lobby bar or Graffiti, Sky Bar are perfect spots to unwind after a busy day. FYI - The Graffiti , Sky Bar is

title: Carlton City Doing Singapore Proud
desc: We have just left the Carlton City Hotel and felt compelled to do this review, we went there for our 30th Wedding Anniversary and my Birthday. It is so close the MRT and in being this close allows you access to everything you would want to see & do there. We had such an awesome experience staying at the Carlton City Hotel, the staff were polite, respectful and nothing was too much trouble for them. But the shining jewel in their crown has to Nicholas their manager. Upon arrival when we entered our room there was a fruit basket and a dessert, for our 30th Wedding Anniversary with a hand written note from Nicholas, then another fruit basket was put in our room the day of my Birthday. Every time we saw Nicholas he would have a chat and laugh making us fell totally welcomed and

title: Great location, friendly staff!
desc: Book staycay for 3 pax. Their 3rd (rollaway) bed and pillow are as comfortable as their main bed, which is awesome. Location is also amazing, 2-3min walk from tanjong pagar mrt, many food, supermarket, small malls, etc around the area. Staff were all very friendly, and facilitative to our requests. We enjoyed the tub in the bathroom (if I'm not wrong their deluxe rooms have choice of with or without tub). Minor cons but no big deal: Pool is not large (hotel caters more for work travellers than family / young kid staycays, so it's perfectly understandable; it's only a con if you book hotel solely for the pool experience). Tv does not support chromecast/casting from your own devices (not all hotels have this, but I personally find it a plus point/perk when I chance upon

title: Great and convenient stay
desc: Arrived early but one of the concierge staff helped us with an early check-in. Overall room was spacious, bed was comfortable. Check-out was a breeze. Special thanks to Pui Vun who really helped us out during our stay, definitely ended my holiday in such a nice way before my flight out!

title: Calton city hotel, Alison is best
desc: We got there for our honeymoon. Hotel manager Alison treat us for the best honeymoon services. Calton city hotel is very convenient at using transportation. They gave us a kind message card and chocolate Thank you calton city hotel!:)

title: Great First Impression !!!
desc: Our few overseas bosses from Denmark, India and Korea had a very good impression on this hotel after their first time stayed in this hotel choice here last week, everything was perfect with huge room, nice customer service and convenient at surrounding. A special thanks to Corine Yap who brought me around in this nice hotel previously before I chosen this hotel for our overseas bosses. Corine was very responsive and always shown her professionalism answering all my queries during their stays to ensure all in a good hand. Thus, I have no regret to chosen this hotel and for sure will come back again next time. Thanks once again to Corine and all the hotel staffs rendered their good services during our bosses stayed in Singapore.

title: Excellent
desc: In addition to the 5 star quality rooms, the people make the difference here! The staff are friendly accommodating and go the extra mile. Special mention to the Duty manager at the time Chin Pui Vun who ensred all aspects of my stay was first class.

title: What a disappointment.
desc: I have been travelling to Singapore and business for over 10 years and always been enchanted bye my experience here. Unfortunately, this hotel put the abrupt end to a decade of positivity. Room service that never arrived, cold buffet breakfasts, excuses offered in place of solutions and all that a five star cost. To add insult to injury, I had a sleepless night thanks to what I assume was someone doing business from An adjacent room. Multiple visitors that rang the doorbell and created hysteria until after 4 am.

title: Wonderful
desc: We had a very good stay, everything was perfect! A special thank you to Winee! She, and her team, are very service oriented and put in a great effort to support the hotelâ€™s clients in their needs and wishes.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Best hotel I stayed in singapore but it will be better if breakfast was included but other wise the service and the rooms were very good I traveled with my family of 6 it was hard to get a hotel in singapore with a good price but this hotel u can get by a little low price

title: Great service
desc: I drink water a lot every day. Asking for more bottled water even at 2200PM. ALL COMPLIMENTARY with pleased attitude. Thanks for the great man at the reception. He even helped to schedule my checkout time based on my departure flight.

title: Great Hotel and Staff in Singapore
desc: Super hotel location in Singapore. Great and very friendly service from Winee at the reception. My favorited Hotel since many years. The staff is very friendly starting at the concierge / reception and reservation. Very flexible with my reservation

title: Carlton city club lounge
desc: I dont have words to describe. This hotel is my favourite. The staff is so nice and they ensure that they treat you well. Nicholas the club manager is the main highlight of this place. I dont remember laughing so much. He is a hilarious guy. Unlike other lounges I've been too he and the other part-timers would ensure that I always have a good time and would also recommend places to go in Singapore. The part-timer named Fadil is only 16 years and his service is actually immaculate. Both of them really would really try to ensure if we're comfortable. Thank you Carlton City for an amazing hospitality. I thank you from the bottom of my heart

title: Not a 5 stars Hotel
desc: Carlton City Singapore, I like the quarter, but I was very disappointed with the breakfast, far from the standard for a 5 stars Hotel. The same for the Gym, so small and with few machines. Room ok. The espresso at the coffee shop in the lobby was great, top!

title: Great Stay ðŸŽ‰
desc: Great stay in the Carlton city hotel , reception was lovely chatting with me Reception staff yeo was warm and friendly informing me about the hotel facilities during checking in. The room was nice and clean with clean air con air , the pool and gym was alright nothing special. The club lounge was great had a nice spreed during breakfast and nicholas the manager of the lounge was kind enough to get my special eggs Iâ€™ve requested. Cocktails hour was lovely as well. Looking forward returning to carlton on December, thank you carlton city team!

title: Mr.
desc: Very nice hotel, staff ever so helpful and friendly. Beautiful clean modern room. Literally next to mrt station lots of shops in same row as hotel. Sky bar on 29th floor outdoor with breath taking views. 5, star hotel

title: Staycation
desc: Amazing stay and all thanks to the team at carlton City! Special mention to Nicholas, assistant manager for guests services! Will definitely come back again!! Was given a great room that was also a smoking room.

title: Super accomomodating: Best for Business + Pleasure
desc: Stayed for a business trip but my family was with me. They gave welcome gifts, allowed early check in and out since the room was available. My family enjoyed their stay and my kid loved swimming at the pool. The team was very accommodating and friendly and gave us service beyond my expectations. We have other corporate partners in Singapore but I will always book at Carlton City, it's near our office plus near interesting places too!

title: Enjoyable time with family!
desc: Great Stay! Room was spacious and staff was pleasant. Came with my family as part of celebrating my wife's birthday. Although check in took longer than expected, could visibly see they were short staffed. Loved the option of a baby pool, not many hotels offer this to guests, my baby had lots of fun in the pool! Breakfast spread could be improved but staff was always helpful and friendly which made up for it. When it was our turn to check in the staff Andy was very helpful and patient in arranging amenities for my family. Next day he was also the one who checked us out. He has asked us how was our stay and we told him it was fantastic and thank you for making it better than expected! Overall although this is not a 5 star hotel, the staff made it feel like it and would

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Amazing hotel in a great location with the absolute best staff I have ever encountered on all my travels. I can not fault anything about my stay from the moment I arrived till the day I checked out, the quality of the room is top notch, and each and every member of their team I interacted with all went above and beyond to make my time there exceptional. I can't wait to go back.

title: Very helpful staff (Update)
desc: I would like to thank the hotel. The team really put in a lot of effort to make my stay comfortable after first dayâ€™s incidents. I am keeping the previous review below but making changes on my rating. Very helpful staff - but really really bad room conditions First room - Could only see construction so asked for new room Second room - Looked better than the one before until I opened the toilet cover. there was brown stuff on the toilet.. (do not want to imagine what it actually is) , so asked for new room again... Third room - Looked good at first sight! Then I opened mini bar to find hair in it. +++++ came back at night. Took a shower and found an insect in the towel. (It was alive. So freaked out and wasnâ€™t able to get a picture). And dirty shower gown. Don't know if I

title: A short trip to Singapore
desc: Friendly & efficient staff. Clean rooms & good service. Jagan was very helpful with the luggage & to give you a small introduction about the things to do nearby. Overall a good experience! Would definitely recommend to stay here!

title: Excellent Service from Staff, Teo
desc: Superb location, Excellent service from Front Desk Staff, Teo, who is very humorous, smiley, friendly, extremely helpful, super accommodating, provides awesome customer experience & services beyond expectations! 8 star service.! I highly recommend staying in this hotel because of such staffs that makes the stay even more heart warming & welcoming. Management should reward & promote this staff,Teo, for his passion, the joy he brings to customers & make our stay so memorable.

title: Best breakfast buffet and great location!
desc: We booked a room on a club level and can not say a single bad thing about this hotel! Check in was easy, the club lounge is fantastic, the breakfast buffet is the best I have experienced and all the staff have been wonderful! Easy access to MRT has made our excursions around Singapore a breeze! Loved it!!:)

title: Service Commendations
desc: 5 * Services from all the staff were extremely good especially the F&B Manager, Mr Jack Chan. My friends & I went to Carlton City Hotel (The Plate) for buffet lunch on Friday, 2 September 2022. The services rendered were superficially excellent especially Mr Jack Chan, the F&B Manager. Jack was very humble, took the initiative to serve with kindness & patience. His dedications greatly impressed us & we were very pleased with such good hospitalities Carlton City Hotelâ€™s staff provide. Jack deserves commendations. With great confidence & assurance, we will definitely be back to see him again at Carlton City Hotel. Carlton City Hotel is indeed very lucky to have such a good, loyal & dedicated employee. Kudos to Jack Chan !!! Keep it up. Suggestion:- â€œRecommendation for Jack

title: Lovely bar and lounge â¤ï¸
desc: Sweet staycation in Carlton lovely drinks by jack at the lobby bar very masterful sadly thereâ€™s no crowd which is nice and quiet. Friendly lounge staff taken care by Kumar and Nicholas, interesting local snacks presented. Overall great and sweet stay.

title: Recommend this!
desc: When to 1st floor bar (Trading bar). Guy named Daven recommended some matcha based whiskey and taste of it was very unique and my style.ðŸ‘ðŸ»ðŸ‘ðŸ» thanks for good recommendation! Would like to try this again

title: Great area to stay
desc: The location of this hotel is fabulous. The Hotel itself is very clean and staff just lovely. The barista in the Tuxedo coffee shop was brilliant, best coffee we had while in Singapore and remembered our orders each day. Rooms great. Bed and cushions comfy, shower excellent. We didn't eat at the hotel so can not comment on that. Our only gripes are - out by the pool not one person came out to see if we wanted a drink or anything, you could be dead out there no one would know. The other gripe was when we were leaving the porter was helping the taxi driver to put our suitcases in the car, we didn't realise until we arrived at the airport that the suitcase had been damaged, that was extremely disappointing. Obviously they were not going to fit, tell us and advise we need a van!

title: Amazing view and cocktails at Graffiti Sky Bar
desc: I visited the hotel's Graffiti Sky Bar while on a business trip. The atmosphere and view must be among the best in Singapore. I really enjoyed several evenings there with great service and cocktails from manager Rodney and bartenders Zin Min and Shafiq. They really made me feel welcome and relaxed.

title: Good rooms, but varied service
desc: We stayed at the Carlton City Hotel during October 2022. The hotel rooms were spacious and large, and even provides a bathtub for relaxation purposes. The bed was also comfy, and gives a panoramic view of Southern and Eastern Singapore (depending on which direction your room faces). Service in the hotel does vary and can be a little erratic. Overall, checking-in was okay, but staff may be a bit ignorant at times. On our departure day, there was absolutely no service at the Plate Restaurant during lunch hour, so we just utterly left instantly and giving it a 1-star review. We didnâ€™t opt for the breakfast option so we do not know how the buffet breakfast works in that restaurant. However, concierge and cleaning service was excellent on the other hand. My friend left some of his

title: Very nice hotel with excellent Club Lounge
desc: Stayed at Carlton City recently for Singapore GP. Really nice hotel with good gym and pool. Excellent service with Nicholas Guna Desa in the Club Lounge. The only issues were we were orginally booked in a smoking room (which I refused to go to - amazed that hotels even have smoking rooms in 2022!) and the in room TV doesn't broadcast the grand prix (although you can view with Singapore TV app). Great cafe on the ground floor and helpful reception staff. Close to lots of eating places and supermarkets. Short walk to metro station.

title: Great Smaller Hotel in Singapore
desc: Stayed at this hotel, from the first moment it felt like home. Had a club room, the staff there, especially Nic & Nadia were amazing. As It happened it was our anniversary & they made us feel special. Nothing was too much trouble for them. This is one hotel that you should consider in Singapore & the price is not over the top compared to other hotels. Should we return will definitely be staying here again. Cannot speak highly enough the staff & in particularly Nic & Nadia. Thank you again for making our stay one to remember .

title: F1 stay
desc: my girlfriend and I stayed the weekend there to watch the F1 GP. I messaged Mr Nicholas ahead of the stay for a special request and it was gladly accommodated! it was even beyond what i requested for. Thank you to Mr Nicholas, i no longer have a girlfriend when i checked out of the hotel. I now have a FiancÃ©. â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸

title: Buffet Lunch Dining
desc: Was having a company lunch with my colleagues. Got to say the food and service there was top-notch! However, I felt that perhaps certain things could be improved to enhance our overall dining experience. We went there like prob a good 15mins early. But the manager Jackson brought us in to be seated first and informed us lunch will only be ready to be served at 12pm. Therefore, we were actually touring along the buffet counters and saw the food in the pot opened. Hence, we thought that lunch was ready to commence. However the chef apparently insisted that buffet can only commence at 12pm sharp. We don't mind that the buffet can only commence at a fixated time, however there'd be more clarity to us if the pots weren't opened. But overall, a great dining experience! Thank you to

title: Excellent Location
desc: Used this as a base as we were traveling back to the UK from New Zealand just to break the flight up. Very busy business hotel, very clean, excellent beds didn't use any of the facilities but loads of bars restaurants nearby. Arrived late pm first night didn't want to wonder outside would have been nice to have a bar in the hotel to have a drink and unwind. We would stay here again

title: Best concierge service in Singapore.
desc: Best concierge service in Singapore. The manager Mr Soresh and team member Reavan , Jagan are really friendly&helpful. Enjoyed the stay. Me Soresh is very patient and helpful, he helps me to print out the documents in busy hours even though he doesnâ€™t have to do this for me. And his team member Reavan, Jagan are very motivated and full of passions . Always approach to gust actively to ask if they need help.

title: Pleasant stay indeed
desc: Room and hotel was all clean. Breakfast was standard and filling. Staff were friendly too especially Mr.Ravean whom helped me diligently with my luggage! My partner staying felt very cosy and zen for the rooms.

title: Carlton City - A Sustainable Winner!
desc: Carlton City is a beautiful hotel. It is centrally located, with many dining options nearby. The facility is well-maintained, and the staff is very attentive. WorldHotel has a winner with this property! I stayed in a club room, single on floor 22. The view itself was spectacular. Highly recommend this hotel! I seek sustainable hotels and lodging for my business travels and appreciate the lengths this property has gone to. They are a Green Mark Platinum Hotel! Fantastic!

title: Great Stay
desc: Great location. There are lots of shops amd eateries around the hotel. Not to mention a street of Japanese and Korean eateries that becomes more alive at night. Hotel was great. The first time a staff acknowledged a guest arrival through a simple gesture while attending to a call. Room was great. Air-con did not really work to temperature setting. I cannot sleep in a cold room so i ended up switching if off. It only goes up to max 25Â°C even though the setting can go up tp 27Â°C which was ideal for me. So in a sense, a specific group of guests will not be having a comfortable sleep. Took a while to get hot shower running. Could not figure it out. On the second night, i realised the red hot water indications were peeled off. TV channels ... not impressed. Pretty limited. Ended

title: Abhijit Sarkar
desc: The club lounge at the hotel is very business friendly and staffed by excellent people and you can relax and have good conversations. The facilities, the house manager Nicolas and his team are exceptional.

title: Amazing
desc: My father usually books carlton hotel when he travels to Singapore for work, but this time he accidentally booked this hotel. He went up to the lounge to have a look and was greeted warmly by Nadia and Fadil. He had issues with his travel SIM, Nadia had given him useful advice and assured him that his accidental stay would be as pleasant and enjoyable as his original plan. When he came to have breakfast next day, he thoroughly enjoyed the conversation with Fadil. Carlton city has found a return customer in my father through Nadia and Fadil. Congratulations to the hotel for having such amazing and friendly staff.

title: Corporate buffet lunch at The Plate
desc: Yesterday, we had our corporate buffet lunch at the Plate. Booking for a large group in advance with the manager, Jackson, was easy. We even had complimentary parking coupons! The variety of food was good for the price paid and the ambience was cosy. Special mention to Nancy, Gopala, Poma and Din for regularly clearing our plates and ensuring our drinks were filled. Would strongly recommend this place for families and friends to gather!

title: Nothing special
desc: Frankly not memorable, rooms refurbishment recommended, not the best view, but in a nice area with plenty of restaurants and bars. Breakfast on the 28th floor club lounge is average, limited and pretty standard offer. Ingredients quality nothing special. Not the exclusive experience one would expect. Price at 350-400 â‚¬ per night is on the low side for Singapore, but value for money is far from acceptable.

title: Great warm n efficient service from the whole team
desc: We recently have a conference at this hotel and occupied a few rooms.. we were very impressed with the efficiency and quality service of the entire team we encounter.. starting from the sales manager Juliana who was very prompt in response and coordinating our reservation.. every personnel we encounter be it at recept, clubs, restaurants are all so helpful.. I'm really impressed.. special mentions to Sathys, Don, Teo, jackson and many more whom we didn't note down the name.. surely will recommend our clients to this hotel going forward.. thank you everyone for the hospitality, pride and dedication to the hotel.. ðŸ‘ðŸ¼ðŸ‘ðŸ¼

title: I Wonâ€™t stay in This Hotel
desc: I stayed in the CLUB ROOM! Definitely in need of a refresh. The staff were rude, the buffet breakfast was just enough OK. And the LOUNGE CLUB WAS NOTHING TO EAT. The price was too much for what we got, but perhaps it was up for location? It really doesnâ€™t make any sense.

title: Great welcome and service
desc: Stayed here on a combined work and holiday trip with my wife and 5-month old baby. All the staff were very friendly and accommodating and quick to help with things like early and late check in. A great example was when on one morning the restaurant was full at the time we went for breakfast so they quickly sent us to have breakfast in the lounge instead of having to wait. Special mention to Nicholas Guna who went out of his way to look out for us. Will stay here again on future trips I am sure.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Had wonderful stay at Carlton City for 4 nights. The hotel is beautiful- central location to attractions at Singapore. Mostly importantly is the fantastic staff Duty Manager Ms.Pui Vun and Mr. Hardi I believe also Duty Manager were so dedicated to thier job and their attentive customer service was impeccable! Was having the door issue at the late night and they move me to another beautiful room. They even checked with me to make sure everything is okay on the following days when i was passing by the lobby. Highly recommend for anyone visiting Singapore. Definitely will be back again!

title: My pleasurable buffet lunch
desc: This week on Wednesday 23 Nov, my family and I had our buffet lunch at Carlton City Hotel Singapore, Plate Restaurant. I wish to compliment the excellent team of serving staff with their very warm and friendly attitude, especially Vernon, Gopala, David, Meera and those whom I have missed out as saw from their name tags. They have certainly made our lunch very pleasurable and an enjoyable one. Keep up the great service, A Big Thank You!!! I came to know of this value for money buffet lunch which was recommended by my neighbour, and will not hesitate to recommend others too. May

title: Sweet and helpful employees!!
desc: My parents spent a week in this hotel to visit me in Singapore. While the breakfast buffet was slightly overpriced for the limited food options available, everything else was really top notch! I must especially mention that Mr. Teo from the front desk is one of the nicest people my parents have met during their time here. He greeted us with a smile at all times of the day, was always helpful and went out of his way to make their stay in Singapore a memorable one. He alone is a reason for them to book this hotel again next time. Highly recommended.

title: A fantastic short break.
desc: Hotel was perfectly positioned. The staff were super attentive - especially Nicholas, Assistant Club Manager. Beds were so incredibly comfortable and if you can-itâ€™s well worth getting a Club room. The lounge is fantastic.

title: Memorable and awesome birthday
desc: We would like to thank the team of plate restaurant of Carlton City Singapore for a great night they shared with us on my birthday celebration. Everyone and everything was awesome. All were very accomodating and very pleasant. Special thanks to Sayhys, Din, Jackson, Gopala, Vernon and Merin. These are the names who helped us having a special night. All the best to these individuals and a big thumbs up to all. Keep it up and hoping to visit again

title: Nice bar to chill and talk have meeting
desc: Must try the bar in the hotel lobby! bartender Jack is really nice and friendly, he provided us with pretty fresh pineapple cocktails and itâ€™s high value of price. Thanks for the experience! Recommend! :)

title: Good experience
desc: Very good service ðŸ‘ with the staff shameera and sathys ,gopala, Vernon,Jennifer with help for us in good buffet lunch at Calton City Hotel hopefully we look forward in to thank you again in the good service from .shameera give us move information in the buffet lunch ðŸ˜‹.

title: Place to chill
desc: Just another hotel lobby for drinks with friends but we are so happy with the service. Devan made this simple joint into a "go to place" for our future gatherings. Service is superb, and we will definitely come back. Do check this place out.

title: Feels like home away from home
desc: I had a great and memorable stay at Carlton City Singapore. Club Lounge service was top notch! The staffs particularly Sha, Fadil, Devan and Kumar were so friendly and recommended me places as it was my first trip to Singapore. Rooms were spectacular and came with a welcome amenity. I would definitely come back to stay here and recommend it to my family and friends.

title: Great hotel and location
desc: The staff is excellent and very friendly. JÃ©rÃ©mie in sales very good and attentive. Comfortable room, good breakfast. The bar served a ver good Singapore sling. Only this mission for 5 star is a better swimming pool and gym area. I will for sure recommend and come back next time

title: Awesome lobby lounge and serviceâ£ï¸
desc: Chance upon this hotel while we was walking around and found this lovely lobby lounge. We are thankful to receive the awesome service from Jackâ£ï¸ We love the thoughtful surprise drinks that he has mixed for us. Will definitely return to chill. ðŸ˜‰

title: Graffiti Sky Bar. Excellent Service and Great View and Location
desc: Great place to chill, spectacular view. In Rodney and Zin Min, they have the 2 most courteous and professional staff. Excellent service which is hard to come by nowadays! A must visit! 7-star ! Will definitely return!

title: Good experience
desc: The drink is very refreshing compare to others hotels bar. The staff is very courteous and good listener, interacts with us more than we do the talking. This TTF bar is the most enjoyable moments experience. Will come back again.

title: Staycation
desc: The hospitality by the Lounge staff was really good and their manager Nicholas was very helpful and did all possible decorations to make my partners bday special. It was a treat to stay at Carlton Singapore and itâ€™s a good place to suggest for staycays and small celebration with near and dear. Best part is easily accessible to amenities and CBD area.

title: A cozy experience with great cocktails!
desc: Jack here is the most down-to-earth and friendliest bartender! You got to try his cocktails! Super refreshing with a mix of surprise. You canâ€™t get the experience elsewhere. Will definitely come back again!

title: Great View from Graffiti Sky Bar @ Level 29 Carlton City Hotel
desc: Great Night View from Lvl 29 Graffiti Sky Bar @ Carlton City Hotel in Tanjung Pagar. Reasonable drinks and great finger food ( Must try the Otah !!). Shout out to service staff Rodney for the great service! A great place to chill out after a hard days work.

title: Serving best Singapore sling
desc: When visiting The Trading Floor 09 November 2022 with my wife, We tried the best Singapore sling we had so far and we tried many after staying in Singapore for more than 4 years. On top of the best Singapore sling we experienced af fantastic service from the bar tender (Jack) and we can only recommend the place. Peter Smith

title: Perfect for business trip
desc: Amazing reception service, very smooth operation of bellman. (Jagan and Ravean) I had zero stress staying at this hotel for my business trip. They borrowed me an adapter as well as allowing to use the shower after checkout (I have consulted with the hotel in advance of check in)

title: Trip to Tuxedo!
desc: A visit to Tuxedo! Came in with my 2 friends as we saw and heard about the specialty art coffee that they make! The atmosphere is great and pretty; we love it! Coincidentally it was one of my friendâ€™s birthday, they went extra mile and prepare a small tart for her. We were surprised!! It definitely brighten up our day! The two staffs - Amirul Asyraf & Amirul Rashid were friendly and efficient too! Thank you to the both of you! We shall return again! â™¥ï¸

title: Memorable experience
desc: This hotel is a lovely and quality hotel, We had a club room with access to the club lounge. I know it costs a bit more for the lounge access but in my opinion it was worth it. Club access gives you breakfast and a cocktails for 2 hours in the evening all was fantastic and brilliant. Thank you Nicholas the lounge manger for the warm hospitality, each and every time!! Access to the MRT is quick and easy but remember to pay for your tourist ticket with cash. We couldn't use a credit card. The hotel was clean, friendly and always there to help. Greatest thank you again to Nicholas!!

title: EXCELLENT SERVICE
desc: Very good service with Sir Sathys. Excellent food grade. With Jerson, Eugene, Philip, Jhon, Keem, Brent, and etc. All of us from MV BEAR MOUNTAIN BRIDGE Thank you for having us. Greatful to be here.

title: Plate restaurant
desc: Celebrated friendâ€™s birthday here and cake was prepared by the staff without us knowing. We were surprised. Food was great and service was excellent as well ! The price was affordable and reasonable. I would definitely come back again.

title: Plate Lunch Buffet
desc: We celebrated my dad's birthday at Plate restaurant and I must say, I was impressed with the service and staff there. Food was decent but the staff made our meal memorable. They served us water the moment we were seated, and when there were empty plates and bowls, they cleared them swiftly. Shout-out to Gopala, he brought a birthday cake out for my dad and sang a birthday song for him. Thank you for doing a great job everyone!

title: Enjoyable lunch
desc: Staff were friendly, helpful and attentive. We love the buffet spread, in particular the freshness of the seafood. We would like to thank Jack, Jackson, Gopala and Sathy for their excellent service.

title: Well done!
desc: Spent 2 nights at this hotel, and spoke with Augustine, Teo, Leroy, Ravean, Kumar and Thajvin. Excellent service. The staff are working overboard with a smile to cater to all our needs. We do think they need more manpower support. Always see them running around and catering to the guests. Even if canâ€™t get more manpower, pls reward them. They are always smiling and trying their best.

title: Definitely our hotel of choice in Singapore
desc: Stayed for three nights and enjoyed it totally. Our room was bigger than the average Singapore room, and what we especially liked about the room was the long ledge that ran across in front of the window. We had a lot of luggage and suitcases fitted perfectly along the ledge which made finding items super easy. Breakfast was great - checkout not until 12.00 and we had absolutely no complaints about anything at all. Oh and rooms were well insulated from each other - every little sound either from the hallway or the rooms either side. Staff super friendly and accommodating. Looking forward to our next visit.

title: Nice stay
desc: First time to stay at Carlton City hotel and it was really comfortable. The hotel is located in a nice area with many restaurants around and also an easy walking commute to the business district. The room was also really nice and clean, comfortable for a short business stay. The bathrooms could do with a bit of improvement though. The only part which was a bit negative was the breakfast. Overall the hotel itself was fine for a short stay. Also a big thank you to the front office and concierge staffs who were really so courteous and patient. Thank you to Pui Vun, Ravean, Sherina and Jagen! I do hope to stay here during my next visit to Singapore!

title: Carlton Experience
desc: I had a great time! The staff are awesome, special thanks to the staff/ bellman Ravean and Jagan for the assistance. And to the hotel cleaners, geat job in keepinG my room cleab. Will be back once Iâ€™m in SG.

title: Great friendly staff
desc: I'm having a great experience in carlton city hotel especially in club lounge and experience was made great by Kumar I'm having a 26 days and it's my seventh day and I'm loving it. The staff guided me for places to hangout

title: Nice Hotel, very professional and sweet staff(Ms. Chin Puivun)å¾ˆæ£’çš„é…’åº—ï¼Œéžå¸¸ä¸“ä¸šå’Œç”œç¾Žçš„å‘˜å·¥é™ˆå¥³å£«
desc: I have stayed Carlton City Hotel more than 1 months. The hotel has very good infrastructrue including nice room, swimming pool, gym etc and convenient transportation. Most important is that they have fantastic staffs especially Ms. Chin Puivun. She is very patient and sweet to answer lots of questions and help me during my one month stay. Thanks a lot to Ms. Chin Puivun and Carlton city hotel for giving me a nice memory in Singapore! Richard æˆ‘åœ¨æ–°åŠ å¡Carlton City Hotelä½äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå¤šæœˆã€‚é…’åº—æœ‰å¾ˆå¥½çš„è®¾æ–½å¦‚å®½æ•žä¸”ä¸€åº”ä¿±å…¨çš„æˆ¿é—´ï¼Œæ¸¸æ³³æ± ï¼Œå¥èº«æˆ¿ã€‚äº¤é€šä¹Ÿæ–¹ä¾¿ã€‚æœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯å¥¹ä»¬æœ‰ç€ååˆ†æ•¬ä¸šçš„å‘˜å·¥ç‰¹åˆ«æ˜¯Puivun Chin å¥³å£«ã€‚å¥¹å¾ˆè€å¿ƒåŠç”œç¾Žåœ°å›žç­”äº†æˆ‘å¾ˆå¤šé—®é¢˜ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ä¸€ä¸ªæœˆç»™äºˆæˆ‘å¸®åŠ©ã€‚ éžå¸¸æ„Ÿè°¢é™ˆå¥³å£«åŠé…’åº—è®©æˆ‘æ–°åŠ å¡ä¹‹è¡Œç•™ä¸‹äº†å¾ˆå¥½çš„å›žå¿†ï¼

title: Had dinner buffet here. Casual buffet
desc: Had dinner buffet at Plate restaurant on my birthday with my friends. Even tho the restaurant isnâ€™t that big, but still great variety of food! Staffs are friendly and nice! Service is great. There are lobsters. Oysters, prawns, sashimi, crabs for seafood. International dinner ; laksa , poultry , fried rice, vegetables. Interesting local food Muah Chee and ice kachang too! Nice to dine here

title: Kudos , excellent experience and service at THE PLATE
desc: Visited and dine at the plate on 06 Dec lunch, wonderful services by Jackson and crews. Delicious and awesome food and nice clean ambience. Thank you for the wonderful dinning experience. See u guys around.

title: Great service and cocktail
desc: The Trading Floor was fantastic. Jack made a great Old Fashioned drink with his special touch. Very friendly and knowledgeable of various cocktail drinks. Definitely would recommend and come back again !

title: The Trading Floor is a must-visit!
desc: Staying here in the deluxe room was a breeze, especially with the modern amenities and sleek bathtub, but the cherry on top is really the hotelâ€™s lobby bar, The Trading Floor. The bartender, Jack, was charming, and happy to go the extra distance to customise our cocktails and mocktails for us (provided he isnâ€™t too busy, of course), so we all got to enjoy some really marvellous cocktails! It was a joy to watch him perform his craft, and also great to be able to watch the World Cup at the same time! Iâ€™m looking forward to my next visit.. hopefully to experience more magical cocktails again!

title: Carlton City Hotel Birthday Stay
desc: We had an awesome time at Carlton. The room and the location of the hotel is fantastic. But what made a wonderful difference were the staff at the Carlton. My daughter had a memorable 21st Birthday from the reservation team who answered all my emails very quickly to the concierge team who brought up the many balloons , to the housekeeping team who fulfilled the many ice bucket , towel and pillows requests . Yes the birthday cake went missing for a little while but the Carlton team sent wine and cake to appease my guests and calm the nerves of a 21 year old. The cake was found as â€˜the teamâ€™ went out of their way with a fine tooth comb and sleuthing skills that even Sherlock Holmes would be proud of. Thank you, God Bless and wishing the whole team a wonderful Xmas and a Blessed

title: Great stay first time in Singapore
desc: First time in Singapore, great stay at this hotel. Very large, comfortable, well appointed room. Competent and helpful staff. Very good breakfast buffet. Great location- walking distance to many museuems and sights, and close to several subway lines. Across the street from Raffles hotel, many restaurants nearby, good food court across the street at Raffles Center mall. Hope to return soon.

title: Great service experience
desc: Went to the restaurant for our End of year Chirstmas dinner. Had a last minute addition and the staff accommodate to our request with smiles on their faces. The seafood were fresh, the food were delicious. Great service. Sepcial thanks Sathys, Din and Deva.

title: Nice lobby bar
desc: We went to the lobby bar called Trading Floor and the bartender made me a special passionfruit martini which was v good. really nice guy and hes proud of his creations. we didnt stay in the hotel so cant comment on that.

title: High Quality Hotel. Great Value
desc: I have stayed at 4-Star+ hotels before in Singapore and I rate this as the best for value. The rooms are spotless and you get a bath! There is a gym, swimming pool and a good restaurant. What stands out is the excellent customer service. I had a late evening flight out of Singapore Airport. They offered my wife and I a complimentary room at 7pm. so that we could freshen up. This hotel is near China Town, the night time Hawkers Market (with Satay Street) and is quite central. It is 5 minutes walk from the Singapore MRT train system (which links to the airport in less than 40 minutes). If I was to stay in Singapore again, this would be my first choice hotel.

title: Awesome location
desc: The hotel location is so strategic, you can take train to the airport. Lots a food around the area and also supermarket and traditional market. Room size is great, this is probably our 7th time staying there. This time room's carpet feels a bit dusty eventhough rooms been cleaned everyday [def not cleaner's fault]. The whole carpet in the hotel room needs general cleaning. Check in and out was smooth. Across the hotel is number 12th best bar in thd world. Concierge named Jagan was awesome and helpful in making reservation and always friendly. All in all, we enjoyed our stay there and will stay there again.

title: Overlaten to expensive
desc: We spend 3 night at Christimastime. The hotel was really overcrowed and should have a great Christmas vibe. But nothing was less. When we arrived the reception lady was very unfriendly and not helpfull with our luggage. Once we were finally cheched in everything was fine. During breakfast it was really crowded and we could not even sit together as a family there were long lines to be seated and the breakfast was soso, nothing special and not tomuch choice for duch a big hotel. The rooms were clean and the beds really soft. It was really a pitty that you pay 300 euro a night and font get the full experience you deskresearch for. In the End i think the hotel is overrated and not organized

title: Hotel with comfort & good bar
desc: The hotel is very well located and clean. There's food center nearby, and 711 is also closeby. Amenties are great and replenished daily. The rooftop bar was fantastic, great service and drink from Tamil!

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Very nice hotel and excellent rooms and service. Especially Ismail at the front office was very polite and helpful ! Breakfast spread is nice. Hotel is very close to MRT and CBD. There is also a Fair Price supermarket which is open 24x7 right opposite to the hotel.

title: December Birthday Celebration at Plates
desc: On 9Dec22, to celebrate Dec babiesâ€™ birthdays, we decided to benefit from the 1for1 buffet at Plates. I like the variety in buffets spread, the outlet has adequate servers to attend to the patrons. Special mention to Jackson, he was very attentive to his customers. He went an extra mile bring 2 slices of cake and mobilise some of the servers to sing the â€˜Happy Birthdayâ€™ song at our table. Tho we had plenty to eat already, it was a very thoughtful gesture which we appreciate much. Would highly recommend the outlet!

title: Lunch at Plates
desc: Went a couple of times with my big group of friends. Service rendered by Restaurant manager Mr Jackson Leong & his team was always a memorial one. Service was great, food was tasty! They went the extra mile to make sure all guests are well taken care of. It was a wonderful experience dining there. Mr Jackson deserves an award! To Jackson's team, Keep up the good work & appreciate the superb service to us always. Looking forward to meeting him & his team again. From, Alice,Jean & June

title: Plate Restaurant
desc: Went for their Sea & Grill buffet dinner and the pricing considered reasonable. The food spread were good with fresh oysters, half Boston lobsters, chili crabs and more. The staff Izzuddin and few other crews were all very attentive and helpful. We look forward to their Xmas and Cny buffet dinner.

title: Service and cocktails are great!
desc: Let the bar knows whats your preference for your cocktails and TADAHâ€¦ heres your surprise! Love the cocktail. Service is excellent ! Will definately come back for more! Looking forwars for the next cocktail

title: Appreciation to Carlton City Hotel Staffs!
desc: I would like to extend my appreciation to the whole team of Carlton City Hotel - in particular for the following: - Pui Vun: someone who really understand all of my enquiries prior to my arrival esp when I travelled with an infant and elders. My whole family really enjoyed the stay there and had a smooth check-in. You deserve the appreciation from us! - Concierge: Mr Suresh, Harun, Jeagan, and other staff (apologize for any misspelled in the name). Enjoyed the warm welcome since we arrived, and a simple good morning or how are you really made our day. Keep it up! - Housekeeping: sorry I didnt notice their names but they cleaned and also tidy up the things in our rooms. Minor improvement: - perhaps the Hotel can provide the bidets for all of the rooms.

title: Good drinks at the hotel lobby
desc: Very yummy drinks at the hotel lobby bar! Pretty and tastes delicious, mix of liquors and got to chose my gin which was really nice! The calamari is also delicious. Ask for Jack to get this pineapple pink drink!

title: Good Service
desc: Convenience location while the room is comfy. Wi-Fi speed is quite fast. Impressive service of the bellman Jagan who is a nice guy with good memory. However, the water pressure of the shower can be stronger.

title: Worth the experience
desc: We went to eat at the plates restaurant in L3. We had the best time. Buffet was worth the trip. We went on a Friday to get their seafood and grill. The seafood was superb. It was fresh. The staff was very hospitable. They took care of our table and was very fast to refill our water and clear our plates. Thank you to Sathys Din Ak and Deva for a very good dinner.

title: Just a tired mind which needs a drink
desc: I decided to have a drink after a long day meeting and went to Carlton City Singapore lobby bar. Looked at the menu and ordered the classic mojito, but the bartender Mr Jack asked me to try his signature mojito instead. Decided to go for it and to my very pleasant surprise, it was very good. We had a short chat and he shared that this was different from the classic one in which he added sour plum, calamansi and most importantly, he doesnâ€™t add any sugar. All came with natural sweetness from the fruits. It was a very balanced flavour drink which I like it so much! Thanks Mr Jack for the recommendation! Will definitely come back again!

title: Friendly staff with great service. Have return many times.
desc: Have visited the lobby bar many time. Friendly staff with great service. Apart from good and cheap beers. They serve good cocktails, my favourite is old fashion which I go for most of the time there. Jack has extensive knowledge in cocktail making and is always attentive tobthe guests at the lobby bar. Really appreciate that.

title: Great stay!
desc: Stay was great, spacious room, comes with a spacious working desk, perfect for guest on business trip. Housekeeping was great, clean and professional, only nuisance was getting woken up every morning by them to ask if we have any laundry otherwise a great stay. Would recommend this and definitely be back!

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: Fantastic hotel !! We stayed at Carlton City Hotel for 4 nights. It is walking distance to chinatown (which has so many restaurants). Also we loved the rooftop bar at the hotel and we loved chilling at the pool. Breakfast wasn't the best (6/10)

title: Came for the accommodation, stayed for the excellent service
desc: My husband & I recently spent a week at this fabulous hotel in a Club room on the 24th floor. This room gives you access to the Club Lounge on the 28th floor which is a spacious, quiet, comfortable retreat from the heat & humidity of this busy city. The Hotel is extremely close to the Tanjong Pagar MRT & local shops. The MRT has direct access to the airport which makes it a great base to stay to discover the city. Although Singapore sells itself, the Club Lounge with buffet breakfast, light snacks throughout the day & savouries and drinks served each night was one of the highlights of our stay. At times we were the only people in the lounge which enabled us to connect with the friendly & attentive staff. This was our 4 or 5th return over the past 8 years to the Hotel & our first

title: Faultless!
desc: This hotel is a one of a kind. Effortless restaurants (Tuxedo and Plate), effortless staff, effortless pool and the most lovely rooms, complete with spacious showers and comfy beds. A central hotel, you can easily access the spots around. Rhizwan and Jack were particularly nice. I shall definitely be visiting again - hopefully soon!

title: Ideal
desc: We had an excellent time at The Carlton City Hotel. Not only are we in the Centre of Singapore and in an ideal location but the staff are really friendly, the food is divine, and the facilities are excellent. The only downside of this hotel is that we stayed in rooms that smelt of cigarettes which was not good and we had to request room changes. They moved us efficiently and swiftly but this was not good considering we have children with respiratory issues. We will be though!

title: Business Trip to SG
desc: I had a very pleasant trip to SG and in particular the stay at Carlton City Hotel deserves a mention. Staff was very courteous and they went all the way out to help me. In particular I would like to call out Mr Harun, who helped with booking my cabs every morning and bringing me umbrella, warning me of the weather for the day etc. I would especially recommend this hotel if you are looking to Visit SG!

title: Solo travel made fun
desc: A lovely hotel with a warm staff. The rooms and the views are great. The concierge mr Suresh Singh was so helpful in guiding me to the attractions of the city and with some great advice on what to visit and how to travel in public transport. It made my visit very easy and relaxed.

title: Large hotel with feel of a boutique hotel
desc: This is a very well managed and very well situated hotel within two minutes of a MRT station and within easy range of Chinatown and the great restaurants to be found there. Lovely poolâ€¦ (workout room has space constraints). We had Club floor access and were impressed with the offerings and touched by the warm welcome afforded by the staff in the lounge. But the human touch extended to the staff at reception and those at the door upon arrival and departure. A large hotel with the feel if a boutique hotel. Highly recommended!

title: Delightful stay at Carlton City Singapore
desc: Great location. Near Chinatown. Could walk to many restaurants and attractions. The staff were friendly and helpful. Special thanks to concierge. Ismail was particularly helpful supplying us with a map and marking the best ways to get to places as we like to walk. Very helpful ordering taxis for us and explaining how we could get back via taxi. The breakfast had a lot of choice and there was plenty of it. The pool area was lovely and an enjoyable place to spend some time. Room was clean and very comfortable.

title: Excellent service by Jackson and his team
desc: We celebrated our mom's 72th birthday in Plate. Our first visit here is very pleasant. Thanks to Jackson, Sathys, AK and Avani. Their service is delightful. The food is good and the ambience is cozy. Keep up the good work. We'll be back.

title: Graffiti Sky Bar
desc: Great ambience, extremely helpful staff and warmness of the entire team! Special thanks to Zin Min, Shafiq and Tamil for making this corporate event a successful one and hope to see you all soon in near future! Thank you!

title: Itâ€™s as perfect as it can get!
desc: I stayed 3 nights at the final stop of my Asian trip. I chose to stay because of previous good experience. My executive room on the top floors has a panoramic view of the city and it is spectacular. The location is great, only a couple minutes walk from Tanjong Pagar food court/market and MRT station. Along my walk from the hotel to Chinatown is a series of Korean restaurants and other cafes. Youâ€™ll never be hungry here. Shopping for snacks and amenities are so convenient since there are FairPrice, Don Don Donki and numerous bakeries in the neighborhood. Pubs and late night clubs are numerous. So I highly recommend Carlton City Hotel. The in-room service is excellent. Check-in and Check-out are quick and easy. Iâ€™ll come back to stay on my future trips to Singapore.

title: Wonderful Staff
desc: I've been staying at the hotel for business for over two months now and it's been a great experience. The facilities are ideal and the staff are excellent. I have to commend two members of staff in particular who have really stood out. Yang Cong who works in housekeeping has been excellent, really attentive and super friendly, and has used real initiative on a number of occasions to make me more comfortable. He's a terrific guy. In a similar vein, a young lady who works in the restaurant Table called Julie Dinh was equally outstanding. I popped in alone for a quick , simple meal and she absolutely could not have done more for me nor looked after me better - she was extremely attentive and friendly despite it being a very busy lunchtime. Thanks Julie. I also had the

title: HOSPITALITY as its BEST!
desc: Long-Term stay for several weeks was mainly influenced by a highly motivated team in the Carlton City Hotel. Kindness, helpfulness and the personal touch of Singapore are the ingredients for an unforgettable stay - mainly in the Club Lounge -, thanks to Nicolas, Anussha, Om and all the others. Keep on going! # Thank YOU very much #

title: Best Hotel Crew !
desc: The Reception Crew ist extremely friendly, helpfull, professional and especially heartwarming and kind were Jenna and Teo. Also at the rooftopbar the Crew ist super! They remember the guests, remember what I drink and are very friendly! Thank you so much!!! Itâ€˜s always like coming home when I visit the hotel. Canâ€™t wait to get back! NicolaðŸ˜‰

title: Good experience
desc: Food is up to standard, seafood on ice is always refilled and service is good; Sathys Naidu and other floor staffs did well too as they were always looking out for diners; whether we need anything or any help.

title: Good food
desc: good service with decent food, served by sathys and team. came with my friend and we really liked the variety of food offered, especially the desserts and fresh oysters. would revisit again with other friends

title: Excellent
desc: Food is good. Seafoods are fresh. Sathys and team were also very friendly and helpful towards our request. We had a wonderful team building night. We will come back again. Thank you and stay safe.

title: excellent to celebrate occasion
desc: excellent service by Sathys and his team. wide variety of buffet spread at plate restaurant and refill very promptly. enjoy my time here. highly recommend for any one who wants to celebrate a special occasion.

title: Stay at Carleton Hotel, Singapore
desc: Excellent location Convenient to have breakfast included,and restaurant available later in day Tuxedo coffee area excellent. Room lighting a bit dim. Need more hooks to hang towels in bathroom. Lovely greeting from Jaqueline,at reception. Very good help from concierge team

title: Nice Time in Singapore and Carlton City Hotel
desc: On our arrival at Calton City Hotel we were greeted very friendly. We had a very nice big room. Very clean and quiet. High ceiling. Bathroom with shower tray. Highly recommended is the Sea and Grill buffet on Friday or Saturday evening. We took it on friday evening. Food super delicious, Service fantastic. 5 stars from us.
