Very nice is a visit to the rooftop bar, with a great view. A selection of continental breakfast, American breakfast, Asian and Indian breakfast was offered. The breakfast buffet gets "only" 4 stars from aus, becaus we lacked the bread and rolls selection. As well as salmon for breakfast. For our tours we have always used the MRT. The hotel is great located between Tanjong Pagar station an Maxwell station. Direct connection to the airport. On the way

title: Exceptionally Surprising!
desc: After 32 years of living in Singapore I decided it was time to go home; and thus began the process of packing and getting ready to move my life back to the United States. This also included making arrangement to stay for about 2 weeks in an hotel on my way out of the country. After careful review of locations, facilities and prices, I chose Carlton City Hotel. It was an excellent choice. Located in the heart of Tanjong Pagar, but close to the CBD and Orchard Road areas, and just a stones throw from the Tanjong Pagar MRT Station, Carlton City Hotel was a perfect place to spend my last days in Singapore. While Singapore has many good hotels, what stood out about Carlton City Hotel was itâ€™s well designed guest rooms, comprehensive facilities and super friendly/helpful team

title: Convenient location
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights for a short trip in Singapore. Great location, right next to the Tanjong Pagar station, and many nice restaurants around the area, so itâ€™s very convenient. However, the room itself is a little dated and amenities were not great. No hair conditioner for example. I will probably stay at another hotel nearby for the location next time.

title: I love this place. Sathys is awesome!
desc: lovelyyy i love the seafood. It is wonderful, ate until full full. The desert selection was wonderful, chocolate fountain where to find!! And Sathys and the other servers were wonderful and kind, seecice was 100%!

title: Definitely a 10 for the Reservations and Dining Team!
desc: Big appreciation for the team at Carlton City Hotel's Plate, specifically Sathys and Gopala. Very accommodating to our big turnout, it wasn't easy but you have managed the whole situation so well. Your team took care of us all the way from reservations, to seating arrangements and even sorting out our cakes and all. You have certainly went the extra mile to bring the extra smile. I wish we were much easier to handle but thank you for helping us nonetheless. You guys are so awesome, thank you for the eventful night.

title: Wonderful stay and Excellent staff!
desc: This is my first time staying in this hotel with my colleague for our business trip. We had a very warm welcome by the Manager PuiVun, she is very nice and friendly person (She loves to smile). After she knew this is our first time staying, she offered us room at higher floor. But since we prefer room near to elevator, we stick to the original room. She also introduce us places that around the hotel. On the day we checked out, she recognize us and checked with us how was our stay. She is the best manager we ever met in term of professional and good personality.

title: Good experience and nice food!
desc: Devagaram and team are very accommodating. We have a wonderful time. The food are generally nice and kids below seven are free. Now they have promo, one for one so is very worth it. Will come back again next time.

title: Solid performer
desc: As Singapore is recovering from the pandemic for tourists, the service here was very warm and attentive. We stayed as part of the club deal and were impressed with Nicholas, the manager, attention to detail. Well worth the extra to get club access. Hotel, like most in Singas, is well located and the MRT makes traveling easy.

title: Classy hotel
desc: It's a great business hotel with nice rooms. The view over the harbour might not be the most interesting view I've had, but interesting to see the boats come in. The club lounge was nice with snacks, coffee and soft drinks all day. The dinner was however a bit simple. Only small sandwiches and appetizers.

title: Amazing Singapore Hotel
desc: Amazing hotel experience at the Carlton City. I was so impressed with the staff and how I was treated during my stay. The rooms are spacious, well equipped with a very comfortable bed. Great business lounge with very helpful staff. Nice 3rd floor outside pool, also a great rooftop bar.

title: Great hotel in all aspects!
desc: Stayed 6 nights in a club room 7-13 April and everything was excellent - have stayed here before pre-Covid and its still a solid choice. A property that has it right in all aspects - firstly the staff across the board are accommodating, professional and genuinely friendly. A++ The facilities are also top notch - from the swimming pool to the club lounge to the bedroom and bathroom. I particularly like the White Company toiletries - so happy they still have these! The location is perfect and the area is constantly improving. Just a 2 mins walk to the Tanjong Pagar MRT and the 100AM mall as well. This mall now has everything you need - fantastic restaurants, a new Muji, even a DonDon Donki outlet. My only minor niggle would be the lack of a daily newspaper in the club lounge

title: Great service!
desc: The rooms were clean and tastefully decorated. Also very grateful to Jenna for going the extra mile checking us in early, for us to rest (as it happens, my elderly parents arrived at the lobby way before the check in time).

title: Awesome
desc: Great service! Very friendly staff and great food! Zin min tun is the best! Overall experience is awesome! Will introduce friends to this place! Rooftop at graffiti is the best! Will be back more often!

title: Great meal, attentive service!
desc: Appreciate the professional and attentive service rendered by Jackson, Julie and Sathys. They ensured our corporate lunch gathering went on smoothly, right from the first point of contact at reservation. They looked into the comfort of all guests and ensured a pleasant dining experience for us.

title: The Best Hotel in Singapore, World Class
desc: I enjoyed my stay, all services and assistance provided by the hotel was first class. On Saturday 3rd June 2023, before my check out at 3pm. I went to Mustafa came back to the hotel around 11am. Upon leaving a taxi which dropped, I left my mobile phone in the taxi. So I had to seek assistance from the officers namely Ismail, Ravean and Jauan. They called the taxi company and managed to the taxi. They collected my mobile phone and pass it to me. This service was the icing on the cake and pure reflection of people of Singapore. I will never forget this and thank you so much. Cheers and Regards, SKasingu

title: Seafood fresh
desc: Sathys has been really helpful and friendly. The seafood are fresh, except for the chilli crab which is too mushy. The laksa is delicious. The lobsters are limited in quantity so it is hard to get your hands on it.

title: Comfortable
desc: I stayed there for two weeks. They have friendly and professional staffs, its service was also great. I enjoyed my time there without any trouble. It was comfortable and pleasant experience. Especially, they locate near to the EW MRT station and there are many different type's food courts near to the hotel.

title: A comfortable stay that feels like home
desc: The hotel staff are very polite and very helpful. They made my stay very comfortable and pleasing. Messrs. Jagan and Suresh are attentive, often offering their assistance to every guest. The cleaning staff keeps the room spotless and clean.

title: Good
desc: Daniel was very helpful and attentive with us all the time really appreciate it But Theo from front the desk gave us a room different as we had booked , we booked non smoking and we had a smoking room and had to complain and show our booking to others employees in order to have what we had pay for

title: Plate Dinner Buffet
desc: Visited Plate for their Sea and Grill Dinner Buffet. Food was great and there was a wide variety of seafood selection. We were attended by Sathys, Vincy, AK and Merin and their service were great. Overall, good experience and will be back.

title: Plate Restaurant dining experience
desc: Went to plate restaurant for buffet for a company dinner. Service staffs Elaine, Deva, Vinay, Faziq were prompt in clearing our dirty plates and replacing with a new one. They were also friendly and provided us with good service. Thumbs up to them!

title: Plate
desc: Very nice family gathering and celebrating Motherâ€™s Day.. v nice service from Sathys, Vina. Good environment. Very nice food. Good service. Nice hotel. Great desert corner. Value for money. Great hotel.

title: Decent buffet
desc: Sathys was accomodating, food was decent but variety wasn't the best. Have to be act fast when lobster is out otherwise you might be left disappointed. Spent about $140sgd after taxes, overall of u are not a big eater and craving for some buffet this is okay

title: Average hotel but good central location
desc: Hotel seemed quite old and tired in place. Pool area outside was nice and clean. Restaurant (breakfast) was ok. Good selection. Rooftop bar was lovely but very expensive. Rooms very average. Safe didnâ€™t work. Some of the sockets didnâ€™t either. Laundry, drinks, food hugely expensive.

title: Great service :)
desc: I was served by Sathys, who is very accommodating with my request for sitting arrangements (I have young kids) and he provide great service during my meal time in the restaurant. Keep up the good service!

title: Good service from Sathys
desc: Very good service and experience, Sathys provided very good customer service and I will definitely recommend and provide good feedback to my friend and family. It the best buffet experience for me so far

title: Great experience
desc: Great food and experience with sathys 's awesome service Sathys got us a table when our reservation was cancelled in the system as ive made reservation made since month of march 2023. Luckily sathys made it happen! Cheer!

title: Buffet was ok
desc: Had dinner buffet at the plate. The place was clean and food was ok. Staff Sathys was friendly. Would be better if they had a better range of cold drinks for the buffet as there was only cranberry juice and ice water

title: Nice dinner at Plate restaurant
desc: Had a quiet and lovely dinner at Plate restaurant. We ordered pistachio crusted salmon which had a crispy skin and tender meat. The wagyu beef burger was delicious too, nicely done. Service was good. Thanks Naidu!!

title: Excellence service
desc: Sathys is very attentive and friendly and even offers us extra service. He make the extra effort to call us back to let us know our seats are being reserved as well as adhering to all our request that we have. Thank you Sathys for making our night!

title: Great And Wonderful Experience at the Carlton City Hotel Singapore.
desc: Had the privilege of making a dinner reservation here at the PLATE restaurant with my wife and we had a wonderful dining experience. We were warmly greeted by a nice gentleman, Mr Sathys Naidu and shown to our table a distance away from the food serving area as it was rather occupied. Good service is relatively common.But service that leaves a lasting impression is far rarer and instantly recognizable. What really made our experience special was Mr Sathys Naidu's attention to making our time there memorable. He noticed the challenge we faced getting to the food serving area due to our advanced in years and immediately allocated another table nearer for us and that really deserves credit for his great warmth treatment for his guest. Also , food was phenomenal and sashimi was

title: Great
desc: Staff Sathys was helpful and accomodating. The food could top up faster. The varieties of food was just nice. The space between the tables and guests is very close. The service provided by the staff was fast and efficient

title: Good Experience Carlton City Hotel.
desc: The staff truly cares about your experience. The food is acceptable and there is a great variety. The staffs are friendly and helpful and they cleared and topped up the food efficiently. Good for a family and friends celebration.

title: Seafood dinner
desc: Had our seafood dinner buffet yesterday. Food was delicious, the seafood on ice n lobster were fantastic. The restaurant ambience is nice although it was full yesterday. Great service from the staf gopala, din n the team that clean up our dirty plate immedietly. Nice pool outside of restaurant.

title: Lobster night
desc: The buffet spread was a lot mainly more to seafood item. Worth with the price plus 1 for 1 promo. Lobster were huge n fresh. Laksa taste was good the gravy is thick full with flavor. The service staff was great eventhough the restaurant is full. Shout out to gopala, din n team for their friendly service. Will consider to come again.

title: Amazing experience at carlton city hotel
desc: Absolutely amazing, this cozy "Plate" restaurant at Carlton City hotel sg has left the best impressions! Hospitable service from Mr Gopala n team crews , delicious dishes, good seating and wonderful dessert. The place is beautiful and staff are super friendly and helpful. I recommend to everyone! I would like to come back here again and again

title: Nice hotel and nice staff
desc: I want to give my remark on the staff. 1, I lost my password of my suitcase belt so I asked them to send up to me the scissors to cut it. The staff was So kind and tried to figure out how to unlock my belt without damaging my belt. Although he couldnâ€™t succeed I really appreciated his kindness. 2, when I depart from hotel to airport they helped me to carry my golf bag and suitcase since I injured my wrist and couldnâ€™t do it myself. They were very gentle and kind.

title: Excellent service at plate bdae
desc: Wonderful brilliant reservation service and excellent service by Sathys and team in celebrating my friends birthday ! Was so amazed and would love to be back 10/10!! We love the food and salmon was so good ! We totally recommend

title: Perfect
desc: Celebrated our wedding anniversary. My wife wanted to try something different this year hence we went there. Staff are very friendly and explained to us in detail. Room & Breakfast all awesome. We had an enjoyable and great celebration. Thank you Front Desk Staff & Room Service. We would like to come back and stay again.

title: Concierge
desc: A big thank you to the wonderful concierge men Suresh, Ismail and Ravean. I lost my phone and they tried everything they could do to bringt it back. They were so friendly, committed, helpful and I got my phone back. These guys are amazing.

title: Good feedback on the food and people who served us.
desc: I have my treat in hilton carlton city. The food was so good. I really enjoyed the food and ambuience of the place. I must say Thanks to Mr David Seet and Team. They suprised me a with happy birthday and cake. Mr David seet did the mochi for us with love. The waitress were very kind and poliet. Overall me and my friends have a good time, good food , good vibes. Special Thanks to Mr David seet. And his team Ju le, Jing Jing,Mayrim and Aleena.

title: Carlton City Hotel is a good place to stay
desc: Room is clean. Jagan is very helpful and he called a taxi for me on early Friday morning. Jagan also helped me with my three very bags. Also, food is very good and when I stayed there, I tried their steak, salmon and chicken. Delicious!

title: Great stay at the Carlton City Hotel Singapore!
desc: I had an amazing stay at the Carlton, the staff were amazing, especially Suresh. They were so accommodating and very attentive. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom just wonderful and clean, with great views! Lovely facilities such as the pool and gym. And breakfast was lovely and lots of options.

title: Rude restaurant staff
desc: I have stayed in Carlton the world over but have never experienced anything like this before and hence the review. We were around 16 of us booked at this place. We reached around 915pm from the airport after a tiring flight. While a few of us checked in the staff informed us that the 3rd-floor restaurant would close by 10 pm for dinner. So a few of us dropped the bags at the counter and went to the 3rd-floor restaurant called Plate. We met an Indian guy heading this place on arrival. The restaurant was empty. As soon as we arrived this guy started telling us that he does not know which group this is and how will we pay blah blah blah. The funny part was the hotel had a; already taken a security deposit on our credit cards! Finally, our guy who had booked the entire group

title: Yummy buffet dinner with a need for improvement
desc: My family had dinner at the Plate. The appetizers and main course were yummy and the spread was not too bad. However the dessert corner were disappointing. The kuehs were tasteless and the green bean soup was bland w a raw taste. Improving the dessert corner would definitely add value to the whole dining experience

title: Nice cocktails and Bartender
desc: Thanks to KV for making us nice old fashioned cocktails using Japanese whiskey instead of bourbon. What a nice combination for that. We will definitely looking forward to come back and look for him at the rooftop bar for making us nice cocktails again.

title: AMAZING â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
desc: everything was pleasant and comfortable, my only compaint is that the hairdryer cable can be longer. pillow and bed was so soft and amazing, the staff was all super friendly and helpful. the room is very spacious and the view is the best.

title: Great staff but food need improvement
desc: We had our family dinner last week at restaurant call plate. Its a birthday celebration for one of our family member. A first I didn't know that the restaurant will provide a complimentary cake for birthday guest but then I've been informed by the staff name Din that its already been arranged & just let him know when we want the cake to be served. I appreciate his effort how he gather all the staff just to sing birthday song together for my family . the service from all crew is amazing. They keep checking with our group if need anything and dirty plate cleared as soon as we finishes our meal. While the service is amazing, the food quality & replenishment need to be improve. the chili crab taste is bland and not fresh and the replenishment for oyster & lobster are totally slow.

title: Dinner Buffet 1 for 1
desc: The food was really fresh and delicious. Food was replenished very quickly as well. Service was good. Sathys and merin was very friendly. Staff was attentive and friendly. Tables were cleared without disruption to our dining experience.

title: Where Comfort meets Convenience
desc: Our experience at Carlton City Hotel Singapore was great. The staff here were warm, welcoming and very helpful. A special mention to the concierge Jagan for his wonderful hospitality and politeness. The rooms were cosy. We highly appreciated the location of the hotel to the nearest MRT which made our travel around the city a lot easier. We will definitely look at visiting again in the future.

title: Friendly & professional service
desc: We booked the entire Plate restuarant at level 3 for our daughter's 1year old birthday & it was the best decision we made ! Thank u Jackson who allowed a reasonable minimum guaranteed pax which fulfilled our criteria. Gopala provided exceptional service to everyone at the restaurant & we could feel his genuine sincerity ! He was professional & super friendly. Food was great & seafood were fresh. Thank you everyone who worked hard to provide the best service to us !

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: Chosen Plate to celebrate my friend birthday today and glad that the food and service amazing! Special shout-out to Jackson, Elaine and Gopala for the wonderful service rendered. Truly a gem and worth visiting if you like eating seafood buffet.

title: Great service By Jackson & Team @ Plate
desc: Special thanks to Jackson & his team for the superb service rendered during my lunch there on 08 June together with Ms Alice, Ms June, Ms Jean & our gang of friends. His team was attentive, professional & polite. We felt like home when we are there. It was great having service staffs like them.

title: Recommended choice
desc: Very good stay. Many thanks to the staff Mr Suresh. He is very kind, helpful and decent. The hotel is very clean and quiet. Rooms are comfortable. Maybe have to add some more varieties in the breakfast

title: Excellent hotel for corporate training event
desc: We used the hotel for a corporate workshop and we couldnâ€™t be more happy. Gopal was fantastic at helping to set up the room, available at all times and making the experience really positive. This is the third time Iâ€™ve used this hotel for training events and I will continue to do so. Andrea Ross The Career Establishment

title: The food is good and affordable
desc: I only came to eat the one for one buffet at Plate. Sir David served us very well He was very knowledgeable about the job and very humble too. Before i left the restaurant i was served by Sathys Nadu, he helped to settle our payment. He asked me to write this feedback..

title: Restaurant
desc: Excellent service from sathys naidu - friendly l, considerate and kind at the restaurant plate. Food was good too. The rooms are comfortable and clean. Nice location. Nice view from the room as well

title: Seafood night
desc: Great dinner last night with our friends. The food was tasty however the menu need to be more diversify as it was the same menu like we have few months ago etc like sushi, seafood on ice and some of the hot dish. Its the same exact type of sushi just like we went before. The bake salmon n roast beef were delicious! Kudos to din for being attentive with my request although he seem to be very busy but still handle it with patiently. Will consider to come back if the menu will change to more creative dish.

title: Hotel Stay and birthday dinner at the plate
desc: Sathy and Elaine are very much accomodating, friendly and helpful. They attended to all my request without any hesitation. We enjoyed our stay and our sumptuous dinner at the plate! Highly Recommended for our stay at this hotel and The Plate Buffet. â­ï¸ â­ï¸ â­ï¸ â­ï¸ â­ï¸ for the hotel and all the staff specially Sathy and Elaine! â˜ºï¸

title: SG trip
desc: During my stay in Carlton city hotel, I have appreciated the kindness of the staff. Ms. Maricar in the reception desk was very helpful and nice. And Ms. sharmila also has been very helpful. Thank you ladies

title: Excellent Service
desc: The restaurant staff at Plate were fantastic. They provided excellent service as my boy wasn't feeling well and they took the initiative to prepare porridge for him. Commendable staff include Sathys, July, DIN.

title: Great place to stay
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 7 nights. Good sized rooms, king-size bed, nice n comfortable, lovely tiled bathroom with separate bath. Serviced daily, friendly staff, lovely and clean. Air con good. Lovely pool and lounging area. Walking distance to Chinatown. Would definitely stay again.

title: Absolutely delightful
desc: Where do I start? Firstly, I was impressed that my call was answered within two rings when I needed more information prior to making the room booking. I was attended to by Josephine, who was cheerful and very helpful. She had a sense of humor that lightened the entire conversation, and she put me through to Anushia, who was an absolute delight. It was my partner's birthday and I had asked if they could do a surprise. When I arrived, a slice of cake was delivered to the room by Anushia... moments later she came back with a bottle of red wine which was indeed a pleasant surprise. What topped it off was how professional and friendly she was. Truly a delight. Two thumbs to these two ladies that made my surprise for my partner beautiful. As for the room itself. It was clean and big.

title: Good service
desc: Din & Gopala are very friendly and helpful. Elaine is very attentive and friendly in serving her diners. Highly recommended for any occasions. Reasonable priced buffet and situated in a very accessible locations in the Central Area of Singapore.

title: Excellent service
desc: Excellent service n the food is excellent and the staffs is very friendly too..l like to thks the staffs n the manager for their excellent service...Will be back on the Nov 2023 again now is around 40 paxs for the buffet..

title: All good but costly
desc: High quality and robust service in any way. Nice breakfast and excellent housekeeping. Quiet room even with aircon running. A bit hard to get taxi in the morning. All in all I am sure I will come back again. The only reason not to give 5 stars is that the charge was very high.

title: Above and Beyond Service at Plate
desc: We had a large crowd (24 of us, 4 tables) for my sisterâ€™s birthday dinner on Jul 1 at Plate. We had such a memorable experience. Buffet was decent and service was great. Management helped arranged for a special private room and even laid out seafood platters on each table! Special shout out to Jackson, Vinay and Fazia (especially Vinay!). He went over and beyond expectations, helped us with balloon decorations before dinner started, helped my heavily pregnant sister get food despite it being a self service buffet. Thank you so much!

title: Business Stay - 2 days
desc: Recently stayed at Carlton. Below are the pros and cons: Pros: 1. Location - Excellent. 2 mins walk to the MRT. 2. Room - Excellent - very clean and spacious. 3. Staff - Very friendly 4. Breakfast - I didn't take this option as it was expensive so I opted to do it from outside as there are plenty of options in Tanjong Pagar MRT (2 mins walk). Con: 1. Probably a bit expensive. However, overall Singapore is expensive.

title: Best employees
desc: Staff Zin Min was exceptionally welcoming and friendly to all his customers. He was very attentive and initiative to help us without our asking. A really good staff that mad overall service amazing. Staff Elaine was very friendly as well and always helped us with a bright smile on her face which made my day much fuller and better. Both are amazing staffs

title: Anniversary
desc: Great seafood spreads (lobsters, oysters, crabs, etc) and food. Also good service from restaurant staffs especially to Sathys and Jackson who has helped us with our reservation on our wedding anniversary.

title: Superb location with Excellent service.
desc: This is my second time staying with Carlton City hotel , the location is inside the CBD area with all the fantastic eateries In walking distance. Have to thank the staffs in Carlton City Hotel Jenna and Teo were super helpful. They will try the theyâ€™re best to solve your problem while you staying with them. Super good location with elite hospitality. Value for money.

title: Excellent service!
desc: Excellent service, especially from the Chief Concierge. Very helpful and patient. Thank you! The days were most enchanting and well accompanied by very professional staff. Will be coming back as soon as possible. And bring more guests to enjoy.

title: Amazing and memorable stay
desc: We stayed in this property last July18-22,2023. Me and my daughter planned a mother and daughter trip. Carlton City hotel got nice location and you can do lot of things/activities in their area. Room was clean and spacious we just hope that their t.v is already a smart t.v :). Also, it will be much a wonderful stay if their phone operator and front desk people smile wd their guest and will be much Approachable and friendly. We are just so lucky that atleast their Concierge team esp. Sir Mohamed Ismail and Sir Suresh Singh was so nice and helpful. I can say these two gentlemen really loves their job and knows what they're doing.

title: Great service from Zin Min Tun
desc: Been a regular at Tuxedo cafe, they serves many yummy pastries, mains n coffee. Cozy n spacious environment. Staff Zin Min Tun is always very cheerful, he is extremely helpful n focus on his work too. Handles customer well. Like the environment here. Whenever we are at tanjong pagar this will be my number 1 place to visit first.

title: Great service!
desc: Hello, I would like to give a compliment and thumbs up to the staff at the plate on 5th august 2023. We were being taken great care of and they are all so nice! With a very positive and great attitude. Making me and my husband enjoy our dinner more. Thank you so much for the great service. Din, sathis, aky, meem and aleena.

title: Great service and food
desc: Thanks for the great service and hospitality by Mr. Sathys who attended to us. We had a great time at the dinner with family. Food was good and service was great. Will visit again next time. Thanks again Mr. Sathys and team.

title: One of the â€œMost Worth Itâ€ Seafood Buffets in Town
desc: Had the 1-for-1 Sea & Grill Dinner Buffet at ð™‹ð™‡ð˜¼ð™ð™€ restaurant on my birthday. Good buffet spreads, from free-flow seafood to all-you-can-eat sashimi to an endless flow of meat. The team led by Sathys & Elaine were also very efficient and they were very fast in clearing plates and very accommodating. The food is nice and good value for money. Will definitely come back again.

title: Nice hotel experience
desc: Very good hotel. I stayed here for 5 nights. Hotel location is very near form Tanjong Pagar MRT Near Korean street can enjoy Korean food. Very good hotel. Staff is helpful and polite. Breakfast offered here is complementary and good. Should visit again

title: Renovated Rooftop Bar
desc: Used to come here before the renovation. After the renovation, love the new environment - very nice and cosy. Menu is also upgraded, a lot more variety for food and wine choices. Definitely will be back at my favourite rooftop bar!

title: Cosy restaurant with delicious food spread and attentive staff
desc: Itâ€™s my 5th time to Plate Restaurant for Company lunch. Itâ€™s cosy atmosphered restaurant with delicious food spread and attentive staff. Dietary food request was delightfully accommodated too. Thank you Gopala and his team members!

title: LOVELYgathering
desc: My friends n me were at Plate for our lunch gathering, It was a awesome experience- the place was good n clean, the food spread is OK, for the price paid. We have a good time, the staffs will very attentive to ours needs making sure our tables are clean n have space for other food to come. Thanks to your able serving staffs, David Jackson Ju le meera Bee . And thanks for the recommendation of the laska! We each have a bowl of it, only one missed it. We loved it! We shall return!

title: Everything was seamless.
desc: Jenna at the reception was extra helpful. All the service personnel were efficient and went the extra distance. The hotel was clean and the amenities were world class. The food was amazing and made to perfection.

title: Top Assistance
desc: Good evening, I am writing to compliment you on the staff at your Hotel Carlton City. This is my second time staying at this hotel and it is always a wonderful, professional and friendly staff at hand. Mr. Suresh and the Concierge team is of the finest and most expert, friendly yet always professional, that I have yet met on my many travels. Many hotels look alike, the rooms do as well and the restaurants may be similar. What always, always makes the difference is great staff- you have that in your hotel, congratulations and thank you!

title: Amazing hotel room but no kids channel
desc: Thereâ€™s just 1 issue. The TV didnâ€™t have a kids channel for my kids. Other than that, everything is awesome. My parents had a really great time here. Iâ€™d be extremely glad if you were to add a kids channel to the TV.

title: Staff with a sense :)
desc: Staff were helpful and attentive despite the busy environment, special commends to Komathi and crew for having good sense to top up seafood when requested! Was difficult as there were guests who immediately snatched a lot once it came out.

title: PLATE ..definitely a must go try
desc: We celebrated our friendâ€™s 75 birthday at the Plate. The staff are so attentive and went out of their way to make sure our guests were looked after, paying attention to details. Out guests were impressed with the good food and service Special kudos to Jack Chan and his team of servers, IT suppprt.

title: Wonderful Experience at Plate
desc: We had the buffet dinner at Plate. There was wonderful service by the team (Din, David, Vinay, Jennifer), which made the meal enjoyable! There was a good spread of cooked food, seafood and desserts. Would say itâ€™s quite worth as itâ€™s a 1-for-1 promotion. Will be back again!
